review: 사람 없을줄 예상하고 왔는데 정말 많이 없어서 놀이기구 대기없이 원없이 탔어영 매직패스를 꼭 이용해서 타면 알차게 놀슈잇어영
review_en: I thought there wouldn't be a lot of people, but there weren't that many people, so I rode it without waiting for rides. If you use magic pass, you'll be able to enjoy it.

review: 혜성탈출일반줄보다 매직패스를 더 늦게 들여보내줌 오히려 일반줄에탔다면 더 일찍갔을텐데 그게 불만입니다ㅠㅠㅠㅠ
review_en: I would have gone earlier if I had gotten on the regular line instead of letting in the magic pass later than the general line of Comet Escape.ᅲᅲᅲᅲ

review: 1994년 처음가봤다. 그때나 지금이나 여전한 곳 평일에 가면 원없이 즐기고 탈 수 있다...아직 아틀란티스를 못타봤는데 갈때마다 점검 혹은 .. 사건사고가 터져서.. 휴일 혹은 공휴일은 피하시는 것이 좋습니다.
review_en: I went there for the first time in 1994. I can enjoy and ride whenever I go on weekdays.I haven't been to Atlantis yet, but every time I go, I check or... There's been an accident. You'd better avoid holidays or holidays.

review: 비가와도 실내에서 놀이시설을 즐길수가 있음 오래된 곳이긴 하지만 그래도 관리가 잘되어있고 주변에 볼거리도 많습니다
review_en: It is an old place, but it is well managed and there are many things to see around.

review: 롯데월드는 실내 어드벤쳐가 있어서 날씨게 상관없이 놀이기구를 탈수 있는 점은 좋아요. 그런데 롯데월드는 항상 느끼는 거지만 사람이 너무 많습니다 ㅎㅎ 젤 대기가 짧은게 30분 긴거는 1시간 50분 이고요.. 매직패스를 예약하려고 해도 몇초만에 끝나버리는 듯요.. 이번에도 신나는 퍼레이드만 실컷 구경하고 왔답니다 ㅎㅎㅎㅎ
review_en: Lotte World has an indoor adventure, so it's good to ride the rides regardless of the weather. But I always feel that there are too many people in Lotte World. The short waiting time for gel is 30 minutes and the long time is 1 hour and 50 minutes. I'm trying to book a magic pass, but it's over in a matter of seconds. This time, I've been looking around the fun parade. Hehehehe

review: 실내와 실외 두 곳 모두 즐길 수 있기에 겨울이든 여름이든 항상 신난다 특히 스릴을 좋아한다면 아틀란티스 ㆍ 자이로스윙 ㆍ 자이로드롭 은 꼭 타보길 !!!
review_en: It's always exciting in winter or summer because you can enjoy both indoor and outdoor places, especially Atlantis, Gyro Swing, and Gyro Drop if you like thrills!

review: 초등학생 때부터 애용했던 롯데월드! 각종 통신사, 할인 받기가 용이하고 매직 패스를 이용하면 대기 시간 없이 탑승도 가능하다ㅎㅎ 머리띠도 넘 예쁘닷
review_en: I've been using Lotte World since I was in elementary school. It is easy to get discounts from various telecommunications companies, and you can get on board without waiting time by using Magic Pass.The headband is so pretty.

review: 초등학생 아이 둘과 엄마 둘의 롯데월드 방문기~♡ 방학이라 사람이 많긴 했지만 매직패스 덕분에 재밌는 놀이기구도 먼저 타 볼 수 있었어요~♡ 틈틈이 맛있는 군것질꺼리도 사 먹고 아이들끼리 재밌게 놀이기구도 탔답니다~♡
review_en: Two elementary school kids and two mothers visited Lotte World during vacation, so there were a lot of people, but thanks to Magic Pass, I was able to ride fun rides first.I bought delicious snacks and enjoyed rides with my children.~♡

review: 개장시간에 맞춰 일찍 왔더니 여유롭게 타고 즐기다 갑니다. 눈이 오는데도 아이는 눈이 와서 더 좋아라 하네요. 캐릭터들도 이쁘고 직원분께서 전체적으로 모두 친절합니다.
review_en: I came early in time for the opening, so I enjoyed the ride. Even though it's snowing, the child says it's better because it snows. The characters are pretty and the staff members are all kind.

review: 에*랜드만 가다가 겨울이라 초딩들 데리고 왔는데 애기들꺼 태우긴 너무 시시하고 다른건 줄도 너무 길고 태울것이 너무 없네요 실내엔 온통 유료결제로 가능한것만 있고 돈주고 들어왔는데 왜 안에서 또 유료입장을 해야하는지 ㅠ 너무 하네요.
review_en: I've only been to E*Land, and I brought some elementary school students in winter, but it's too boring to burn babies, and everything else is too long and there's nothing to burn. There are only paid payments available indoors, and I paid for it, but why do I have to pay inside again? That's so mean.

review: 포근한 날씨를 맞이하여 정겨운 사람과 함께 좋은 시스템에서 아름다운 풍경을 만끽하며 그리고 롯데를 사랑할 것 같아요. 러브 러브 러브 세상
review_en: In the warm weather, I think I will enjoy beautiful scenery in a good system with a friendly person and love Lotte. Love love love world

review: 다친 내 발은 그냥 무시하고서라도 우리 아이들의 얼굴에서 끊이지 않는 미소를 띄우게 하는 이 곳. 7시간째.. 그 이상을 여기에서 우리 셋은 잘 놀며 행복한 시간을 보내고 있다~ 다시 빠른 시간안에 다시 올 것을 기대하면서~~!! ^^♡
review_en: This place makes my injured feet smile endlessly on our children's faces, even if they ignore it. For seven hours... more than that, the three of us are having a great time here. Looking forward to coming back soon~!! ^^♡

review: 군대가기전에 칭구랑 와서 혼자 잘 놀다갑니당! 집에 일생겼다고 손절당함ㅜㅜ 다음뻔에 내옆자리에 누군가가 있기를... 다들 파이팅하자고
review_en: Before I joined the army, I came here with Ching Gu and had a good time alone. I was cut off because I was living in the house. Let's all cheer up.

review: 비가 와도 실내에서 맘껏 놀수 있어서 좋습니다. 날씨 구애받지 않고 놀수 있어서 좋지만 언제나 사람들로 붐벼서 눈치게임하면서 방문해야 하는게 가장큰 단점이네요
review_en: It's good to be able to play indoors even if it rains. It's nice to be able to play regardless of the weather, but it's always crowded with people, so the biggest drawback is to visit while playing timing games.

review: 돈 많이 내면 안기다리고 탈 수 있지만 보통은 15분마다 핸드폰 보느라 같이 온 사람과 대화조차 단절시키는 롯데월드 예전만못함. 직원들 불친절은 기본!^^ 음식 맛도 가성비 개똥망^^
review_en: If you pay a lot of money, you can not wait and ride it, but Lotte World is not as good as it used to be because you are looking at your cell phone every 15 minutes. Unkindness of employees is a given!^^ The taste of food is also cost-effective ^^^

review: 개꿀잼 ㄹㅇㅍㅌ ㅂㅂㅂㄱ ㄹㅇㅋㅋ 여친이랑 가끔오는데 매직패스 활용잘하면 개꿀로 즐길수있음 얏호크크크크크크크
review_en: I come here sometimes with my girlfriend and if you use magic pass well, you can enjoy it with honey.

review: 초1아들과 고3조카를 데리고 와서 신나게 놀다 가네요.. 무식해서 매직패스가 따로 구입하는걸로 생각해서..디즈니랜드. 유니버셜스튜디오처럼.. 저녁 6시에 어플깔고 알게된 사실.. 역시 멍충하면..으휴.. 암튼 대신 줄서는 신세의 하루였지만. 행복하고 즐거웠습니다.
review_en: I brought my 1st grade son and my 3rd year of high school and had a lot of fun. I'm ignorant, so I think I'm buying a magic pass separately.Disneyland. Like Universal Studios. I downloaded the app at 6 p.m. and found out... As expected, if you're stupid, well, it's been a long day in line instead of a day. I was happy and happy.

review: 혼자서 롯데월드에 놀러온것은 처음이에요^^. <매직패스>를 처음 사용해봤는데요. 타고 싶었던 놀이기구를 빨리 탈수 있어서 좋았어요^^.
review_en: It's my first time to visit Lotte World alone.^^. It's my first time using Magic Pass. It was nice to be able to ride the rides that I wanted to ride quickly.^^.

review: 줄은 줄대로 서고 매직패스는 학생들때문인지 예약조차할수없고 ㅠ ㅠ 12월30일이라 그런지 내년부터 연말은 피해야겟어요.!! ㅜㅜ 놀이기구 3번타니까 마감시간이네요
review_en: I have to stand in line, and I can't even make a reservation for Magic Pass because of students. Maybe because it's December 30th, I should avoid the end of the year from next year!! ᅮᅮᅮ It's the closing time because it's number 3 ride.

review: 진짜 오랜만에 찾은 롯데월드 에 신나고 부푼꿈꾸며 입장 과 동시에 헉ㅜㅜ 사람이 어마어마 하네요ㆍ 패쓰예약도 벌써 꽉 차고 놀이기구도 다 두시간ㅜㅜ 먹거리도 금방 없어져서 한참대기하고ㅜㅜ 평일에 다시 찾아서 즐기고싶네요.
review_en: As soon as I entered Lotte World in a long time, I was excited and dreamt about it. Wow. It's already full of pass reservations and rides for two hours. I'm waiting for a long time because my food disappeared quickly. I'd like to visit Lotte World again on weekdays.

review: 매직패스의 의미가 없다고 생각합니다 롯데에서 느껴지는 매직패스는 일찍온 사람에게만 주는 특혜 늦게 도착한 사람들은 매직패스를 전혀 사용할수가 없네요 애버랜드 벤치마킹좀 하시고 배웠으면 하는 마음이네요 실내라서 아이들 추위에 좀 괜찮다 이정도네요
review_en: I don't think magic passes mean anything. The magic pass that Lotte feels is given only to those who arrive early, and those who arrive late cannot use it at all. I'd like you to benchmark Everland and learn. It's indoor, so it's nice for kids' cold.

review: 외전 정말 재밌어요 강추~~ 다음에도 친구들이랑 놀러오려구요 새해맞이 여러분 모두 새해복많이 받으세요~~ 항상 건강하시고 근하신년입니다
review_en: I'm having a lot of fun with you. I strongly recommend~ I'm going to come visit with my friends next time. Happy New Year to all of you.Always be healthy and it is the year that is near.

review: 앱에 나오는 대기시간은 현장가면 최소 두배이상이고, 몇자리가 오픈되는지도 모르고 매직패스 예약을 위해 15분마다 앱을 켜고 시간에 맞춰 눌러보지만 예약은 커녕 순식간에 예약완료가 되는 기이한 현상을 두세번 경험하고 나면 다시는 오지 않겠다는 각오를 다지게 된다!!!!
review_en: The waiting time on the app is at least twice as long as you go to the site, and you turn on the app every 15 minutes to reserve a magic pass, and press it on time, but instead of making a reservation, you're determined not to come back again!!!!!!!!!

review: 사람이 많아요 각 어트랙션마다 예상 대기시간을 알 수 있게 입구에 표시가 되면 좋을 것같아요. 실내. 외로 나누어 진 부분은 마음에 듭니다^^
review_en: There are a lot of people. I think it would be good if it was marked at the entrance so that we can know the expected waiting time for each attraction. I like the room. I like the part that's shared alone.^^

review: 정말 즐거운 크리스마스 였습니다. 사람이 많치만 크리스마스공연과 탈것들 볼거리가 풍성한 롯데월드입니다! 8살 딸아이는 이번이 6번째 방문인데도 너무 좋았다고 합니다! 내년에 만나요
review_en: It was a very pleasant Christmas. It is Lotte World with a lot of people to see Christmas performances and rides! My 8-year-old daughter said she loved it even though it was her sixth visit! See you next year.

review: 정말 재미있고 정말 신나요!! 퍼레이드도 많이하고 행사도 많고 매직패스로 놀이기구를 많아 탈 수 있어서 좋은거 같아요!!또 먹을것도 많고 맛있어서 최고입니다!
review_en: It's really fun and exciting!! I think it's good to be able to ride a lot of parades, events, and magic passes!It's also the best because it has a lot to eat and is delicious!

review: 졸잼핵잼굿 사람많아서 아쉬웠지만 타고싶은거는 다탐 개꿀👍👍👍👍 다음에도 방문할예정😊😊😊😊
review_en: I was sad because there were so many people, but I want to go on a ride, so I'm going to visit next time.

review: 별 기대 없이 갔는데 한번쯤은 가서 동심의 세계로 돌아가보길 추천합니다. 실내 실외가 있어서 한 겨울 실내에 있으면 춥지도 않고 좋았어요. 주말엔 사람이 많아요!
review_en: I recommend that you go back to the world of childhood at least once when you went there without much expectation. It was nice to stay indoors in the middle of winter because of the outdoor environment. There are many people on weekends!

review: 아주 좋았습니다 ...... 너무 너무 너무 아이들도 많이 좋아했고 행복한 날 보냈습니다. 앞으로 자주 와야겠습니다. 다음 달에 예약 좀 .
review_en: It was great ...... so very very very very much loved the children and had a happy day. I'll have to come here more often from now. Can I make a reservation for next month?

review: 서울 시내에서 제일 가까운 놀이동산입니다. 지하철과 연결되어 있고 서울타워와 롯데월드몰, 백화점이 함께 있어 쇼핑하기에 좋습니다.
review_en: It's the closest amusement park in downtown Seoul. It is connected to the subway and has Seoul Tower, Lotte World Mall, and department store, so it is good for shopping.

review: 그들은 대단했다.. 꼭두새벽부터 각 기구별 예약부터 시작하여 인기 기구들의 탑승줄이 상당했다.. 롯데측의 마케팅은 성공인듯싶다.. 평일은 한산하겠지 하는 나의 생각은 어리석었다.. 3월까지는 자유를 즐겨라.. 새로 시작하는 청춘들이여..
review_en: They were great. Starting with reservations for each instrument in the early morning, the boarding lines of popular instruments were considerable. I think Lotte's marketing is a success. My idea of a quiet weekday was foolish. Enjoy your freedom until March. Young people who start anew...

review: 부모님 생신으로 저녁식사후 가족 단체 방문했습니다. 야간개장으로 들어와서 즐거운 시간 보내고 갑니다. 너무 즐겁네요 ㅎㅎ
review_en: I visited a family group after dinner for my parents' birthday. I came in at night and had a great time. I'm having so much fun. Haha

review: 사람이 완전 많았지만 즐거웠던 하루~~~ 크리스마스 분위기 느끼고갑니다~~~^^ 작은딸이 키가 안되서 못한 기구들 1cm커서 다시 올께요~~^^
review_en: There were so many people, but I had a great day~~~~~ I feel the Christmas atmosphere~I will come back 1cm taller than my little daughter because she is not tall.~~^^

review: 굳ㅓㅏ아ㅡㅏ라이이이가르ㅏ리이다으ㅏ래아더우라에ㅣ랄라라리리ㅏ라라가가서거거거갸갸랴겨영7겨갸갹거각ㄱ
review_en: Aghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.

review: 학생들이 흡연실에 들어오는게 제지도 없음 관리자분들은 삼가한다는 말보다는 다른 문구를 달아서 흡연 안하도록 하는게 맞지않을까요 어른들도 많은데 관리를 너무소홀히 하시네요
review_en: Wouldn't it be better for managers to put a different phrase on it so that they don't smoke? There's a lot of adults here, but you're taking care of them.

review: 애들데리고 2년만에와서 이제 애들이 제한적으로나마 무언가를 탈수있어 시도했는데 매직패스 예약하기가 소셜쿠폰 다운만큼 힘드네요...죄다 예약마감에...결구 그냥 타는게 속편함...
review_en: It's been 2 years since I've been here with them, so I tried to get a limited number of rides, but it's as hard to book a magic pass as a social coupon download.All at the end of the booking...It's easy to just ride.

review: 몇일전에 좀비랜드였을때 갔다가 너무 늦게가서 놀이기구 하나도 못탈듯하여 고객센터가서 환불요청햇으나 안된다고 하여 고객센터 언니께서 내년3월안에오시면바로입장가능한 티켓으로다시 해주신다고 하셔서 그렇게하고나서 몇일후 오늘갔는데 오늘사람도 없고 타고싶은 놀이기구신나게 타고갑니다~ 손톱 화려한고객님이라고 기억해주셔서 감사해용 너무 신나게 놀고 갑니다
review_en: A few days ago, when I was in Zombie Land, I went too late to get on any rides, so I asked the customer center for a refund, but the customer center unni said that if you come in March next year, they will give you a ticket that you can enter right away, so I went a few days later today, but today, there was no one to ride. Thank you for remembering me as a fancy nail customer. I'm having so much fun.

review: 조금만 더 밝게 신나게 해주시면 좋겠어요~ 에버랜드에 비해서 너무 어두워요 ㅠ 그냥 하나도 신나지 않고 그냥 안전만 확인하기 위해 있는 것 같았어요
review_en: I hope you can make it brighter and more exciting~ Compared to Everland, it's too dark. I just felt like I was just checking for safety without any excitement.

review: 할로윈이 끝난지 일주일이 지났는데 아직도 이를 우려먹느라 고객들의 흐름을 방해하고 시야를 막았습니다. 또한 매직아일랜드에서도 퍼레이드를 하는데 한시간 가까이 흐름을 통제했습니다. 통제시간이 지나치게 길었고 정작 뛰어다니는 청소년들은 통제하지 않아 안전요원의 지시를 잘 지킨 사람들이 오히려 손해를 보고 불편을 겪었습니다. 무질서하게 뛰어다니는 어떤 학생으로인해 저의 휴대폰이 부딪쳐 떨어졌고, 안전요원 누구도 도와주지 않았습니다.마치 질서에 순응하는 사람만 통제하고 무질서는 못 본 척하는 듯
review_en: It's been a week since Halloween, and I've still been eating it, disrupting the flow of customers and blocking their view. We also controlled the flow for nearly an hour in the Magic Island parade. The control time was too long and the teenagers who were actually running around were not controlled, so those who followed the safety guard's instructions suffered losses and were inconvenienced. A student running around in disorder hit my cell phone, and no safety guards helped me.It's as if he's controlling only those who conform to order, and pretending not to see disorder.

review: 한개당 2시간반 기본임. 오면 그냥 근손실 쌉오지는 부분임. 기다리는게 취미면 개꿀띠임. 아니면 그냥 분장하고 돌아댕기는애들이랑 어깨빵만 하다가 오는거임 ㅇㅋ?
review_en: 2 hours and a half per piece is basic. It's just a bit of muscle loss when you know. If waiting is your hobby, you're born in the Year of the Dog. Or are you just going to dress up and come back with a bunch of crazy guys?

review: 할로윈 파티 사랑하는 딸이 한달을 기다리고기다려서 간 롯데월드~~재밌었고 멋진 추억을 만들어주고왔네요~~다음엔 아침 일찍 가자고 딸과의 다시한번 약속~~
review_en: My daughter who loves Halloween party waited for a month and went to Lotte World. It was fun and made great memories.Next time, let's go early in the morning. Promise me to go again with my daughter.

review: 아이들과 함께 롯데월드 왔어요 신비 아파트 공연과 미션수행하는 곳이 있어서 아이들이 너무 좋아했어요 오랜만에 오긴 했는데 올때마다 뭔가 이벤트가 있는것 같아 너무 좋습니다
review_en: I came to Lotte World with my children. SinB had an apartment performance and a place to carry out missions. They loved it. It's been a long time since I came here, but I feel like there is an event every time I come here, so

review: 롯데월드는 어드벤처와 민속박물관이 있어서 부모세대와 어린이 세대가 함께 즐길 수 있는 것 같네요. 가족 동반으로 추천합니다.
review_en: Lotte World has an adventure and a folk museum, so parents and children can enjoy it together. I recommend it with my family.

review: 어렸을 적에 일년에 최소 두번은 가던 곳인데, 이젠 성인이되어 조카와 함께 다녀왔네요^^ 퍼레이드 보는걸 너무 좋아해서 내내 보고 사진찍고, 놀이기구 타다보면 시간이 금방~간답니다^^ 어린이가 있는 집이라면 꼭 가야할 필수코스임 ㅋㅋ
review_en: I used to go there at least twice a year when I was a kid, but now I'm an adult and I've been there with my nephew. 좋아 퍼레이 I love watching parades so much that time goes by so quickly when I see them all the time, take pictures, and ride the rides.It is a must-go course for a house with children.

review: 왜 어플로 예약을 받아서는 놀이기구도 못타게 합니까. 예약이 되야 타죠... 이건 타지 말라는건가여?? 왜 입장료 팔아요??? 놀이기구 구경값입니까?
review_en: Why don't you let me ride the rides if I get a reservation through an app? I have to make a reservation to get on... You're telling me not to ride this? Why do you sell the entrance fee? Is it the price of a ride?

review: 사람 구경만 해도 재밌다. 하지만 실내는 소리가 울려서 매우 시끄러우니 주의! 내부에 맛집도 많고 실내/외에 재밌는 놀이기구도 많다. 날씨가 좋지 않을때는 에버랜드보다 롯데월드를 추천!
review_en: Just looking at people is fun. But be careful that the room is very noisy because of the sound! There are many good restaurants inside and many fun rides inside and outside. When the weather is not good, I recommend Lotte World over Everland!

review: 직원인가알바인가 겁나 불친절ㅡㅡ 빡칠뻔함 어린새끼들은 교육좀시켜주세요 불친절해서 짜증나니까 아시겠죠? 똑바로좀
review_en: Employee or part-time worker, incredibly unfriendly-- almost pissed off. Please train the little ones. It's annoying to be unkind, okay? Straighten up, please.

review: 카카오페이 이벤트까지 겹쳐서 그런지, 사람이 엄청많네여. 학생들도 많고 ... 기다리다가 욕나오는줄 알앗네요. 180분 대기가 말이 되나욬 어드렉션 3분 타려고 3시간 기다리라구요? 롯데는 역시 걸러야...
review_en: Maybe because of the Kakao Pay event, there are a lot of people. There are a lot of students... I thought I was cursing while waiting. You want me to wait for 180 minutes and wait for 3 hours for the three-minute address? Lotte must be filtered...

review: 친구들이랑 같이 놀기도 좋고 추억 남기기도 좋았습니다 하지만 매직패스 다실패하고😥줄이 노무 길었습니다 친구들과 따로 20일 뒤에 지하철타고 롯데월드 한번 더 가볼 려고 합니다❗️ 놀이기구,간식,먹는거 등 다 좋았습니다💗
review_en: It was good to play with friends and make memories. But the Magic Pass was multiple failures and the line was long. I'm going to go to Lotte World again by subway after 20 days.I liked all the rides, snacks, and eating.💗

review: 가족들과 함께 즐거운 시간을 보낼 수 있는 곳 입니다 주말에는 많은 사람들로 혼잡합니다 차량 보다는 대중교통을 이용하시는게 좋습니다
review_en: It is a place where you can have fun with your family. It's crowded on weekends. It's better to use public transportation than a car.

review: 오늘 다녀왔는데 엘포인트 적립은 물어보시고 연간회원권 3배적립은 말 안하시더라구요 어디는 적립을 아예 안물어보는곳도 있구요 오늘와서 20만원정도 쓴거 같은데 처음엔 몰라서 적립못한곳도 있네요
review_en: I was there today, and he asked me about saving L-Point, and he didn't tell me about triple the annual membership. Some places don't ask for any points, and I think I spent about 200,000 won today, but some places I didn't know at first.

review: 다른 식당도 그렇지만 밖에서 식사못하게 가두리해놓았으면 최소한의 수준은 유지해야 하는데, 특히 2층 꽁시면관은 정말 최악중의 최악입니다. 해물짬뽕은 가격이 9500원인데 해물이라고는 딸랑 새우1개, 홍합은 손톱만한것 2개 속이 빈 껍질만 1개, 나머지는 양파만 면발은 얘기할 수준이 아니구요 반찬은 셀프인데, 양파 춘장도 없는 단무지만 ᆢ 이게 정말 중국집인가요? 내국인은 그렇다 치고 외국 관광객들 보기가 민망한 수준이네요 아마 롯데월드내 명당자리에 입점하여 줄서서 들어오니 이 모양인데
review_en: As with other restaurants, if they're locked up outside, the minimum level should be maintained, especially the double-decker Ggongmyeon Pavilion is the worst of the worst. Seafood jjamppong is 9,500 won, but seafood is one shrimp, mussel is the size of a nail, two hollow shells, and the rest is not enough to talk about onion noodles. The side dishes are self-made, but pickled radish without onion and chunjang. Is this really a Chinese restaurant? It's embarrassing for Koreans to see foreign tourists. It looks like this when you enter Lotte World in a row.

review: 사람이 많아서 잘타지는 못했지만 롯데월드는 언제나재미있는 곳이다. 다음에는 친구랑 또 와서 꼭 매직패스를 끊어보고싶다ㅎ
review_en: Lotte World is always a fun place even though there are many people. Next time, I want to come back with my friend again and cut the magic pass.Hah!

review: 내년 이맘때 또올께요 울산에서 오느라 힘들었어요ㅠㅠ 비록 눈치게임 실패했지만 내년엔 성공하길 바라며🙏🙏🙏
review_en: I'll be back this time next year. I had a hard time coming from Ulsan.Although I failed timing game, I hope I can succeed next year.

review: 오늘 사람 많을줄 알고 조마조마했는데 사람도 많은 편은 아니었던거 같구 계획도 잘세워서 친구들이랑 타고싶은거 보고싶은거 다 하고 왔어요!!!너무 행복한 하루였어요!! 특히 좀비 언닝 ㅗ빠들 너므 멋지고 생생했어요!!
review_en: I was nervous because I thought there would be a lot of people today, but I don't think there were a lot of people. I made good plans and did everything I wanted to ride with my friends!!!It was a very happy day!! Especially the zombies uningers. You were so cool and vivid!!

review: 서울에있는 놀이공원. 지하철과 버스가 엄청 많이 다니기에 접근성이 좋은곳. 많은 사람이 몰리는 곳. 어플로 놀이기구 예약이 가능하지만 항상 실패를 맛보게되죠.
review_en: an amusement park in Seoul It has good accessibility because there are so many subways and buses. A place where many people. You can book rides on the app, but you always fail.

review: 신밧드의모험 내부 직원은 싸갈쓰바갈쓰 돈내고 들어가도 어플예약은 모두 꽉차서 놀이기구 겨우겨우 한개타... 어플예약제 폐지해라 나이 많은 분들은 애기까지 데리고 어플 이용하라는거냐 박동기야 롯데월드 말아먹지말고 탁상공론 하지말고 직원들 말듣고 회사운영해라
review_en: The internal staff of Sinbad's Adventure pays for the Sagalsu Bagalsu, but the reservation for the application is full, so I can barely get a ride... Abolish the application reservation system. Are you saying that older people should use the app with their babies? Park Dong-ki, don't mess with Lotte World. Don't discuss desk and listen to the employees and run the company.

review: 9월 24일 오후 3시경 4살 아들과 스윙팡팡을 타던 도중 갑자기 운행중 멈췄다가 다시 출발하며 아이의 좌측 눈썹 부위가 손잡이에 부딫치는 사고가 발생함. 스윙팡팡은 안전벨트도 없이 컵 안에 유아가 탑승하며 공중에서 팡팡 튀면서 도는 놀이기구라 아무리 성인이 타는 것처럼 빠르지 않더라도 갑자기 멈출 경우 충분히 충격을 받을 수 있었음. 사고 직후 직원은 안전상의 문제가 없다는 안내방송을 하였으나 이미 기구가 멈추는 사고가 발생하고 아이의 얼굴에는 상처가 생겼는데 과연 안전상의 문제가 없다는
review_en: At around 3 p.m. on September 24, while riding a swing-pang with his 4-year-old son, he suddenly stopped while driving and started again, causing the child's left eyebrow to crash into the handle. Swing-pang-pang is a ride in which an infant rides in a cup without a seat belt and swings around in the air, so no matter how fast an adult rides, he could be shocked enough if he suddenly stops. Immediately after the accident, the staff informed us that there were no safety issues, but the device had already stopped, and the child's face had a scar, but there was no safety issue.

review: 매직 패스 3개가 주어지는데, 사실상 사용이 불가능함. 수강신청으로 광클좀 해본 사람도 정각 15분 단위로 예약받는 놀이기구들 광클해도 0.001초만에 예약마감되서 아침 9반부터 저녁 8시까지 한번도 매직패스는 못쓰고 나옴.
review_en: Three magic passes are given, but they are virtually unavailable. Even those who have applied for classes can't use magic passes from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. because the reservation was closed in 0.001 seconds.

review: 선선한 가을이 왔어용~~ 더운날 지나고 초딩아이랑 가뿐히 불금 즐기러 왔어요~♡♡ 신나게 놀겠어요 오늘 날씨가 너무 좋아서 그런지 너무 좋더라구요
review_en: The cool autumn is here~~~ After the hot day, I came to enjoy the Friday night with my elementary school kid~You're gonna have a lot of fun. Maybe it's because the weather is so nice today.

review: 신용카드 프로모션 등 할인받아서 가면 키카 가격으로 가서 온종일 놀수있으니 가성비 좋아요! 롯데월드 어플 받아서 대기시간 확인하면서 대기예약도 걸어놓을수있구요. 성인 놀이기구는 대기 길긴하지만 못내긴하지만 아이들껀 대기시간 별로 없이 이용할게 많아서 하루 날잡고 온 종일 놀다오기 좋아요 퍼레이드도 아이들이 좋아하구요!
review_en: If you get a discount such as credit card promotion, you can go to the price of a kika and play all day, so the cost-effectiveness is good! You can get the Lotte World app and make a reservation while checking the waiting time. Adult rides are long waiting, but they don't have much waiting time, so it's good to play all day. Children love parades!

review: 우리나라 놀이공원을 여기저기 가봣지만 역시 최고는 롯데월드인것 같아요. 다양한 탈 거리고 있고 스릴을 즐기기 좋은 곳이에요
review_en: I've been to many amusement parks in Korea, but I think Lotte World is the best. It's a great place to enjoy thrills and various rides.

review: 오늘 아침 10시에 와서 밤 10시까지 꼬박 12시간을 있었는데도 지치지도 않고 집에 가는 걸 아쉬워 하네요 ㅋㅋ 내년에는 키 많이 커서 오늘 못 타본거 꼭 다 타보고 싶어요~!!
review_en: I was here at 10:00 this morning for 12 full hours, and I'm sorry I didn't get tired. I want to ride all the rides that I haven't been able to ride since I grew a lot next year!

review: 모바일티켓과 매직패스를 이용하면 빠르게 이용할수 있습니다. 아니면 표사는 시간부터 너무 오래 걸려요. 아침에 입장하자마자 매직패스로 죽 예약하면 편하게 이용할수 있습니다.
review_en: You can use mobile tickets and Magic Pass quickly. Or it takes too long to get rid of. As soon as you enter in the morning, you can use the magic pass to reserve porridge.

review: 연간회원권구매로 아이와 함께 올 수 있어 좋아요~ 아이가 너무 즐거워하고 비가 오나 눈이 와도 올 수 있는 즐거운 곳~ 롯데월드~
review_en: It's good to be able to come with your child with the annual membership purchase~ She's having so much fun. Whether it's raining or snowing. Lotte World.

review: 끼어들기 알림글이 있음에도 사람들이 지키지 않는거 같네요. 직원분들께서 안내나 방송같은것을 수신ㄷ 하는게 어떨까 하는 생각입니다.
review_en: People don't seem to keep up with the interrupting messages. I think it would be better for the staff to receive announcements and broadcasts.

review: 레버가 약간 내려져있는데 왜 먼저내렷냐면서 시비조로 말거네여^^ 오전 10시45분가량에 탑승했습니다 기분잡쳤네요 롯데월드의 대표 놀이기구인데 서비스직인 아르바이트생이 왜저러나요?
review_en: The lever is a little down, but I'm going to argue why you got off first. I got on at 10:45 a.m. I felt bad. What's wrong with a part-timer who works as a service when he's the representative ride of Lotte World?

review: 일단 롯데월드를 한 번도 못가봐서 너무 기대하고 가보고싶었는데 가보니 환상이더라고요 ❤️ 예쁜 풍경은 물론 , 여러 기념품과 어느곳과 비교못할 놀이기구들이 모여있는 곳이 있구나 싶었어요 >< 제게 처음 친구들과 가본 롯데월드는 환상 그 이상으로 너무 만족했어요 !! 먹거리도 많아서 좋았구요 ㅎㅎ 하지만 자이언트로프 ? ( 실내에 360도 도는 놀이기구 ) 는 입구를 찾기어려웠어요ㅜㅜㅜ그리고 귀신에 집에서 너무 깜깜해서 길을 한 번 휘청거리며 잃었습니다 ㅎㅎ 그리고 운휴 시설에는 없던
review_en: First of all, I've never been to Lotte World, so I wanted to look forward to it, but when I went there, it was a fantasy. Not to mention the beautiful scenery, there were many souvenirs and rides that could not be compared to anywhere else. Lotte World, which I went with my friends for the first time, was more than a fantasy! It was good because there was a lot of food, but the Giantrop? was hard to find the entrance.ᅮᅮ그리고그리고And it was so dark at home because of the ghost that I stumbled and lost. And it wasn't in the transportation facility.

review_en: It's the worst Bumper Alba personality around 6:00. I left my friend in a line, and I was in a hurry to go to the bathroom, but when I got back, I didn't see him coming in, so I cut off the entrance and let him come out.

review: 평일인데도 불구하고 방학이라 그런지 매직패쓰 이용해도 기본 20분은 기다려야돼고 인기있는건 매직패쓰 예약도 안돼고 와우 힘듬;; 간식도 기다림 화장실도 기다림 다 기다림의 연속 매직패쓰 프리미엄 가격이 좀만 저렴했음 아이와 함께오는 가족이라면 당장구입했을듯 진짜 다시오기는 힘들듯
review_en: Even though it's a weekday, I have to wait 20 minutes even if I use magic pass, and I can't even reserve magic pass for popular ones. Wow. It's hard for me to wait for snacks and bathrooms. The premium price of continuous magic pass is a little cheaper. If you're a family that comes with a child, you'll have to buy it right away.

review: 최악의매직패스 손가락이늙어서경쟁도안됨 최악입니다.. 생일로할인받고왔는데놀이기구2개도못타는데 ㅎㅎㅎㅎ 돈이아깝네요다시는오고싶지않아요 직원들도불친절하구요
review_en: Worst Magic Pass. Old finger, no competition. Worst. I got a birthday discount, but I can't even ride two rides. That's a waste of money.I don't want to come back. The staff is unkind.

review: 어릴 땐 매년 가도 가도 또 가고 싶었는데 부지 넓은 에버랜드에 비해 너무 좁고 혜성특급 같은 낡은 놀이기구는 변화도 없고..몇몇은 그대로여서 깜짝 놀랐음. 유니버설이나 디즈니랜드를 경험해서인지 롯데월드가 너무 유치하게 보였음 ㅠㅠ조금 분발해야할 듯. 적어도 에버랜드만큼이라도..ㅠㅠ뭔가 촌스러움
review_en: When I was young, I wanted to go there every year, but compared to Everland, which has a large site, it's too small and there's no change in old rides like Comet Express.Some were surprised to see that they were the same. I think Lotte World looked too childish because I experienced Universal or Disneyland. I think I should try harder. At least as much as Everland.something tacky

review: 패스권 광클시작도 전에 마감ㅋㅋㅋ 이딴식으로 장사하나 올곳이 못된다 다시는 안올듯하다 으휴 화가난다 연차쓰고 시간쓰고 줄만서기 평일인데 하..
review_en: I'm so angry that I'm not coming back. It's a weekday after spending my annual leave and standing in line.

review: 친구들이랑 가기 짱 쥬아여ㅜ 일년에 8번은 가는것같은데 항상 꿀잼입니다ㅜㅜ 롯데월드 사랑해요ㅜ 진짜 맨날 가고싶을정도로 짱임니다ㅜ
review_en: Going with my friends is the best. I think I go there 8 times a year, but it's always fun.ᅮᅮᅮ I love Lotte World월드 It's so great that I really want to go all the time.ᅮ

review: 물품보관때문에 약50분을 놀이기구 이용도 못하고 돌아다님. 결국은 지하철역앞에서..맞기고 흠..참고바람에서 여행와서 맡길 물건있을때 참고바람

review: 특히 일요일 오후에 야간이 참 한적하고 좋은 것 같습니다. 최근 프리미엄 큐패스가 생겨서 5개 정도는 줄 서지 않고 탈 수 있다는 점이 상당히 매력적인 것 같습니다. 아이들과 함께 하는 가족에게 적극 추천합니다.
review_en: Especially on Sunday afternoon, the night is very quiet and nice. I think it's very attractive that I can ride about five of them without waiting in line due to the recent premium pass. I highly recommend it to my family with my children.

review: 연간회원권 끊고처음으로왔다. 아이들과여유롭고재미나게놀다간다.주말에또와서어드벤쳐어서 놀아야지^^연간회원권이어서 여유롭게놀수있어좋다.
review_en: I came here for the first time after I quit my annual membership. I have a relaxing and fun time with my children.I'm going to play Adventure again this weekend.It's good to be able to have a leisurely time because it's an annual membership.

review: 가끔 이벤트할때 저렴하게 놀 수 있어서 좋아요. 놀이기구를 잘 못타는데 제가 탈 수 있는 것들이 많아서 더 좋구요. 날씨좋을때 매직 아일랜드도 참 좋구요.
review_en: I like it because I can play cheaply at events sometimes. I'm not good at rides, but I like it more because there are many things I can ride. Magic Island is nice when the weather is nice.

review: 롯데월드 갈 때마다 사람이 매우 많아서 대기시간이 길어서 힘들기는 하지만, 휴일을 보내기 좋습니다. 직원들이 친절합니다.
review_en: It's hard because there are so many people every time I go to Lotte World, but it's good to spend a holiday. The employees are kind.

review: 제가 오늘 롯데월드를 다녀왔는데 안전상태도 너무 좋고,스릴 만점이었어요. 한가지 아쉽지만 후룸라이드를 타고 싶었는데 탈수 없어서 진짜 아쉬웠습니다. 매직패스를 이용해 누구보다 빠르게 탑승해서 10개가 넘는 기구를 탔습니다. 앞으로도 많아 방문할께요!!
review_en: I went to Lotte World today and the safety was so good, and I got a perfect score. One thing is unfortunate, but I wanted to ride a flume ride, but I was really sad that I couldn't. I rode the magic pass faster than anyone and rode more than 10 rides. I'll visit you more often in the future!

review: 고설아라는 직원누나가 너무 예뻐요 진짜로 너무 예뻐서 계속 쳐다보게됬어요 나중에 롯데월드 또 가면 만나보고싶네요ㅎ

review: 사람이 많이 하나타려면 1시간은 기본... 매직패스없으면 놀이기구는 못 타는구나... 이런거보안하라고 매직패스 만든게 아닌가요? 에버랜드처럼 놀이기구마다 등급으로 깎던가...
review_en: An hour is a standard ride for a lot of people. You can't go on a ride without a magic pass... Didn't you create a magic pass to secure this? Like Everland, you can grade every ride...

review: 아이들에게.뜻깊게 민속놀이도 보여주고 참여할수있는 시간을 갖을수있어서 참 뜻깊었습니다. 일하시는분들도 친절하시고 비가와서 아쉬웠습니다.
review_en: It was very meaningful to show folk games to children and participate in it. The people who worked were also kind and it was a shame that it rained.

review: 추운데 아일랜드에서 고생한신분들과 어드벤처에서 친절하게 해주신 분들 덕분에 즐겁게 놀고 갑니다 감사합니다 아이들이 너무 좋아하네요

review: 서울 도시 내에 있는 어드벤쳐. 놀이기구도 재미있고, 먹거리 구경거리도 가득합니다. 특히 잠실에 오셨으면 롯데타워도 구경하고가세요

review: 5살, 9살 되는 아이들 재밌게 잘 놀았어요~ 오전 일찍 들어가야 인기있는 기구들 좀 타고 놀수 있구요. 주말이나 방학기간에는 대기시간이 긴게 아쉬워요...

review: 오랜만에 갔는데 매직패스 너무 좋고 자이로 시리즈 재밌고 (다만 자이로드롭 강풍대기라 아쉬움) 너무 좋았다. 다만, 사람이 좀 많아서 대기 시간이 길어서 좀 아쉬웠다. 그래도 재밌었음
review_en: It's been a long time since I've been there, but I really liked the Magic Pass and the Gyro series. However, it was a bit disappointing because there were a lot of people waiting. But it was fun.

review: 친구와함께 여행을 왔따. 뭐가 뭔지 몰라 당황스러웠다. 많이 걸었더니 힘글다 눈치싸움실패해서 너무 많이 걸었다 슬프다 다음엔 패스를 미리 알아두어야 겠다
review_en: I came on a trip with my friend. I was embarrassed because I didn't know what was what. I walked too much because I was so tired. I failed to walk too much. I'm sad. Next time, I'll know the pass.

review: 오랜만에 롯데월드릉 갔는데 너무너무 재밋었어요. 생각보다 엄청 재미나게 놀다가 왓어요. 평일 낮에 가면 사람들 없이 여유롭게 줄 서서 놀수 잇으니까 평일 낮에 가세요
review_en: I went to Lotte World after a long time and it was so much fun. I had a lot of fun. If you go in the daytime on weekdays, you can line up and play without people, so go during the daytime on weekdays.

review: 소셜로 구매해서 정말저렴하게 다녀왔어요~~ 시설도 좋고 역시 롯데월드^^ 남자친구랑 너무재미있게 놀다왔습니다. 좋은추억 감사합니다.
review_en: I bought it on social media and went there really cheap.Yo~~ The facilities are nice and I had so much fun with my boyfriend. Thank you for the good memories.

review: 신년 맞이로 롯데월드에 간만에 친구랑 놀러왔어요. 날씨는 조금 춥지만 즐겁고 재미있게 놀아서 기분 좋네요. 어릴때 오고나서 그 이후로 처음오는건데 추억이 새록새록 떠올라서 너무 행복했습니다. 앞으로도 많이 변하지 않고 발전했으면 좋겠네요. 해피뉴이어
review_en: I came to Lotte World with my friend for the first time in a while to celebrate the New Year. It's a little cold, but I'm happy to have fun. It was my first time coming here since I was young, and I was so happy because it reminded me of my memories. I hope that we will continue to develop without much change. Happy New Year

review: 사람많은것만빼면아주최고의 놀이공원 월요일 목을등 평일날 오면 제일좋다 완전 꿀잼 료즘 바람이 많이 불어서 않으하는 게 많긴해도 좋다
review_en: Except for the crowded places, the best amusement park on Mondays and Thursdays is the best if you come here on weekdays. It's so fun. It's windy, so there's a lot of things you don't do.

review: 올때마다 어디든 줄 밖에 없고 매직패스는 그냥 돈 더 벌고싶어서 만든게 너무 티 날 정도로 매직패스는 다 예약 마감이라고 해버리고 막상 가 보면 매직패스 줄은 정말 없어요. 차라리 그냥 입장료를 10만원 인상하던지 인원제한을 하던지 아무도 제대로 즐기지도 못하는 놀이공원은 왜 만든거? 놀이기구가 30%이상이 점검중이고 닫혀잇는데 입장료는 똑같은 롯데월드 ㅎㅎ
review_en: Every time I come here, there's only a line. Magic passes are so obvious that I wanted to make more money. They say it's all booked up. But there's really no magic pass line. Why did you build an amusement park where no one can enjoy it properly, whether it's just a 100,000 won increase in entrance fees or a limit on the number of people? More than 30% of the rides are being inspected and closed, but the admission fee is the same.

review: 사람이 많을 꺼라 예상 했지만 매직패스를 이용해서 한시간 간격으로 유료시설과 자유이용권으로 이용하는 시설을 섞어서 이용하였더니 크게 불편하진 않았습니다. 다만 날이 추워서 매직아일랜드는 사진만 찍고 나와야 했구요. 롯데월드어드벤쳐 결혼하고 처음 갔는데, 많이 달라져서 시간 가는 줄 몰랐습니다. 아기가 조금 더 어렸다면 로티스 엠포리움에서 드레스 빌려서 퍼레이드에 나가 댄스 페스티벌참가 하는 것도 좋은 추억이 되었을 듯 합니다.
review_en: I expected that there would be a lot of people, but I used magic passes to mix paid facilities and free pass facilities every hour, so it wasn't too inconvenient. But the weather was cold, so I had to take only pictures in Magic Island. It was my first time going to Lotte World Adventure after getting married, but I didn't know time was passing because it changed a lot. If the baby was a little younger, it would have been a good memory to borrow a dress from the Rotis Emporium and go out to the parade to participate in the dance festival.

review: 겨울엔 롯데월드 만한 곳이 없는 것 같네요 밖은 춥기도 하고 미세먼지도 심해서 롯데월드 종종 오는데 하루 종일 놀아도 지루해 하지 않네요 가족 단위로 오기 정말 좋아요
review_en: I don't think there's a place like Lotte World in winter. I often come to Lotte World because it's cold outside and the fine dust is severe, but I don't get bored even if I play all day long. It's great to come by family.

review: 정기점검중 어트랙션이 많음. 그 이유일지 몰라도 대부분 1시간 이상 기다려야함. 매직패스로 되는게 없음 모하러 만들었는지 모르겠음
review_en: A lot of traction during regular inspection. That may be the reason, but most people have to wait for more than an hour. Nothing works with magic passes. I don't know why you made it.

review: 타 놀이시설은 외부에 있지만 롯데월드는 실내와 실외 두군데로 운영하며 겨울에 실내만 이용해도 괜찮고 주변 아케이드 또한 실내로 연결되어 있어 편하다.
review_en: Other amusement facilities are located outside, but Lotte World operates in two places, indoor and outdoor, so it is convenient to use indoor arcades in winter.

review: 입장 부터 불친절하더니 입장관리하시는직원들까지 힘든건알겠지만 웃음기가 없네요ㅡㅡ 타놀이공원이랑 비교가 너무되네요
review_en: I know it's hard for the staff to manage the entrance, but it's not funny.That's too much of a comparison to Tanyol Park.

review: 매직패스아무리해도 예약거의불가능.. 대기는 최소 1시간이상.. 외로울땨..사람구경하러오면좋늘듯.. 식당도 엉망..놀이기구도 구경만.. 연말나들이 폭망...ㅠㅠ
review_en: Magic pass is impossible to make a reservation. Waiting for at least an hour. lonesome... it would be nice to come to see people. The restaurant's a mess.I'm just looking at the rides. The end of the year...ᅲᅲ

review: 라이드가 대부분 유니버셜 스튜디오에 비해서 스토리가단순한 편이다. 피라오의 분노도 오래 기다렸지만 별로이다. 재미있는 캐릭터를 이용한 좀 더 다양한 전개가 있었으면 좋겠다.
review_en: Ride has a simpler story than most Universal Studios. Pirao's anger has been waiting for a long time, but it's not good. I hope there will be more diverse developments using interesting characters.

review: 혹한대기라면서...회전그네는 해놓고...아틀란티스랑., 자이로드롭이랑...열어주지도 않고...우리 퇴장하니까.. 열려있는데...노리신건가요...
review_en: You said it was freezing.You're gonna swing and then...Atlantis, Gyro Drop...They don't even open it.We're leaving, so... It's open...Are you trying to...

review: 잠실역과 연결되어 있어 교통편이 좋으며 실내실외 놀이공원이 모두 있어 날씨에 크게 영향을 받지 않고 즐길 수 있어서 좋은 롯데월드~ 놀이기구도 재미있고 퍼레이드도 재미있는 곳!
review_en: It's connected to Jamsil Station, so it's convenient for transportation and there are all indoor and outdoor amusement parks, so you can enjoy it without being affected by the weather. Lotte World. The rides are fun and the parades are fun!

review: 너무 재밌었다 야외 운영을 많이 해서 더 그런 거 같다. 후룸라이드 운영이 안 되어서 좀 아쉽기도 했는데 다음에 왔을 땐 했으면 좋겠다
review_en: It was so much fun. I think it's because we had a lot of outdoor operations. I was a little sad that the Flume Ride didn't work, but I hope we can do it the next time we come back.

review: 줄이 길고 사람도 많고 음식은 비싸고 맛은 별로 그럼에도불구하고 애들은 즐거움 날씨에 영향 받지않고 잘 놀 수 있음 휴일방문 절대 금지
review_en: The line is long, there are many people, the food is expensive, and the taste is not that great, but children can play well without being affected by the pleasant weather. Never visit during holidays.

review: 펑일, 주말 모두 사람이 엄청 많아요. 평일 낮에 방문하면 덜 복잡한 편입니다. 롯데월드에 아쿠아리움도 있어서 아이들과 커플과 또 가족들과 함께 보러 가면 좋을 것 같아요! 그리고 지하 1층에도 맛집들이 많이 있지만 레스토랑 층이 따로잇어서 선택의 기로가 많답니다!
review_en: There are a lot of people on the weekends. If you visit during the daytime on weekdays, it's less complicated. There is an aquarium in Lotte World, so it would be nice to go see it with children, couples, and family! And there are many good restaurants on the basement floor, but there are many different floors of restaurants, so there are many choices!

review: 최악이었어요. 아람단에서 왔었는데 폭설대기때문에 아트란티스못타서 아쉬웠어요. 갑자기 왜 눈이오고 ㅈㄹ일까요.. 짜증나네요.
review_en: It was the worst. I came from Aramdan, but it was too bad that I couldn't get on the Atlantis because of the heavy snow. Why is it snowing all of a sudden? It's annoying.

review: 평일에오니까사람도별로 옶고 ㅎ케성특급 줄짱짧아서 너무조앗어요 @@ 날씨도 별로춥지않고 11시쯤에들어오면 너무좋은거같아요
review_en: As I came on weekdays, I met different people and it was so tight because the line was so short. The weather is not that cold and I think it would be nice to come back around 11 o'clock.

review: 11월4일 할로윈 마직막날이라 가서 재밌게 놀았어요. 물론 사람이 너무 많아 이동하기도 힘들었지만 좀비분장한 사람도 많고 저녁에는 쇼도 하고 재밌었어요
review_en: November 4th was the last day of Halloween, so I had fun. Of course, it was hard to move because there were so many people, but there were a lot of people dressed up as zombies and we had a show in the evening. It was fun

review: 대기 시간이 쫌 있었으나. 매직패스를 잘 이용해서 시간절약했어요. 잠실 롯데월드는 매직패스를 꼭 이용해서 미리 이용하세요. 일요일 가족들과 이용시에는 더욱 더.
review_en: There was some waiting time. I saved time by using magic pass well. Make sure to use Magic Pass in advance at Jamsil Lotte World. Even more when I use it with my family on Sunday.

review: 나랑 남친이랑 우리집 막내랑 막내친구랑 넷이서 다섯시부터 일어나서 부랴부랴 다녀온 롯데월드! 사실 이렇게 준비하고 찾아보고 다녀온게 얼마만인지 모른다..😂 옛날부터 누나랑 같이 가자 말로만한게 좀 미안해서, 따따블로 댕겨옴🚐 - 자유이용권에 프리미엄5티켓까지 풀코스로 끊어서, 개장부터 근 10시간을 잘도 걸어다녔다.(사실 8시에 나오려고했는데 다들 지치고 힘들어서 일찍 나왔다) 출발할 때 프리미엄티켓.....진짜 많이 고민했는데 결론적으로 정말 잘한 선택이었음. 안끊었음 놀이기구 세개 타고
review_en: My boyfriend, my youngest, and my youngest friend woke up at 5 o'clock and hurried back to Lotte World! Actually, I don't know how long it's been since I've been preparing and searching like this.Since a long time ago, I felt sorry for going with my sister, so I walked around for almost 10 hours with a full course of free passes and premium 5 tickets.(Actually, I was going to come out at 8 o'clock, but everyone was tired and tired, so I came early.) When I left, I thought a lot about it, but in conclusion, it was a really good choice. If I didn't, I'd ride three rides.

review: 원형으로돌아가는 놀이기구 120센치미만기구인데 타도된다면서 다른기구는 왜안된다고함? 매직패스 시스템좀 고쳐라ㅡㅡ 분명 16시45분에 열기구 매직패스햇는데 갑자기 오류걸리면서 팅겨서안되고 열기구뿐아니라 회전목마,레일등등 욕나온다 진심 그리고 어느기구는 매직패스로 마감하는시간작성하고 장난하는것도아니고 매직패스할당인원이몇명인데? 16시35분부터 17시까지 열기구 매직패스로 탄팀 3팀밖에못봤다 놀이동산에 놀이기구타러왔지 폰 보러왔냐?
review_en: The ride back to the circle is less than 120cm, but you said you could ride it, but why not other rides? Fix the magic pass system-- I must have gotten a magic pass at 16:45, but it suddenly got an error, and not only the hot air balloon, but also the merry-go-round, the rails, etc. I mean, some of them are not making a magic pass, but also playing with the magic pass. How many Magic Pass assignees? From 16:35 to 17:00, I only saw 3 teams riding a hot air balloon magic pass. I came to the amusement park to ride a ride. Did you come to see my phone?

review: 렛츠 드림 퍼레이드에 어린이스타로 참가했어요 멋진 인어공주로 변신을 하고 퍼레이드에 참여했네요 긴장은 했지만 열심히 손을 흔드는 모습에 너무 감동을 했네요 알라딘과 자스민 공주의 손을 잡고 롯데월드 어드벤처 광장을 돌고 멋진 사진도 찍고 로티 인형도 선물받았네요 딸래미가 정말 좋아했어요 이런 환상의 세계에서의 특별한 경험은 없을거 같네요 기회가 되면 내년에도 또 참가하고 싶네요^^ 언더월드의 와일드투어가 제일 재미있었어요^^
review_en: I joined the Let's Dream Parade as a kid. You transformed into a great mermaid and took part in the parade. I was nervous, but I was so moved by the way you waved your hands, holding Aladdin and Princess Jasmine's hand, going around Lotte World Adventure Square, taking nice pictures, and getting a lotty doll as a gift. My daughter really liked it. I don't think there's any special experience in this fantasy world. If I have a chance, I'd like to join again next year.The wild tour of Underworld was the most interesting.^^

review: 방문햇져용 매직패스 인기많은건 어떻게 하는고지ㅜㅜ 매직패스 들어갔는데 휴기 쓰라구 나와서 써욤 재가 수리 취해서 죠금 휴기가 히상할수있어여ㅜㅜ 재송래용.. 다음 롯데월드 방문 전까지 지울거에용 매표소에 사람이 마나서 한참기다리는데 동동이가 땡깡부려도 참아줘소 너무 고마웟져용 사진두 마니찍구 놀이기구는 26000원내구 세개바깨 못탓지만 그래두 동동이와 함께라서 너므 즐거워쪄여 여려분 사랑하는 사람과 함께 오새요 알바하시는 분들두 친절하구 정말 행복한 곳이에요 동동앙 사랑해 우리 오래가자~~
review_en: How do you do the popular magic pass? ᅮ I went in with the magic pass, and it came out to use the break. The ash can be repaired, so the break can be strange. ᅮ Retransmission.. I'm waiting for a long time at the ticket office for erasing before my next visit to Lotte World. I was so thankful for Dong Dong. I couldn't take two pictures and three rides for 26,000 won, but I'm happy to be with Dong Dong.It's a very happy place for those who work part-time. Dong Dong Ang, I love you. Let's stay together for a long time.

review: 예약하기 힘들었지만 나름 기분이 좋았어요. 안전을 위해 한사람 한사람 체크해주시는분들도 기분좋은 멘트도 듣기좋았습니다~~
review_en: It was hard to make a reservation, but I felt good. It was nice to hear from everyone who checked each and every one of them for safety.~~

review: 실내라 비와도 추워도 놀수있어서 좋고.. (비록 사람 미어터지지만) 가끔 에버랜드는 넘 멀다 싶을때 가기 좋음ㅋ 만원이벤트 안한지 오래되서 안간지 꽤된거같지만..
review_en: It's nice to be indoors, so I can play even if it's cold. It's good to go to Everland sometimes when you feel like it's too far. It's been a while since we've had a 10,000 won event.

review: 길이 너무 어지럽고 놀이기구 줄 찾는게 너무 어려웠어요ㅜ 야외로 나가는 길도 찾기 어려웠습니다. 줄기다리는데 기본30 이여서 많이타기 어려웠어요 지나가다 음식물이 바닥에 떨어진걸 밟은 사람도 종종 있었습니다
review_en: The road was so dizzy and it was so hard to find the line for the rides. It was hard to find the way out. It was hard to ride a lot because it was basic 30 while waiting for the stem. There were often people who stepped on food that fell on the floor while passing by the way.

review: 놀이공원에 들어가는 첫 입구부터 불친절해서 난감했습니다 안내해주시기가 싫으신건지.. 핸드쇼잉조차 제대로된걸 볼수없어요 한두명이 아닙니다 고객들 쳐다보는것도 제발 귀찮듯이하찮듯이 쳐다보지마세요 여러 고객들을 응대하느라 한계가있을수 있지만 어느정도의 기본이라도 신경써주세요
review_en: From the first entrance to the amusement park, I was so unkind that I was embarrassed. You don't want to show me around. I can't even see the right handshoeing. Please don't bother looking at the customers. There may be limitations in dealing with many customers, but please pay attention to some basics.

review: 접근성도 좋고 놀이기구도 훨씬 에버랜드보다 좋은것 같습니다. 에버랜드는 이제 아가들 놀이터같은 느낌.... 롯데월드가 이제 더 좋네요
review_en: It has good accessibility and much better rides than Everland. Everland now feels like a playground for babies... I like Lotte World better now.

review: 정말 재밌고 실내도 정말 좋아요, 또 매직 패스가 있어서 정말 좋아요~^^ 다음에도 또 친구들과 함께 와보고 싶네요! 롯데월드 파이팅~!!
review_en: It's really fun and the indoor is really nice. It's really nice to have a magic pass.I want to come back with my friends again next time! Lotte World, fighting!

review: 별로 다시 오고싶지 않아요 너무 웨이팅이 심하네요 하루종일 기다리다 간 느낌입니다 지방에서 왔는데 기다리다 다시 4시간 내려 갈려니 답답함
review_en: I don't really want to come back. I've been waiting for so long. I'm from the countryside, but I've been waiting for four hours, and I'm frustrated.

review: 역시 휴일에는 오지 말까봐요 1시간 넘게 기다려서 하나 겨우 타네요 그리고 app에 있는 대기시간이 엉터리라서 예약만 하나 날렸어요 ㅠㅠ
review_en: I thought I wouldn't come on holiday. I waited for more than an hour to get one. And the waiting time on the app was a mess, so I just lost one reservation. ᅲᅲ

review: 퍼레이드도 즐겁고 할로윈 분위기 좋아요. 우리 아이도 저도 친구도 정말 즐겁게 즐겼어요. 항상 발전하는 멋딘 롯데월드 좋아요. 다음에는 우리 딸도 퍼레이드 공주차에 탑승하고 싶데요..
review_en: The parade is fun and the Halloween atmosphere is nice. My child, my friend, and I really enjoyed it. I like Lotte World, which always develops. Next time, my daughter wants to get on the parade princess car.

review: 서울 한복판에 있는 놀이공원이기 때문에 따로 시간 내지 않고 편하게 즐길 수 있다. 외국인 친구와 함께 가도 좋은 추억을 만들 수 있다. 한국의 디즈니랜드라고 소개하면 된다. 롯데타워, 롯데캐슬, 롯데월드, 롯데호텔 등 많은 롯데 계열사들이 롯데타운을 형성하고 있다. 매직아일랜드의 경우 석촌호수와 연결되어있고 최근 매직아일랜드에 카페와 펍이 생겨서 그곳만 다리를 건너 들어가서 무료로 롯데월드 냄새만 맡을 수 있다.
review_en: Since it is an amusement park in the middle of Seoul, you can enjoy it comfortably without having time. You can make good memories even if you go with a foreign friend. You can introduce Disneyland in Korea. Many Lotte affiliates, including Lotte Tower, Lotte Castle, Lotte World and Lotte Hotel, form Lotte Town. In the case of Magic Island, it is connected to Seokchon Lake, and recently, a cafe and a pub opened in Magic Island, so only the place can cross the bridge and smell Lotte World for free.

review: 롯데월드는 오랜 전통의 도심속 놀이공원 겸 쇼핑몰이다. 주차가 불편하지만 대중교통으로 접근이 쉽다. 롯데월드타워도 오픈하여 서울 최대 쇼핑&놀이공원이 됐다.
review_en: Lotte World is a long-standing urban amusement park and shopping mall. Parking is inconvenient but easy to access by public transportation. Lotte World Tower also opened, making it the largest shopping and amusement park in Seoul.

review: 예약시스템은 예약을 잡으려면 인기과목 수강신청하는것 보다 더 어려우며, 인지종목인 자이로드롭이나 다른것들도 운용을 안하고(입구에라도써놓으면좋을텐데....)
review_en: The reservation system is more difficult than applying for popular courses to make reservations, and does not operate cognitive items such as Zyro Drop or anything else (it would be nice to have them at the entrance......)

review: 놀이기구 예약을 잘못했는데 취소 못한다고하고 안내해주는 사람은 매너없이 말을 하더라고요. 현장에서 잘못예약한것은 취소할수있게해주세요.
review_en: I booked the wrong ride, but the person who told me I couldn't cancel it and told me without manners. Please allow me to cancel the wrong reservation in the field.

review: 이거 하는 이유가 뭐죠? 차라리 돈을 받고 구매하게 하던가 되지도 않는거 희망고문 하는 건가요? 아니면 이용한도 제한을 두던지 매직패스를 하는 이유가 궁금하네요 이게 실효성이 있는지 다시한번 확인해보고 적용하던지 수정하던지 했으면 좋겟습니다 매직패스에 예약 확인에 자리가 몇자리 남았는지 확인이 가능 하던지, 안되는것에 목매고있는 기분이라 유익하지 못하네요. 매직패스 아이디어는 좋은데 이게 정말 유용한지 그냥 돈받고 파세요 그게 더 구매율이 높을꺼같네요
review_en: Why are you doing this? Are you asking me if I could get paid for it or not? Or maybe we should put some limits on the use, or we'd like to know why we're doing magic passes. I'd like you to check again to see if this works, apply it, or modify it. I can check how many seats are left on the magic pass, but it's not beneficial because I feel like I'm hanging on something that can't be done. I like the Magic Pass idea, but just pay me to see if it's really useful. I think that's a higher purchase rate.

review: 오전에가야 사람이 적네요 그래도 즐거운 추억이되었습니다 매직 패스권이 아주 유용하고 좋네요 즐거웠습니다 좋은 시간되세요
review_en: There's less people in the morning. But it was a good memory. Magic pass is very useful and nice. I enjoyed it. Have a good time.

review: 명절날 아이들과함께 추억을 만들수있어 좋았어요 꿈과환상의나라답게 모든 어트랙션도 짜릿했고 특히 자이로돕은 모든 스트레스가 한방에 날라갔습니다 좀비구역도 즐거운 할로윈파티까지 또오고싶어서 딸과 약속했습니다
review_en: It was good to make memories with children on holidays. Like a dream-and-fantasy country, every attraction was exhilarating, especially in Gyrodow, where all the stress was blown away. I promised my daughter that I would like to come back to the Zombie district and have a fun Halloween party.

review: 다 예약이라뜨고.. 예약마감이라뜨고ㅠㅠ 매직패스로 들어가도 30분기본으로 기다리고ㅠㅠ 3만원주고 프리미엄매직패스사서 탓어요 그게훨씬나음 ㅠㅠ
review_en: It's all called reservations. Reservation closing. Even if you go into Magic Pass, you'll be waiting for the 30th quarter. It's because of Premium Magic Pass for 30,000 won. That's much better.

review: 아이와 둘이 하원후 방문해서 귀여운 할로윈 분위기 즐기며 세시간 편하고 즐겁게 놀았어요. 별다른 어트렉션을 즐기지 않아도 행복한곳이 아닌가 싶어요♡ 연간회원권이 아깝지 않아요^-^*
review_en: I visited with my child after the House of Commons and enjoyed the cute Halloween atmosphere for three hours. I think it's a happy place without having to enjoy any special attractions. I don't want to waste my annual membership.

review: 초등학생아이랑 친구가족이랑 캐릭터룸 1박여행을 했는데 즐거운 여행을 했어요^^ 전날 너무 신~나게 놀아서 인지 아침에 눈을 떠 보니 9시35분!!10시까지인 조식시간!! 황급히 조식먹으러 "라 세느"도착^^ 입구에서 늦은시간인데 너무 기분좋게 웃으며 맞아주셔서 기분좋게 아이랑 아침을 먹었어요!! 가장 마지막으로 퇴장을 했는데 나갈때도 들어올때 맞아주셨던 (성함을 못봤는데 지배인분 같았던)분이 친절하게 인사해주셔서 기분좋은 마음으로 나왔어요~ 프런트에서 체크아웃할때도 응대해 주신분이 제가
review_en: 0I went on a one-night trip to the character room with my elementary school child and my friend's family, and I had a I had so much fun the day before, so I woke up in the morning and found out that it was 9:35:10 AM. It was late at the entrance of La Senet to eat breakfast in a hurry, but he greeted me with a good smile, so I had a good breakfast with my child. I was the last one to leave, and I didn't see the name you gave me on my way out, but the manager who seemed like a manager greeted me kindly, so I came out with a good heart. When I check out at the front desk, the person who responded to me.

review: 재밋었네용 ㅎㅎㅎ다음에 또방문하러 올거예요 평일이라서 사람도 많이없고 재밌는거 다타봤네요!!! 할로윈도 재밌었어요
review_en: It was fun. I'll come visit you again next time. It's a weekday, so there aren't many people and I've tried many fun things!!! Halloween was fun, too.

review: 정말 세계에서 도심 내에 테마파크가 있는 나라는 서울 밖에 없을거에요 교통도 좋고 주위에 큰 쇼핑몰, 호텔, 맛집 등 정말 최고입니다 놀이기구도 다 재미있고, 버터구이옥수수 너무 맛있어요
review_en: Seoul is the only country in the world that has a theme park in the city. The traffic is good and the big shopping malls, hotels, restaurants, and so on are the best. All the rides are fun, and the butter-roasted corn is so good.

review: 연간이용권 끊어 아이와 오니 조바심 없이 키즈카페 온 것처럼 잘 놀다 갑니다. 100cm미만이라 빨리 커서 더 많은 기구 이용하고 싶네요.
review_en: I got an annual pass and had a good time with my child as if I came to a kids cafe without any anxiety. It's less than 100cm, so I want to use more equipment as soon as I grow up.

review: 우리나라에서 대표적인 놀이공원 두군데 중 하나인 롯데월드는 서울 도심에 위치하고 있어서 접근성이 좋은 점이 큰 장점이다 사람이 너무 많은 점은 아쉬운 부분이다
review_en: Lotte World, one of the two representative amusement parks in Korea, is located in downtown Seoul, so accessibility is a big advantage. It is a pity that there are too many people.

review: 매직패스 쓰는데 왜 다른사람들이랑 매직패스를 다른곳으로 보내는건지., 매직패스가 원래 10~15분기다리는 거였나요..? 힘들게 매직패스해서 오래안기다리고 들어가려했는데 정말 궁금하네요 왜 다르게 들어간건지.
review_en: Why do you send magic passes to other people? Was magic passes supposed to be a bridge between 10th and 15th quarters? I've been waiting for a long time for a magic pass, but I'm really curious why it went in differently.

review: 예전보다 스텝분들이 불친절하네요 특히 어린 아이들이 타는 놀이기구에서도 불친절하더라구요 그리고 매번 올때마다 어린이범버카를 타서 정강이에 멍이 들어요 보호자와 같이 범버카를 타면 다리 정강이부분이 앞부분에 부딪혀 멍이드네요 그부분도 무언가를 덧대어 주면 좋겠어요 마지막으로 롯데월드 내 쿠폰사용이 안되는건 불편하네요 엔젤리너스도 쿠폰사용이 안된다그러구...
review_en: The staff is more unfriendly than ever before, especially on rides for young children. And every time I come here, I get bruises on my shin. When I ride a bumper car with my guardian, my legs get bruised when I bump into the front part of my leg. I want you to add something to that, too. Lastly, it is uncomfortable not to use coupons in Lotte World. Angelinus can't use coupons, either.And then...

review: 평일날 월요일날 아이들 학교 끝나고 왔는데 놀이기구도 많이 안기다리고 즐겁게 놀다 가요 :) 그런데 인기 있는 놀이 기구는 30분 정도 대기는 했어요 ㅎㅎ
review_en: I came back from school on Monday, weekdays, and I didn't wait for a lot of rides and had a lot of fun:) But the popular rides were for about half an hour. Haha

review: 타 놀이공원은 외곽지역에 있어서 한번 가려면 맘 잡고 가야되는데 롯데월드는 비교적 가까운 거리에 가볍게 갈 수 있어서 좋아요 예전보다 파는 음식 종류도 많아졌고 맛있는 편이라 중간중간 부담없이 사먹을 수 있어요
review_en: Other amusement parks are located in the outskirts, so I have to make up my mind to go once in a while, but I like Lotte World because it's relatively close and there are more kinds of food that they sell than before, so I can buy them from time to time to time.

review: 동생들이랑 아는 지인들이랑 잘 다녀왔네요. 롯데월드는 매번 올 때마다 만족하고 갑니다ㅎㅎ 먹거리는 더 늘었으면 좋겠어요~
review_en: You went well with your younger brothers and acquaintances. I am satisfied with Lotte World every time I come here.I hope there will be more food.

review: 유아, 아동 동반으로 올해 두번째 방문. 언제나 느끼는 거지만 롯데월드 실내는 우천시에 탁월한 선택. 그러나 손님이 적은 탓인지 매직패쓰 예약했지만 두번이나 소용이 없었다. 그게 아쉽다.
review_en: It's my second visit this year with infants and children. As I always feel, Lotte World's interior is an excellent choice for rainy weather. However, I booked a magic pass because there were few customers, but it was useless twice. That's too bad.

review: 지하3층까지 내려갔다가 유료인거보고 어이상실 올라옴 담부터 써놓으세요 안내판에는 안써있으나 유료맞습니다 가지마세요
review_en: Go down to the 3rd basement floor, see that it's paid, and write down the wall that comes up to the Eosang room. It's not written on the notice board, but it's charged. Don't go.

review: 언제나 즐거운 롯데월드입니다. 저는 어릴 적에 송파구 석촌동에 살며 석촌초등학교룰 다녔습니다. 그 때문에 호수 근처 산책도 하고 롯데월드도 자주 갔었는데 성인이 되어서도 추억할 수 있어서 좋습니다.
review_en: Lotte World is always fun. When I was young, I lived in Seokchon-dong, Songpa-gu and went to Seokchon Elementary School. Because of that, I took a walk near the lake and went to Lotte World often, but I am happy that I can remember it even when I become an adult.

review: 아침일찍 또는 저녁 늦게 쯤에 되어야 줄이 좀 줄어드는곳 다양한 놀이기구가 있어서, 단체로 관광하기 좋습니다. 특히나 날씨가 좋을때 자이로드롭이 있는 바깥에서 돌아다니기 좋아요.
review_en: There are various rides where the line decreases a little early in the morning or late in the evening, so it's good to go sightseeing in groups. Especially when the weather is nice, it's good to walk around outside with Gyro Drop.

review: 오늘 사람 무지 많지는 않네요 뽕뽑고 갑니다 ㅎㅎㅎ 쌈바의 이열치열로 더위는 안녕 어트랙션 15개 타고 갑니더 개인적으로 아틀란티스가 갑..
review_en: There aren't a lot of people today. I'm going to take out the mulberry leaves. Hi, Samba's fighting fire with fire. I'm going to ride 15 attractions and go to Atlantis personally.

review: 40분 걸린다고해놓고 40분걸리는 줄까지 1시간인 롯데 클라스 에버랜드가련다.이건 직원들이 사전에 말도 안해주고 지들끼리 좋다고 히히거리면서 안보인다
review_en: It takes about 40 minutes to go to Lotte Class Everland, which takes about an hour to get to the line that takes 40 minutes.I can't see this because the staff didn't tell me beforehand and they're laughing at each other.

review: 무더위속에서 매일 찌들다가 스트레스 해소를위하여 찾은 롯데월드 아름다운 풍경과 재밋는 놀이기구로 이번 여름 스트레스 싹날리구갑니다
review_en: Lotte World's beautiful scenery and fun rides to relieve stress every day in the hot weather will relieve stress this summer.

review: 넘 재미떵 근데 너무 덥구 힘듬 ㅠㅠ 나중에 또 올땐 시원한 날 와야지~ 암튼 매직패스 너무 좋은데 3개밖에 없어서 너무 아쉽당ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
review_en: It's so much fun. But it's so hot and tiring. I'll come back later on a cool day~ Anyway, Magic Pass is so nice, but there are only three. So sad.

review: 엄청 재밌고 유익하게 잘보낸거 같당 신발을 잘못신은관계로 발은좀 아팠지만 딸에게 좋은시간을 선물해준거 같아 기분좋은 하루가 되었다 퍼레이드도 보고 베리굿했습니닷
review_en: It was very fun and informative. My feet hurt a bit because I wore the wrong shoes, but I think I gave my daughter a good time, so it was a good day. I saw the parade and it was very good.

review: 줄서기는 역시나 힘들어요. 줄서는곳에 의자를 놓아주세요.매직아일랜드 너무 더워요.직원들 힘들겠어요.더운날은 햇빛들어오는 천정유리창을 썬팅해주세요. 에어컨이나와도 시원하지않아요.
review_en: It's hard to stand in line. Please put the chair in the line.Magic Island is too hot.The employees must be tired.On a hot day, tint the sun-in-the- It's not cool even with the air conditioner.

review: 저희집 꼬맹이 10개월때 방문후 3년만의 방문 신나하는 우리집 아들 보니 피곤도 싹 사라지네요!!^^ 이래서 힘들어도 자꾸 놀이공원을 오게 되네요 ㅎㅎㅎ
review_en: Seeing my son, who is excited to visit my little boy for the first time in three years, my tiredness is gone!!That's why I keep coming to the amusement park even though it's hard. Hahaha

review: 롯데월드재미있어요. 근데 의무실이 1개만 있던거 같던데 여러개 설치 해주시면 좋을것 같아요 아 그리고 아이스크림 값을 좀 내려주시면 좋겠어요 3,000 원 인게 너무 비싼거 같아요 2,000~2,500 원이 적당한거 같아요
review_en: Lotte World is fun. But I think there was only one infirmary, so it would be nice if you could set up several. Oh, and I'd like you to lower the price of ice cream. I think 3,000 won is too expensive. 2,000 to 2,500 won is appropriate.

review: 우리 형제들이 태어나서 처음으로 같이 롯데월드에 같이 갔다. 큰언니,나,남동생,그리고 남동생딸(조카),조카친구 즐거운 마음으로 놀러가서 재미있게 즐기고 맛있게 먹고 너무 좋았는데 마지막 집에 가기던 탔던 놀이기구에서 조카가 다쳤다. 등어리가 다 벗겨져서 아프단다 땀도 나는데 더따끔했지만 참고 있어서 이건 아니다 싶어서 놀이기구 직원에게 아이상태를 보여주고 더이상 이런 사고가 나질 않도록 주의를 부탁드렸다 그리고 아이도 많이 나사에 등이 벗겨져서 의무실로 갔는데 문제는 여기서부터다 오늘 그 기계
review_en: Our brothers went to Lotte World together for the first time in their lives. My older sister, me, my younger brother, my younger brother, my younger brother, and my niece (my nephew) went on a trip with a happy heart and enjoyed it. It was so good, but my nephew got hurt on the ride that I rode on my way home. My back was all peeled off, and I was sweating, but I was holding it back, so I showed the ride staff my child's condition and asked them to be careful not to cause this kind of accident anymore, and the child went to the infirmary because his back was peeled off a lot, and the problem was from here today.

review: 서울의 가장큰 테마파크답게 다양한 어트랙션을 즐길수있으며 식당도 잘구비되어있습니다. 외국인들에게도 추천할만한 장소입니다
review_en: As the biggest theme park in Seoul, you can enjoy various attractions and the restaurant is well-equipped. It is a place to recommend to foreigners.

review: 태어나서 4번째 아들 생일을 즐겁고 행복하게 보냈습니다. 키가 작아 많이 타질 못해 아쉬웠지만, 내년엔 110cm가 넘어서 더더 즐거운 시간되길 기대합니다^^
review_en: I spent my fourth son's birthday happily and pleasantly. I was sorry that I couldn't ride much because I was short, but I hope you will have more fun next year because you're over 110cm tall.^^

review: 정말 괜찮은 놀이공원인 롯데월드. 자주 방문해도 재밌고 할 것 먹을 것들이 많습니다. 만족합니다. 서울 시내에 위치해서 더욱 좋습니다.
review_en: Lotte World is a really nice amusement park. It is fun to visit often and there are many things to eat. I'm satisfied. It's even better to be located in downtown Seoul.

review: 도심속의 테마파크인 롯데월드는 예전이나 지금이나 항상 인기있는 장소이다.사랑하는 연인과 또는 가족들과 함께 쉽게 갈 수 있는 롯데월드는 석촌호수와 함께 있어 나름대로 운치가 있는 곳이다. 그곳에서 놀이기구를 타며 잠시나마 동심의 세계로 가보는 것이 어떨가~
review_en: Lotte World, a theme park in the city center, is a popular place before and now.Lotte World, where you can easily go with your beloved lover or family, is a place with its own beauty because it is with Seokchon Lake. Why don't you take a ride there and go to the childhood for a while?

review: 친구가 실수로 쓰레기통에 소지품이 들어갔는데 회전그데에 계신 직원분이 맨손으로 꺼내 주셨다. 재미있게 놀다가 갑디다
review_en: My friend accidentally put his belongings in the trash can and the employee at the spinning wheel pulled them out with his bare hands. have a good time

review: 종일권으로 하면 상당한 가격이라 after 7(pm.7시 부터 입장) 권을 구입했는데 퍼레이드도 시간 맞춰보고 사람도 별로없어서 좋았습니다 줄없이 그냥 들어가서 타는건 진짜 오랜만... 놀이기구 찾아 다니느라 조금 힘든거랑 조기마감한 놀이기구가 많아서 못탄게 있지만 재밌었습니다💕
review_en: I bought an after 7 ticket, but it was nice to see the parade on time and not many people. It's been a long time since I walked in without a rope. I had a hard time finding the rides and I had a lot of early rides, so I couldn't ride them, but it was fun.💕

review: 2년만에 다시 연간으로 등록해서 쒼나게 재미나게 놀구있다 무엇보다 우리 아들이 너무 좋아한다 벌써 3년째인데도 그리 신이날까
review_en: I registered for the first time in two years and had a lot of fun. Above all, my son likes it so much. I wonder if he's excited even though it's already been three years.

review: 3시 50분에. 입장시켜놓고 다시 신발벋는곳에서. 10분을 더 기다리게 할꺼면. 왜 매직패스를 하라고 하는것이며.. 먼저 입장을 시킨것입니까. 차라리. 매직패스를 하지ㅜ말라고 해야죠 아이들이 그앞에서 들어가고 싶다고.. 다 난리였습니다ㅡ 조금만더 조금만더 기다리라고 하는데. 나참.. 짜증나서여. 문앞에서 보면서 못들어 가는게 더 힘듭니다. 받지를 말아야.. 다른거라도 하고 오지요ㅡ 짜중나는 하루 였습니다.
review_en: At 3:50. at the entrance and the footwear again If you're gonna keep me waiting for another ten minutes. Why are you telling me to pass magic? Did you make the entrance first? I'd rather tell him not to do magic passes. The kids want to get in front of him. It was a mess.- They want us to wait a little longer. I'm so... annoyed. It's harder not to get in while watching it at the door. I'm not supposed to... I'll do something else - it's been a long day.

review: 평일이라 사람도없고 너무 잘 갔다왔어요~~ 다만 날씨가 점점 더워지니깐 에어컨을 더 시원하게 틀어주셨음해요 ㅜㅅㅜ 다음엔 겨울에 또 가려구요 ~
review_en: It was a weekday, so there were no people. I had a great time.But as the weather is getting hotter, I hope you turn on the air conditioner cooler ᅮSu, I'm going to go in winter again. ~

review: 실내가 있어서 여름에도 좋지만 대신 사람이 많아요 도심에 위치한 만큼 접근성이 좋지만 항상 붐벼요 아이들 데리고 가기 좋아요
review_en: It's good for summer because it's indoors, but it's a lot of people. It's accessible as it's downtown, but it's always crowded. It's good to

review: 평일 오후 5시에 입장했는데 매직패스 덕에 타고싶은거 다 타고 카드할인까지 받아서 뽕빼고 왔네여! 언제가도 넘 재밌는 롯데월드!!! 또 시간되면 평일에 방문예정입니다.
review_en: I came in at 5 p.m. on weekdays, but thanks to Magic Pass, I got all the rides I wanted and got a credit card discount, so I took it out! Lotte World is always so fun!!! If I have time, I will visit on weekdays.

review: 사람 없는 날 롯데월드는 사랑입니다ㅜ쿠ㅜㅠ 너무 재밌고 행복해용 학교가 쉬는날이라 친구들이랑 놀러왔는데 좋은 추억만든것 같아서 정말 좋았어요
review_en: On a deserted day, Lotte World is love.ᅮ쿠쿠ᅮ용용 I am so happy and having fun. I came here to play with my friends because my school is off. It was really nice to make good memories.

review: 어드벤처로 올라가는 에스컬레이터를 타면 환상의 세계로 들어가는 기분이에요. 아기자기하고 재밌지만, 놀이기구가 별로 추가되지 않는 것 같아 살짝 아쉬워요
review_en: When I ride an escalator going up to the adventure, I feel like I'm going into a fantasy world. It's cute and fun, but it's a bit disappointing that there aren't many rides added.

review: 롯데월드호텔과 패키지로 왔습니다. 아이들과 함께하기 좋구요... 계획을 짜서 죽 둘러보는게 좋은데, 외부의 어드벤쳐는 유아들이 탈수 있는게 한계가 있어서 롯데월드 실내에 어린이 플레이 공간을 추천하고 실내 공연도 참 좋습니다. 명절에는 오히려 공연 퍼레이드 등의 볼거리가 더 많더라구요.
review_en: I came to Lotte World Hotel and package. It's good to be with kids... It's good to make a plan and look around, but the outside adventure is limited for infants to ride, so I recommend a children's play area inside Lotte World and the indoor performance is very good. On holidays, there were more things to see such as performances and parades.

review: 아이들이 좋아해서 유치원 쉬는날이라 갔는데 사람이 너무 많아서 별로 타지도 못했어요. 다음에 한산할때 다시 가야겠어요~
review_en: I went to kindergarten because children like it, but there were so many people that I couldn't ride it. I should go again when we go to Hansan next time.

review: 후렌치레볼루션 하나 타는데 5시간!!최악!!시간 아깝고 돈 아까운 날!! 중간에 나가자니 지금까지 기다린 시간 생각나서 나오지도 못하고 다른곳도 대기시간 만만찮아 하나타고나니 시간 다 감. 완전 돈아까웠음
review_en: Five hours for a French Revolution!Worst day ever! A waste of time and money! When I went out in the middle, I couldn't come out because I thought of the time I've been waiting for so long, and the waiting time for other places is really bad. I was born with one, so time is running out. It was so close

review: 공휴일 전날인데 놀이기구 이용 대기시간이 기본 120분 220분이라니.. 게다가 인기많은건 990분인데 매직패스로 예매를 하려고해도 예약도 불가능하고 뭔가 대응책이 필요한것 같네요 사람들이 입장권만 끊고 들어간다 한들 이용은 제대로 못하고 있습니다 돈을 많이 버는것도 좋지만 사람들이 이용하는데 불편함이 없었으면 합니다
review_en: It's the day before the holiday, but the waiting time for the ride is 120 minutes and 220 minutes. Besides, the most popular one is 990 people, and even if you try to book by magic pass, you can't make a reservation and you need some countermeasures. Even if people just buy tickets, they can't use them properly. It's good to make a lot of money, but I hope people don't feel uncomfortable using it.

review: 휴일 사이에 껴 있는 평일이어서 그런지 사람들이 너무 많아서 인기있는 어트랙션은 대기시간이 기본 120분 ㅠㅠㅠ 탈 엄두도 안나더라고요 매직패스는 이미 다 마감이라 있어도 쓸수도 없구요 다음에 사람 없을때 방문 해봐야 겠어요
review_en: Because it's a weekday, there are so many people, so the waiting time for popular attractions is 120 minutes. I don't even think about riding it. Magic passes are already closed, but I can't use them. I'll visit when there's no one around next time.

review: 하필 날짜가 목요일 비오는 날이라 실외 기구를 2개밖에 못탔지만 진짜 개꿀잼이였어요!! 특히 아트란티스!! 탔던 것 중에 짱짱맨😭 계속 타고싶어지네요ㅠㅠ 바이킹도 너무너무 재미있었어요!! 걍 다 잼있습니다ㅠㅠ 아쉽게도 후룸라이트(?)는 사람이 많아서 못탔지만!! 아트란티스로 아쉬움 다 날린거 같아요! 나중에는 친구들이랑 가서 자이로드롭 정복하고 오겠습니다!!❤ 롯데월드 사랑해요❤ +후렌치레볼루션 타고싶었는 데 점검이라 못탔어용😭 그래도 즐거웠어용 다음에는 날 좋고 다 타는 날에 갈게요!!❤
review_en: Of all things, Thursday was a rainy day, so I only rode two outdoor rides, but it was so much fun!! Especially Atlantis!! I want to keep riding the best man I've ever ridden.The Viking was so much fun too!! It's all jamming.Unfortunately, I couldn't ride Flumelight because there were so many people. I think I've lost all of my regrets with Artlandis! Later, I will go with my friends and conquer Zyro Drop!! 사랑 Lotte World I love you ❤ +French Revolution I wanted to ride it, but I couldn't because I had to check it out 😭 But it was fun. Next time, I'll go on a day when everyone likes me!!❤

review: 롯데월드도 이제 꽤 오래된 느낌이 물씬 드네요... 그렇게 어트랙션이 잘 업그레이드 되는것 같지 않고 롯데타워가 생기면서 왠지 한물간 느낌... 아이데리고 가긴 좋지만 놀이공원이 그렇듯 음식 가성비가 좀 별로입니다
review_en: It feels like Lotte World is quite old now... I don't think the attraction is being upgraded that well, and it feels like it's out of date with the Lotte Tower. It's good to go with a kid, but like amusement parks, the cost-effectiveness of food is not good.

review: 오랜만에 친구들이랑 다같이 힐링하러 와서 재밌게 놀고 가요 희희 다만 먹을거리 가격이 조금 비싼게 단점이라면 단점인거같아요
review_en: Come and have fun with your friends after a long time. Heehee, but if the price of food is a little high, I think it's a disadvantage.

review: 연인끼리 친구끼리 가족끼리가도 좋은 곳 화려한 쇼도 정해진 시간에 하고 볼거리 탈거리가 아주많다 아틀란티스는 꼭 타야함ㅋ
review_en: Where lovers and friends are good family, there is a fancy show at a fixed time, and there is a lot of things to see. Atlantis must ride.

review: 보통 큰 놀이공원은 도시 외곽에 있는 경우가 많은데, 도심 한가운데에 위치해서 접근도 편리하고 놀이기구에 탑승해서 높이 올라가면 보이는 전망도 새롭고 즐겁습니다.
review_en: Usually, large amusement parks are located on the outskirts of the city, which is convenient to access as it is located in the middle of the city, and the view you can see when you go up high on the rides is new and enjoyable.

review: 전부터할려구했는데 미루다보니 일년이 흘렀네요ㅎ 간만에아이들과신나게놀고왔네요 롯데월드 짱에요 이제 연간회원권두 했으니 자주가야겠어요ㅎ
review_en: I've been meaning to do it for a long time, but a year has passed since I put it off. It's been a long time since I had a great time with my children. Lotte World is the best. Now that I've recommended annual membership, I should go there more often.Hah!

review: 비온다고해서 왔는데 여전히 사람이 너무많네용 ㅠㅠ 그래도 넘즐거워용 아무래도 연휴가 길어서 어린이날의 연장같으네용ㅜㅜ
review_en: I came here because it said it would rain, but there are still too many people. But it's still a lot of fun. I think it's an extension of Children's Day because of the long holiday.

review: 매직 티켓이라는 시스템이 마음에 듭니다 하지만 3가지 밖애 못해서 좀 이쉽네여 ㅠㅠ 조금더 늘어 났으면 합니다 화이팅 하시구여
review_en: I like the magic ticket system, but I can only do three things, so it's a bit easy. I hope it gets longer. Fighting!

review: 근로자 날 맞아서 아이와 시간내서 왔는데 너무나 행복한 추억이였네요~~ 롯데월드는 아이가 항상 신나하고 즐거워해서 언제나 후회없는 선택이네요~~ 다음을 기약하며...
review_en: I came here with my kid on Labor Day and it was such a happy memory.Lotte World always has no regrets because it's fun and exciting for the child.

review: 어린애들이 놀 것들만 있고 성인들이 즐길 수 있는 컨텐츠가 너무 적네요 그리고 사람이 너무 많아 놀이기구 하나를 제대로 못타고 가네요 다른 방법을 강구해야될듯하네요
review_en: There's only a lot of kids to play with and too little content for adults to enjoy. And there's so many people that I can't get on one of the rides properly. I think we need to figure something out.

review: 주말과 방학은 피하고 평일에 가는 게 좋다. 눈치싸움. 사람 몰리면 놀이기구 하나 타는 것도 고통스러움... 일 년에 한 두번 가면 좋은 곳!!
review_en: It is better to avoid weekends and vacations and go on weekdays. It's painful to ride a ride when people are crowded. A good place to go once or twice a year!

review: 매직패스예약하기 15분씩 1시간동안 시도해봤는데 누를시간도없이 예약시간만 계속늘어나고 그거하느라 놀이기구도 오히려 못탔네요 진짜 속은기분
review_en: I tried magic pass reservations for 15 minutes for an hour, but I couldn't get on the rides because I didn't have time to press it. real feeling of being deceived

review: 우리딸이 스티커를 완성하고나면 꼭 가자고하는. 그녀에게 있어선 모든게 이루어지는 꿈의공간입니다 제가 어린시절 그랬듯이요
review_en: When my daughter completes the sticker, she always asks me to go. For her, it's a dream space where everything comes true. Just like I did when I was a kid.

review: 세계최대 실내테마파크입니다 비오는날에도 날씨제약없이 입장할수 잇고 실내에 놀이기구가 잇어서 온도 상관없이 겨울에도 이용하기 좋아요
review_en: It's the world's largest indoor theme park. Even on rainy days, you can enter without any weather restrictions, and there are rides indoors, so it's good to use in winter regardless of temperature.

review: 서울오는거만 2시간걸쳐왔는데 잠실역앞에서 싸워서 못올뻔했다. 여차저차 화해하고 들어왔는데 사람없어서 너무좋았다ㅜ 덕분에 더 사랑스러워진 우리커플 꾜호~~!
review_en: It took me 2 hours to come to Seoul, but I almost couldn't because I fought in front of Jamsil station. I just made up and came in, but I was so happy that there were no people.Thanks to you, our couple became more lovely!

review: 서울 강남 잠실에 있는 실내 놀이공원이 장점인 곳입니다. 실외에 놀이기구도 훌륭한 것이 많습니다만, 담이 작은 저로써는 타기가 겁이 나서 못 타겠더군요. 드라마, 영화, 예능에 나왔던 이유로 많은 외국인들이 찾아 오는 곳이기도 합니다. 낡은 시설도 있지만, 잘 정비되고 있다는 느낌도 들었습니다. 시설 안에서 파는 음식들은 비싼 편이지만, 따로 밖에 나가서 사 먹고 들어오기에도 힘들어서 그냥 안에 먹었습니다. 주말이나 공휴일, 방학은 가급적 피해서 가는 것이 좋겠다는 생각이 듭니다. 너무 사람이
review_en: The indoor amusement park in Jamsil, Gangnam, Seoul is an advantage. There are a lot of great outdoor rides, but as a person with a small wall, I can't ride them because I' It is also a place where many foreigners visit because they appeared in dramas, movies, and entertainment shows. There are old facilities, but I also felt that they were being well maintained. The food sold in the facility is expensive, but it was hard to go out and eat it, so I just ate it inside. I think it would be better to avoid weekends, holidays, and vacations. too much of a person

review: 친구들이랑 13년만에 교복을 입고 놀러갔어요 ! 점검중인게 많아서 아쉬웠지만 추억만들고가서 너무 좋아요~!!! 종일로 끈었지만 다시 고향으로 돌아가야해서 야간의 그 아름다운배경을 담지 못해서 아쉽네요ㅠㅠ다음에는 커플로 오겠습니다..또르르
review_en: I went to play with my friends wearing a school uniform after 13 years! It was a shame that there were a lot of things under inspection, but I'm so happy to make memories~!!! I am sorry that I couldn't capture the beautiful scenery of the night because I had to go back to my hometown.Um, I'll come as a couple.dorsal

review: 그럴싸한게 한곳뿐이라 유명하지만 사실 이름값에비해 이젠 좀 후줄근한 느낌인건 사실이다. 이정도 위치 이정도 규모 이정도 인기이면 이제 좀 세련되어질때도 되지않았나. 그래도 아직은 커플이면 커플 가족이면 가족 한번쯤은 들르게되는 롯데월드......
review_en: Although it is famous for its one plausible place, it is true that it feels a bit sloppy compared to the price of the name. If you're this big and this big, isn't it time to become more sophisticated? But Lotte World is still a couple and a couple family can stop by at least once.

review: 식사는 비싸기만하고 맛도없고 양도적어요 내부 놀이공원은 페스티발할때 지나다니지도 못해서 너무 짜증났어요
review_en: The meal is expensive, tasteless, and plentiful. I was so annoyed that I couldn't even go to the amusement park during the festival.

review: 이제는 닫는시간이 일러서 저녁 할인 받고 오기보다는 제시간에 와서 즐기는게 좋고 예약제를 잘 이용하세요
review_en: It's too early to close now, so it's better to come on time and enjoy the reservation system than to get a dinner discount.

review: 사람이 좀 많기는 한데 공기도 안좋고 연강회원권 구입해서 유용하게 이용중이에여 밥먹기도 편하네요
review_en: There are a lot of people, but the air is bad and it's easy to eat while I'm using it because of course.

review: 딸들과 같이 여행갔다왔는데 유익한 시간이였어요. 한가지 아쉬운점은 프리패스를 너무 남발했다는거 차라리 프리패스를 한정적으로 제한을 두거나 비용을 지불해서 샀으면 그렇게 많진 않았을텐데.
review_en: I went on a trip with my daughters and it was a good time. One thing I regret is that I over-issued my free pass would not have been so much if I had limited or paid for it.

review: 직장인 커플은 학생들 개학일때 주중에 휴가내서 오세요 안그럼 애들이 너무 많아서 기다리는거 짜증나요 자유 이용권 아까워 죽겠네
review_en: Office worker couple take a week off when the students start school. Otherwise, I'm sick of waiting for so many kids. I'm wasting my free pass.

review: 사람 진짜 많아요 와 와오아와 1시간 지나서 환불도못하고 와 진짜 와아 2월28 마지막날 7시간 동안 2개탔어요
review_en: There are so many people. Wow, wow. After an hour, I couldn't get a refund. Wow, wow. On the last day of February 28, I rode two in seven hours.

review: 좀 더울때 아이스링크 가면 시원하고 좋은듯해요. 많이 웃고 스트레스 푸는 덴 이만한데가 없는듯
review_en: It's cool and nice to go to an ice rink when it's hot. There's no better place to laugh and relieve stress.

review: 매직패스 3회 이용도 있고 직원분들도 친절하시고 너무너무 재미있어요!! 여자친구랑 잘 놀다갑니다!!!^^
review_en: You can use Magic Pass 3 times and the staff are kind and it's so much fun!! I'm having fun with my girlfriend!!!^^

review: 이자식들아 사람이 몇명 이상 오면 제한을 하던가 해야지 다 들여보내면 170분 기다리고 2분타고 150분 기다리고 2 분타면 어???320분 기다려서 4분 타는군디 5시간 반 기다려서 4분 놀라규 내가 여기 왔냐!!!!!!!!!!!!기구를 늘리던가 사람을 덜 받던가 인마!!!!! 사랑해요~~|
review_en: Guys, you have to limit how many people come in. If you let them in, wait 170 minutes. If they wait 150 minutes. If they wait 2 minutes. What?You wait 320 minutes. Wait 5 and a half hours. Surprised. I'm here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I love you~|

review: 사람들(알바) 너무 불친절하고 거의 짜증식이네요 진상손님 제어도 안하고 최악이에요 놀이기구 수칙도 설렁설렁 후룸라이드 실망입니다
review_en: People are so unkind and almost annoying. I can't control you, I can't control the rides, I'm disappointed with the flume ride.

review: 어릴 때나, 어른이 된 지금이나 언제 가도 설레는 곳입니다. ㅎㅎㅎ 사람 많으면 대기시간이 1시간은 기본이지만 타는 순간 기다린 고생을 잊게 만들어주는 재밌는 어트랙션들! 좋아요 ㅎㅎㅎ
review_en: It's a place where you're excited whenever you're young and grown up. If there are a lot of people, 1 hour of waiting time is a given, but fun attractions make you forget the hardships you've been waiting for! Good.

review: 미어터짐 봄방학 헬게이트 사람 정수리만 보다 옴 실내라 따뜻함 2월은 지옥의 달 어쩌라고! 미어터진다고!
review_en: I'm so warm inside than the top of the Hellgate man's head. February is the month of hell! It's going to blow up!

review: 예전과 많이 변하지 않았지만 몇몇 새로 추가된 어트랙션은 기대이상으로 좋네요!! 매직패스 끊고 아들보다 더 신나게 놀다 왔습니다 ^^
review_en: It hasn't changed much, but some of the newly added attractions are better than expected!! I had more fun than my son. ^^

review: 여러공연도 관람가능하고 실내이어서 춥지않아좋습니다. 다만 단체 어린이관람이많이 복잡합니다.
review_en: I can see many performances and it's not cold because it's indoor. However, the group viewing of children is very complicated.

review: 자유이용권 프리패스예약 된다해서 30분 전부터 예약 걸어도 계속 부팅해서 걸어도 절대 예약 안됩니다 이유를 보니 4명은 예약자체가 안됩니다 처음부터 1,2명은 빈좌석있어 되고 4명은 예약시스템 자체에 안되게 해놨으면서... 그 어플 신경쓰다 오히려 시간 다가요 그냥 여유있으면 인당 10만원씩 주고 정일 무제한프리페스 하세요 돈이면 다되게 만든 롯데월드 ㅎ 돈없으면 1-2시간 기다리고 돈주고 사면 바로 입장 ㅎㅎㅎ
review_en: Free pass is reserved for free passes, so even if you make a reservation 30 minutes in advance, you can't make a reservation even if you keep booting. The reason is that four people are not available. From the start, one or two people are left empty and four are not allowed to the reservation system itself. I don't care about the app, but I'm running out of time. If you have time, give 100,000 won per person for unlimited free time on the regular day. Lotte World, which is made up of money. If you don't have money, wait 1-2 hours and buy it, you can enter right away.

review: 주말에가끔와서 신나게놀고가니 너무좋아요 매직패스활용도 베스트굿 키즈토리아 한시간놀고나면 키카보다 효율있고아깝지않음
review_en: It's so nice to come here on weekends and have fun. Magic Pass Utilization Best Good Kids Toria After an hour of play, it is more efficient and not a waste than Kika

review: 겨울이나 비오는 여름, 날씨에 구애받지 않고 재미있게 놀수 있음. 놀이기구가 다양하고 도심에 있어 접근성이 탁월. 힘만 남는다면 끝나고 쇼핑이나 아쿠아리움 할 수 있음. 단 실내 공기가 너무 탁해서 목이 아픔. 마스크 필수. 그리고 앉아서 쉴수있는 공간이 늘었으면 좋겠음.
review_en: I can have fun in winter or rainy summer, regardless of weather. It has a wide range of rides and excellent accessibility in the city center. You can shop or go to an aquarium after this if you have some energy left. But the air in the room is so murky that my throat hurts. Mask required, and I hope there will be more room to sit down and rest.

review: 역시 행복의 나라 롯데월드에는 나이가 들어도 가면 재미있어요. 그래도 사람들 없을떄 놀이기구 많이타는것이 더 좋아서 그때를 노리고 있습니다.
review_en: Lotte World, the land of happiness, is fun even if you get older. But I like to ride a lot of rides when there are no people, so I'm aiming for that time.

review: 힘들고~~15분마다 왠 고역인지... 다시는 안오고 싶어요. 비0분로 넘게 기다렸네요. 매직패스도 너무 하기
review_en: It's hard. Every 15 minutes, I wonder why it's so hard. I don't want to come back again. I've been waiting for over 0 minutes of rain. Magic passes are too much.

review: 혹한대기라고 놀익기구 운행은 다 안하고 프리패스예약은되지도않고 놀이기구는 타지고 못하고 오네 하...아쉽다
review_en: I can't get on the rides because of the cold weather. I can't get on the rides.Too bad

review: 실내 구역은 공기가 너무 답답하고 어수선했고 사람이 많아서인지 스낵바 쪽은 좀 지저분한 느낌도 있었습니다. 아이들은 즐거워했지만 어둡고 답답해서 별로였습니다.
review_en: The indoor area was so stuffy and cluttered, and the snack bar was a bit messy, maybe because there were so many people. The children were happy, but they were dark and stuffy, so dark and stuffy.

review: 너무제미있었구요~친구들과가서더즐거웠습니다. 다만아쉬웠던점은친구들과사진을못찍어서아쉬웠습니다 다음뻔에또가고싶네요
review_en: It was too much.It was more fun to go with my friends. The only sad thing was that I couldn't take a picture with my friends. I want to go again next time.

review: 겨울방학이지만 추운날씨여서 그런지 사람들이 북적거리지않아서 즐거운 시간 보내고 있습니다. 춥지않은 실내 놀이공원 롯데월드 좋아요^^
review_en: Although it is winter vacation, I am having a good time because it is cold weather. I like Lotte World, an indoor amusement park that is not cold.^^

review: 롯데월드 가고싶다는 아이의 소원들어주기. 2시간을 기다려서 탔던 놀이기구! 짜릿한경험! 힘들어도 즐거운 기분 한껏 만끽하고 왔습니다.
review_en: Make a child's wish to go to Lotte World. The ride that I waited for 2 hours! Exciting experience! I enjoyed myself even though it was hard.

review: 야외 놀이기구가 거의 다 혹한으로 운행을 안해서 안까지 사람이 많았어요.. 재밌는 놀이기구들이 대부분 안하니까 별로였어요😔
review_en: Most of the outdoor rides were cold, so there were a lot of people inside. I didn't like it because most of the fun rides weren't there.😔

review: 예전에 놀이공원가면 겨울에 눈오고 이럴땐 기구가 운행 중지 당하고 그런일이 있었는데 여기는 대부분 실내라 그런 걱정 안해도 되겠습니다. 그래서 겨울에도 사람이 무지하게 많고요. 매직 아일랜드는 야외라 야외 놀이기구를 탈 수 있는 공간이며 테마파크는 전체적으로 예쁘게 잘 꾸며놓았습니다
review_en: In the past, when it snowed in winter when I went to an amusement park, the equipment was suspended, but I don't have to worry about it because most of these are indoors. So there are a lot of people even in winter. Magic Island is an outdoor place where you can enjoy outdoor rides, and the theme park is well decorated.

review: 언제나 재밌는 그곳 롯데월드! 주말보단 평일이 더 낫고 할인카드는 필수! 프리패스도 있으니 유용해요
review_en: Lotte World is always fun! Weekdays are better than weekends and discount cards are required! It's useful to have a free pass.

review: 몇년만에 방문했는데 재밌네요~ 평일이라 상대적으로 입장객이 적고 매직패스 잘 이용해서 웬만한 놀이기구 다 탈 수 있었어요~
review_en: It's been years since I've been here. It's fun. Since it's a weekday, there are relatively few visitors, and I was able to ride most of the rides using the magic pass.

review: 딜러이트 호텔 숙박후 야간 개장으로 롯데월드를 다녀 왔어요 그리고 아이들이 자고 와이프와 치맥한잔 후 다음날 미리 예약한 조식을 먹고 퇴실하였습니다
review_en: After staying at the dealership hotel, I went to Lotte World for the night opening, and my children slept, had chicken and beer with my wife, and then left the room the next day after having a pre-booked breakfast.

review: 다른 놀이동산과는 달리 실내에 놀이동산이 있어서 비가 오나 눈이오나 추울때나 더울때나 걱정 없이 놀 수 있는것이 다른곳에 비해 가장 큰 장점이라고 볼 수 있습니다. 접근성이 너무 좋아서 사람이 항상 붐빌 수 있다는것은 참고하시기 바랍니다.
review_en: Unlike other amusement parks, there is an amusement park indoors, so it is the biggest advantage to play without worrying about rain, snow, cold, or hot weather. Please note that access is so good that people can always be crowded.

review: 아마 롯데월드 모르시는 분은 없으실 것입니다. 저 또한 동심을 느끼고자 할때는 롯데월드를 가곤하는데요. 연인끼리 데이트하기에 좋습니다 , 익사이팅한 커플이시라면 바이킹을 타시고.ㅋ 조용한 커플이시라면 회전목마? 어떨까요? ㅋㅋㅋ 볼거리도 많고, 탈것도 많은 롯데월드 데이트장소고 강추할 곳입니다.
review_en: I'm sure everyone knows Lotte World. I also go to Lotte World when I want to feel childhood innocence. It's good for couples to date. If you're an exiting couple, ride a Viking. If you're a quiet couple, then a merry-go-round? What do you think? LOL. It's a place for a date at Lotte World where there are many things to see and ride.

review: 롯데월드는 제가 어릴적와본후 아이와함께 처음방문했네요~ 겨울철에 실내에서 놀이기구를 편하게 탈수있어좋았고 규모에 참 놀랐네요^^ 오늘 놀이기구도 많이타고 공연도 즐겁게 잘보았네요~ 매직패스도 좋구요^^ 음식가격도 많이 비싸지않아 좋구요~ 직원분들도 친절하시구요~ 암튼 롯데월드에 대한 생각이 많이틀려졌네요~~ 즐건하루였네요^^
review_en: I visited Lotte World for the first time with my child since I was young. It was nice to ride the rides indoors in winter and I was surprised at the scale.I rode a lot of rides today and enjoyed the concert. Magic passes are good.The food price is not that expensive. The staff members are also kind. Anyway, I've changed my mind about Lotte World.It's been a fun day.^^

review: 탈것도 몇개 없으면서 손님을 제한 없이 무조건 받으니까 줄이 엄청 길어서 뭐 하나 타려면 기본 한시간 , 인기있는 것은 두시간도 기다리네요. 그마저도 몇개 인기 어트랙션을 일일점섬이라는 이유로 운행 안하는 바람에 더욱 몰리고요. 화장실 위치도 안좋은 편이고, 음식물도 다 비싸면서 퀄리티도 매우 떨어지네요. 특히 케밥 절대 사먹지 마세요. 풀만 줍니다. 토끼도 아니고 ㅡㅡ 일본 유니버셜의 경우 돈은 비싸도 일일 인원 제한해서 판매하니까 줄도 기다릴만한데 여기는 너무 심하네요. 어릴 때부터
review_en: There's not much to ride, but there's no limit to the number of customers. The line is so long, so I'm waiting for an hour to ride one of the most popular ones, and two hours. Even that's because some of the popular attractions aren't running because it's a one-day island. The location of the bathroom is not good, and the food is expensive and the quality is very poor. Especially, never buy kebabs. I only give you grass. It's not even a rabbit -- Japan Universal has a daily limit on the number of people it sells, so it's worth waiting for a line, but it's too much here. from a child

review: 날씨가 추워서 아이와 함께 놀곳이 마땅치가 않은데 미취학 아동이 즐길수 있는 놀이시설이 모두 실내에 있어 날씨와 상관없이 즐길수 있어 좋습니다
review_en: The weather is so cold that I don't have a place to hang out with my child, but all the amusement facilities for preschoolers are indoors, so I can enjoy them regardless of the weather.

review: 저는 동행한 아이가 초등 고학년이라 재밌게 탔는데 실내에 보니 유아, 저학년들 어트랙션 공간이 따로 있는게 좋아 보였어요. 아기자기하고 자기들만의 놀이동산 같달까요. 매직패스도 유용하게 잘 썼습니다. 비록 인기 어트랙션은 예약하는게 박터지긴 하지만ㅜㅜ 휴 종종 새로운 놀이기구가 생겨서 신선해요. 이번에 처음 경험한건 플라이벤처였는데 좋았습니다!! 맘에 들어요. 시간이 부족해 와일드 시리즈는 못탄게 아쉽네요ㅜㅜ 이런 변화 환영합니다. 계속 발전하는 롯데월드가 되어 주세요^^
review_en: I enjoyed riding with my child because he was a senior in elementary school, but when I looked inside, it looked good that there was a separate attraction for infants and juniors. It's like their own little amusement park. Magic passes were also useful. Although booking for popular attractions is a little bumpy. Phew. It is refreshing because new rides are often made.
