The first time I experienced it was a fly-venture, and it was good!! I love it. It's too bad we couldn't get to the Wild Series because we didn't have enough time. Welcome to this change. Please be Lotte World that continues to develop.^^

review: 제안을 하나 드릴게요 탑승대기시간을 어플로 실시간으로 확인할수있게 해주시면 너무 좋을거같아요 발전하는 롯데월드 되길 바래요 티지아이 프라이데이 롯데백화점 이용하고 싶었는데 못나가게 해서 아쉬웠어요 이유는 알겠는데 방법을 찾아주셨으면해요
review_en: I have a suggestion. It would be great if you could check the waiting time on the app in real time. I hope Lotte World will be developed. I wanted to use TGI Friday Lotte Department Store, but I was sad that I couldn't go out. I know why, but I need you to find a way.

review: 쇼핑몰 놀이공원 레스토랑 기념품가게 아이스링크없는게없다 옆에호텔까지도 무조건가면 모든걸한번에 해결할 수 있다
review_en: Shopping malls, amusement parks, restaurants, souvenir shops, ice rink. If you go to the hotel next door, you can solve everything at once.

review: 지난주에 아이들하고 좋은 추억 만들고 왔어요. 사람들이 너무 많아서 놀이기구 많이 타지 못해서 아쉬웠어요.
review_en: I made good memories with my children last week. It was a shame that there were so many people that I couldn't ride many rides.

review: 사람이 너무너무 많다는점ㅋ 겨울철 실내라 즐겁게 다녀갑니다 좋은추억이 될거같아요^^!!!!!!
review_en: There are so many people in the winter. It will be a good memory.

review: 롯데월드는 기대 이상으로 행사를 많이하고 야경이 너무 멋있어요!다음 해에 다시 한번 가고 싶어요!
review_en: Lotte World has more events than expected and the night view is so great!I want to go again next year!

review: 직원관리가이렇게안되서야. 과연이곳이 가족이 행복한시간을보낼수있는곳인지 의심스럽습니다. 모든식음료코너직원들은. 눈도마주치지않고.주문을받고. 정말오고싶지가않아요
review_en: This isn't how it works. I doubt if this is the place where the family can spend a time. All the food, beverage, and corner workers. without giving a winkI really don't want to come here.

review: 일단 날씨가 너무 추워서 매직 아일랜드 놀이기구가 많이 운행을 안했지만 다행히 내부 놀이기구만 많이 탔습니다. 좋은 추억 남기고 갑니다.
review_en: First of all, the magic island rides did not run much because the weather was so cold, but fortunately, I only rode the inside rides a lot. I made good memories.

review: 언제나가도 행복해지고 동심유발되는곳이네요 사람많지않을때가면 더좋을것같아요 꼭 할인받아서 가는걸 추천!
review_en: It's a place where you're always happy and have children. It would be better when there aren't many people. I recommend you to get a discount!

review: 음... 좋았는데 줄을 너무 오래서야돼고 매직 패스 해서 예약할려고 하면 예약시간에 맞춰서 예약해야돼는 않될 가능선이 98프로.딱 시간이 돼면 1분 1초도 아깝고 버튼을 바로 눌러야돼고. 가족이 3면아님 4명이면 않 될가능성이 99프로임. 근데 탈때는 좋았음. 롳데월드 갈때 꼭! 매직 패스로 일찍가서 예약 다 해놓고 신나게 놀으세염.
review_en: Well, it was good, but if you want to make a reservation after passing a magic pass, 98 percent of the chances are that you won't have to make a reservation on time. If you have time, you can't waste a minute and a second. If you have time, you have to press the button right away. It's 99% likely that there's no family of four, not three. But I liked it when I rode it. When you go to Colde World! Let's go early by magic pass, make a reservation, and have fun.

review: 할로윈 시즌에 방문했는데 너무 좋았어요 어렸을땐 놀이기구 타느라 정신없었는데 .. 야간에 가서 퍼레이드도 보고 하니까 색달라서 너무 좋았어요
review_en: I visited there during the Halloween season and it was so nice. When I was young, I was busy riding the rides. It was so nice to see the parade at night.

review: 너무즐거웠으며 매직패스로 빨리 탈수있어서 너무 좋았다. 또한 퍼레이드도 너무즐거웠으며 아쉬운점은 타도싶은것리 퍼래이드때문에 못찬던 것이 아쉬웠다
review_en: It was so fun and it was great to ride it quickly with magic pass. Also, the parade was so fun and the sad thing was that I couldn't wear it because of the parade.

review: 미친 2분을 위해 3시간 대기 실화냐?? 집에서 영화 5편 볼듯ㅋ 입시끝난 12월은 올데가 아닙니다~!~!~!~!
review_en: Is this a three-hour wait for two crazy minutes? Like watching 5 movies at home. December is not the end of the college entrance exam.

review: 실내에도 놀이기구가 있는 롯데월드가 아무래도 더 붐비는 것 같아요. 야간권도 있으니 늦게 가실 분 추천
review_en: I think Lotte World, which also has rides indoors, is more crowded. We have night passes, so we recommend those who want to go late.

review: 서울에서 지하철로 방문할 수 있는 놀이공원 이라는데 큰 의미가 있는거 같습니다. 놀이공원보다는 아이스링크장 때문에 방문했네요.
review_en: It is an amusement park that can be visited by subway in Seoul. You visited because of an ice rink rather than an amusement park.

review: 길못찾아 뱅글뱅글 물어볼 직원도 잘 안보이고 더군다나 유모차 있으니 길찾는게 더 힘드네요.
review_en: I can't see the staff who can't find the way, and besides, it's harder to find the way because there's a stroller.

review: 한여름에도 즐길 수 있는 스케이트 장도 좋고 서울에 있어 접근성도 좋은 너무 크지도 너무 작지도 않은 크기의 놀이동산입니다. 주변에 석촌호수가 있어 산책하기에도 좋아요 봄에는 벚꽃을 볼 수 있는 최고의 데이트 장소 중 하나이기도 합니다 ㅎㅎ
review_en: There is a skating rink that you can enjoy in the middle of summer, and it is accessible to Seoul, so it is not too big or too small. There's Seokchon Lake around here, so it's good for a walk. It is also one of the best dating places to see cherry blossoms in spring. Haha

review: 매직패스 잘 이용하세요 시간에맞춰 계획 잘 짜면 핫어트랙션들 잘 이용가능합니다. 시간배분이 중요해요
review_en: Make sure you use your Magic Pass. Hot attractions are available if you plan well on time. Time allocation is important.

review: 좀 오래되긴 했으나 제일 유명한 놀이공원! 하지만 오래된 만큼 이제 보수가 필요한 듯. 놀이기구도 이제 다 시시하지만 추억쌓기에 그만
review_en: It's been a while, but it's the most famous amusement park! But I think it needs to be repaired as it's old. All the rides are boring now, but it's enough to build memories.

review: 탈만한 놀이기구는 점검이란이유로 다 운행중지중이고 그때문에 간단하게 탈수 있던 놀이기구로 사람이 몰려 제대로 시간을 보내지도 못했다 평일이라 그래도 조금은 탈수있을줄알았는데 일부러 시간내서 온게 무색할만큼 큰실망만 안고왔음 다시는 오고 싶지 않다는생각까지 들었다
review_en: All the rides that are good to ride are stopped because of inspection, and because of that, I couldn't even spend my time properly because of the crowds of people using the simple rides that I could ride. I thought I could ride it a little bit because it was a weekday, but if I came here with such disappointment that I took the time to come here, I even thought I didn't want to come again.

review: 롯데월드 안의 놀이기구도 좋지만 한여름에도 이용할 수 있는 스케이트장도 좋습니다. 주변 석촌호수 산책길도 좋습니다.
review_en: The rides in Lotte World are good, but the skating rink that can be used in the middle of summer is also good. The nearby Seokchon Lake promenade is also good.

review: 사실 놀이동산이 그렇게 크진 않지만 그래도 아이가 있다면 즐기기는 충분한 것같습니다 서울에 있어 접근성도 편합니다
review_en: Actually, amusement parks aren't that big, but if you have kids, it's enough to enjoy them. As I am in Seoul, accessibility is also convenient.

review: 도심에서 지하철 타고 이동할 수 있는 곳이죠~ 내부뿐만 아니라 외부에도 놀이기구가 많아요!!!
review_en: You can take the subway from the city center. There are many rides not only inside but also outside!!!

review: 도심속에서 놀이동산이 있는것이 신기합니다. 가까운 놀이동산 가고 싶다면 여기가 최고 입니다. 놀이기구 다양해서 어른도 즐기기 좋아요
review_en: It is amazing that there is an amusement park in the city center. If you want to go to a nearby amusement park, this is the best place. There are various rides, so it's good for adults to enjoy.

review: 사실 어트랙션은 에버랜드에 비해 많이 부족하지만 접근성 하나는 정말 좋습니다. 도심에서 가족 친구 연인 모두 함께 즐길 수 있는 테마파크 입니다.
review_en: Actually, the attraction is much less than Everland, but the accessibility is really good. It is a theme park where family, friends, and lovers can enjoy together in the city center.

review: 롯데월드를 추천하는 이유는 4계절 방문하기 편리 하기 떄문입니다. 실내, 실외 모두 있어 비가 오나, 눈이오나 실내에서 시간을 보내기에 매우 좋습니다. 어트렉션이 조금 연식이 있어 시시할 수도 있지만, 어린이들에게는 매우 추천입니다.
review_en: The reason why I recommend Lotte World is because it is convenient to visit 4 seasons. It's great to spend time indoors, whether it's raining or snowing. It may be boring because of some years of age, but it's highly recommended for children.

review: 진짜 그거폰 1달도 안됏는데... 잃어 버렷어요 오늘 진짜로요 뻥 아닙니다 꼭 찾아주세요 제제발요 택배는 선불 아님 착불로 해주세요 롯데 월드 님 제발로요
review_en: I haven't even been on that phone for a month. I lost it. I'm serious today. I'm not kidding. Please find me. Please. I'd like to pay for the delivery in advance or in advance. Lotte World, please.

review: 용인 애o랜드도 너무 좋아하지만 너무 춥고 더운날은 못가겠더라구요 ㅠㅠ 하지만 롯데월드는 야외뿐만 아니라 실내에도 다양한 즐길거리가 있어서 좋아요 접급성이 좋다는게 롯데월드의 가장 큰 장점 이라고 생각해요 !
review_en: I love Yongin Ao Land, but I can't go on a hot and cold day. But Lotte World has various things to enjoy indoors as well as outdoors. I think the biggest advantage of Lotte World is its good reception!

review: 언제나 재미있습니다 사람이 많은게 흠이지만.. 아틀란티스, 혜성특급 아무리 타도 질리지 않아요
review_en: It's always fun. The flaw is that there are so many people. Atlantis, I can't get enough of Comet Express.

review: 저녁때 야간으로 들어갔을때라 매직아일랜드쪽엔 좀비분장하신분들이 많았어요 할로윈 코스프레 좋아하시는분들에게는 할로윈 기간에 가는거 추천입니다.
review_en: There were a lot of zombies in Magic Island when I went in at night. For those who like Halloween costume, I recommend going there during Halloween.

review: 실내 놀이기구 시설도 잘 되어있어서, 날씨가 춥거나 더워도 편하게 놀 수 있어서 좋아요. 매 달 다양한 할인 이벤트도 진행하니 할인은 꼭 챙기시길 추천!
review_en: The indoor rides are also well equipped, so it's good to play comfortably even if the weather is cold or hot. There are also various discount events every month, so make sure to bring a discount!

review: 친구들이랑 가서 놀이기구 타고 간식 사먹고하면 하루 금방가는 곳!!!ㅋㅋ 더울때가면 줄 기다리는게 진짜 힘들긴 합니다...
review_en: If you go with your friends and buy snacks on the rides, you'll get there in a day!!!It is really hard to wait for the line when it is hot.

review: 지하철로 갈 수 있어서 가깝고 실내와 실외로 나누어져 있어서 비올때도 이용할 수 있습니다.
review_en: You can go by subway, so you can use it when it rains because it's close and divided into indoor and outdoor sections.

review: 전 에버랜드가 더 좋더라구요. 오랜만에 롯데월드 갔는데.. 별루였어요. 날좀 풀리면 에버랜드 고고
review_en: I prefer Everland. I went to Lotte World after a long time. Go to Everland when it gets warmer.

review: 서울에서 대중교통을 이용해 손쉽게 갈 수 있는 놀이공원이죠. 여러 놀이기구들이 있고 아이들이 좋아하는 곳입니다.
review_en: It's an amusement park where you can easily go by public transportation from Seoul. There are many rides and children like this place.

review: 어릴 때 부터 자주 갔던 곳이지만 매번 새롭고 매번 설레입니다. 다만 인기가 있는 어트렉션은 2시간이 넘도록 기다려야하는게 힘듭니다
review_en: I have been to this place since I was young, but it is new and exciting every time. But it's hard to wait for more than two hours for a popular attraction.

review: 정가주고가긴 아깝고 세일가로 가끔 가긴 괜찮습니다 아틀란티스랑 혜성특급이 제일 재밌어요..
review_en: It's a waste of money, but sometimes it's okay to go to the sale price. Atlantis and Comet Express are the most fun.

review: 3년만에 가게된 놀이공원이었는데 진짜 하루 너무 알차게 잘 놀다왔습니다! 할로윈 퍼레이드 보고 크리스마스 퍼레이드도 보고싶어서 이번주에도 놀러가요~~~~!>_<
review_en: It's been 3 years since I went to an amusement park. I had a great day. I want to see the Halloween parade and the Christmas parade, so I'm going to play this week.>_<

review: 아들,딸 커가는 모습을 바라보는것도 즐거움이지만 놀이공원에 와서 놀이기구 탄다고 설레이고 즐거워하는 모습을 보는것도 엄청 행복하더라고요 한해 한해 탈수있는 놀이기구도 틀려지고 보는 관점도 틀려지고 아빠 나 이거 몇살때 타봤는데 이런말 들을때 마다 뿌듯함이 ㅎㅎㅎ 롯데월드는 4계절 아무때나 찾아 올수 있어서 더욱 좋은거 같아요. 이쁜 추억 만들게 해주셔서 감사합니다^^// 12월2일 다시 갈 계획이에요 10월에 갔을때 좋았나봐요 ㅋㄷ 앞으로 더 많은 이벤트와 추억 만들수 있게 힘써주세요
review_en: It's fun to see my son and daughter grow up, but I'm also very happy to see them go to the amusement park. The rides that I can ride for a year are different. My view is different. Dad, I rode this when I was a few years old. Whenever I hear this, I feel proud. I think Lotte World is even better because I can come to visit whenever I want. Thank you for letting me make beautiful memories.I'm planning to go back on December 2nd. I think it was good when I went in October. Please do your best to make more events and memories in the future.

review: 여자친구랑 와서 더떨리고 재미있네요 손잡구 타구 막구앴는데 너무너무 설게고 좋았어요 앞으로도 많이 이용할것 같아요 직원분들도 친절하고 서비스가 잘되어 있어요 감사합니다!! 오늘같이 행복한 날이 이어지면 좋겠네요!! 롯데월드 화이팅 추운데 고생하는 직원분들도 화이팅!! 힘내고 좋은 하루 되세요!!
review_en: I'm more nervous and fun because I came here with my girlfriend. I was so nervous and excited. I think I'll use it a lot in the future. The staff is kind and well-served. Thank you!! I hope this happy day will continue!! Lotte World, fighting! Even the employees who are suffering from the cold, fighting!! Cheer up and have a good day!!

review: 롯데월드 입장권 싸게 나올 때도 많고 서울 사는 사람이면 롯데월드가 편해요. 시설이 많이 낙후되었지만 어린시절 향수를 떠올릴 사람들은 롯데월드가 괜찮아요~!
review_en: There are times when tickets to Lotte World are cheap, and if you live in Seoul, Lotte World is convenient. Although the facilities are far behind, Lotte World is good for those who will think of perfume as a child.

review: 솔직히 에버랜드보다 놀이기구 안무섭고 정기점검 많이해서 짜증나긴 하지만.. 그래도 언제가도 신나고 그 주변 잠실에 볼거리도 너무 많음
review_en: Honestly, it's annoying to do more regular inspections and choreography of rides than Everland. But it's always exciting, and there's so much to see in the Jamsil area.

review: 놀이공원에 매년 가지만 항상 갈 때마다 즐거운 장소입니다. 이번에는 할로윈 축제 기간 때에 방문했는데, 야간에 야외를 잘 꾸며 놓고 실감나는 좀비들이 계속 돌아다녀서 재미있었습니다. 매년 방문할 때마다 기대되는 곳입니다.
review_en: I go to the amusement park every year, but it is always a fun place. This time, I visited during the Halloween festival, and it was fun to see realistic zombies walking around at night. It's a place I'm looking forward to every time I visit.

review: 아이스링크장도 있고 겨울에 에버랜드는 추우니 롯데월드로 가는게 더 좋습니다. 개인적으로 에버랜드보다 롯데월드의 놀이기구가 더 무서운 것 같습니다!
review_en: There is an ice rink and it is better to go to Lotte World because it is cold in winter. Personally, I think Lotte World's rides are scarier than Everland!

review: 롯데월드 사랑합니다.... 미리 예약해놨다가 먼저 입장하는 시스템 있으니까 그거 잘 이용하시면 효율적으로 이용할 수 있을 것 같아요~~ 롯데월드 재밌어요ㅎㅎ
review_en: I love Lotte World... There's a system that makes reservations in advance and then enters first, so I think you can use it efficiently if you use it well.Lotte World is fun.Haha

review: 변하지도않는 페레이드와 노후된 시설들.. 2년전에 지방으로 가기전까지 우리아이들 놀이터로 한4년간 연간이용권 이용하다.. 몇년동안 변함이없어 애들이 식상해하길래 용인으로 발길옴긴후 오늘 비도오고 오랜만에 왔드만....그데로인데다 .....오히려 시설이 노후된건지 정전에 ...시설이상으로 정지까지...급 후회되네요 8시간이 넘도로 기구는 3개정도에 퍼레이드만 보구 귀가하네요....
review_en: Unchanging ferrades and decrepit facilities. I used the annual pass for 4 years as a playground for my children until I went to the countryside 2 years ago. It's been a while since it rained today and it's been a while since I came to Yongin because the kids were bored after years.That's where it is and...Rather, it's because the facilities are old.To a halt over the facility...I regret it all of a sudden. Over eight hours, the balloon goes home after three parades....

review: 실내가 있기 때문에 비오거나 눈오거나 춥거나 해도 이용 가능합니다 날씨에 영향을 안받는게 가장 큰 장점인것 같고 놀이기구 종류도 많고 재미있어요!
review_en: It's available even if it's raining, snowing, or cold. I think the biggest advantage is not affected by the weather and there are many types of rides and it is fun!

review: 각종 놀이시설이 있고 접근성이 뛰어나 가장 추천하는 놀이공원입니다. 가족끼리 가도, 친구들과 가도 즐겁게 이용 할 수 있게 구성되어 있습니다. 실내/외 공간으로 나뉘어 날씨와 관계없이 즐길 수 있는 것도 장점입니다. 다만 사람이 많을때는 너무 오랜 시간을 기다려야 합니다.
review_en: It is the most recommended amusement park because it has various amusement facilities and excellent accessibility. It's made up for family and friends to enjoy. Another advantage is that you can enjoy it regardless of the weather, divided into indoor and outdoor spaces. But you have to wait too long when there are too many people.

review: 학창시절을 잠실에서 보내서 어릴때마다 갔던 곳이지만 갈때마다 좋다.놀이동산의 정석이라고 생각한다. 그치만, 운행중지를 하는 놀이기구들이 너무 많아서 아쉽다.
review_en: I spent my school days in Jamsil, so I went there every time I was young, but it's good every time I go.I think it is the standard of amusement park. However, it is a shame that there are so many rides that stop operation.

review: 서울랜드나 에버랜드에 비해 접근성도 좋고 근처에 롯데월드 몰이있어서 좋습니다 자주 갈께요 ㅎㅎ
review_en: Compared to Seoul Land or Everland, it is more accessible and has Lotte World Mall nearby. I will go there often.

review: 롯데월드 할인받아서 갔어요! 매번 프로모션 다르니까 홈페이지 참고해서 꼭 할인받아서 가세여 ㅠ ㅠ 늘 사람이 많지만 혜성특급은 진짜 너무 존잼
review_en: I went to Lotte World with a discount! The promotions are different every time, so please refer to the website and get a discount. There are always a lot of people, but the comet specials are so much fun.

review: 날씨 추워졌지만 실내에서 놀이기구 즐길 수 도 있어서 좋아요. 아이스스케이트 타거나 볼링치기도 좋아요.
review_en: It's getting cold, but it's nice to be able to enjoy rides indoors. It's also good for ice skating and bowling.

review: 도심에서 접근하기 쉽고 실내외 둘다 있어서 날씨의 영향을 안받아서 좋다.어트랙션도 나름 다양한 편이고 퍼레이드도 괜찮다. 다만, 휴일에는 추천하지 않는다. 사람이 너무너무 많다. 대기하는것도 힘들고 주말에 가면 기다리다 시간 다 가서 몇개 타지도 못한다. 그래도 가깝게 놀이공원 가고싶다면 뭐... 평일 오전을 추천한다
review_en: It's easy to access from the city center and it's good to have both indoor and outdoor weather.There are various types of attractions and parades are good. However, it is not recommended on holidays. There are too many people. It's hard to wait and I can't even ride a few rides on weekends. But if you want to go to the amusement park close by... I recommend a weekday morning.

review: 운치있고 사람도 적당하고 겨울분위기 물씬이네요 맘껏 즐기고 타고 노는중이에요 매직패스도좋네요
review_en: It's beautiful, it's nice, it's nice, it's nice, it's nice, it's nice, it's nice, it's nice, it's nice, it's

review: 계절 상관없이 유아들이 즐길 수 있는 놀이동산은 여기만한데가 없음 다만 줄을 너무 길게 서야하므로 날을 잘 골라가면 좋겠음 앱의 놀이기구 예약시스템을 전략적으로 이용해야 함
review_en: There is no better place for children to enjoy than here, regardless of the season, but I hope you can choose a good day because you have to line up too long. I need to strategically use the app's ride reservation system.

review: 울산에서 아이 병원 진료 때문에 한달에 한번 상경하네요. 초1 인 저희 아이 롯데월드 어드벤처에서제일 재미있어하는 것은 신밧드의 모험이랍니다. 3년전에도 1년전에도 올해도 전혀 변함없는 신밧드의모험인데도 불구하고 좋아라하네요.^^ 바라는게 있다면 기존의 것에 새로운 것들의 가미해서 업그레이드를 했으면 하는 바램이 있네요.
review_en: I come to Seoul once a month because of my child's hospital treatment in Ulsan. The most interesting thing in Lotte World Adventure is the adventure of Sinbad. Even though it was an adventure of Sinbad 3 years ago and 1 year ago this year, it is still good.^^ If there is anything I want, I would like to upgrade it by adding new things to the existing ones.

review: 신나고 재미난 롯데월드~~^^ 재미난 공연이 아주 많아여. 행사도 많고 아이들이 가서 놀기에 아주 쪼아요
review_en: There are so many fun and exciting Lotte World performances. There's a lot of events, and it's a little tight for kids to play

review: 서울에서 가기엔 제일 접근성이 좋은 놀이공원입니다. 또한 무엇보다 실내가 잘 되어 있어서 추울 때나 더울 때 이용하기도 가장 좋고요. 할인 받을 수 있는 팁을 알고 가면 좀 더 다양하게 받을 수 있습니다. 다만 요새 새로 생겨난 4D 관련 놀이기구들은 메인 공간에서 좀 떨어져 있기 때문에 길을 잘 찾아서 가야 합니다.
review_en: It is the most accessible amusement park to go to from Seoul. Also, the room is well-equipped, so it's best to use it when it's cold or hot. You can get more variety if you know how to get a discount. However, the new 4D rides are a bit far from the main area, so you have to find your way.

review: 할로윈때 갔다가 아주 깔려죽을뻔햇네요....ㅠㅠㅠ중고등학생들도많고..주말엔 정말정말 비추입니다. 4시간동안 놀이기구 2개탔네요...^^
review_en: I almost died on Halloween...There are many middle and high school students.It's really really not on the weekend. I rode 2 rides for 4 hours...^^

review: 실내 실외 다 이용 가능하여 날씨의 영향을 덜 받습니다. 다양한 퍼레이드가 열려 연간회원권을 끊어 아이들과 자주 가는 것도 좋습니다.
review_en: It is available both indoors and outdoors, so the weather is less affected. Various parades are held, so it's good to get annual memberships and go there often with children.

review: 새로운 놀이기구들이 생겨서 신기. 밖이 추우니 옷을 단디 입어야함 특히 저녁에 갑자기 추워지고 바람 많이 붐!!
review_en: It's amazing that there are new rides. It's cold outside, so you have to dress neatly, especially in the evening, it suddenly gets cold and windy!!

review: 실내외 놀이공원이 잘 갖추어져있고 내부에 아이스링크장도 있어요. 친구들과 함께 놀러가기 좋아요
review_en: The indoor and outdoor amusement park is well equipped and there is an ice rink inside. It's good to go out with friends.

review: 실내와 실외가 있어서 겨울철이나 비올때도 괜찮아요. 퍼레이드가 볼만하고 아이들을 위한 zone 어른들을 위한 zone이 조금 나눠있기는 하지만 키제한이 좀있는 어트렉션은 뭐랄까 으스스하고 무시무시한 사운드와 분위기 대문에 아이가 싫어했어요. 디즈니를 보고 배워야 합니다.
review_en: It's good for winter and rainy days because there are indoor and outdoor areas. Parades are worth watching, zones for children, and zones for adults, but the tall-limbed attraction was something the kid hated because of its spooky sound and mood. You have to learn from Disney.

review: 서울에서 제일 익사이팅한 곳으로 좁은 곳을 최대 활용하여 즐거운 액티비티를 만들었다. 실내와 실외 모두 즐길거리가 가득한곳
review_en: It was the most exciting place in Seoul and I made a fun activity by making the most of the narrow place. a place full of things to enjoy both indoor and outdoor

review: 서울에 있고 접근성이 좋고 다양한 어트랙션 및 체험기구들이 많아 외국 관광객들이 이용하기엔 아주 제격이다. 특히 얼마전에 오픈한 월드타워 까지 같이 이용한다면 더 만족스런 여행이 될 것이다.
review_en: It is perfect for foreign tourists because it is located in Seoul and has a lot of accessibility and various attractions and experience equipment. Especially, it will be a more satisfying trip if we use the World Tower which opened recently together.

review: 아이들과 함께왔는데 매직패스로 인해 기다리지않고 탈수있어서 너무좋아요^^ 매직패스때문이라도 롯데월드 자주올것같아요
review_en: I came here with my kids, but I'm so happy that I can ride it without waiting because of the magic pass.I think I will come to Lotte World often because of Magic Pass.

review: 오래된 놀이공원이라 그런지 화려하진 않지만 애들이랑 오기 좋은 것같아요~ 그냥 분위기가 좋아요~
review_en: It's not fancy because it's an old amusement park, but I think it's a good place to come with the kids. I just like the atmosphere.

review: 추운 날씨 아이들 데리고 갈만힐 곳 찾다가 찾아온 롯데월드 ~~매직패스 이용해서 기다리는 시길도 짧고 아이들과 즐거운 시간도 가지고~좋아요ㆍ좋아
review_en: Lotte World, which I came to find a place to take my children to in the cold weather, has a short time waiting with Magic Pass and had a great time with them.All right, all right.

review: 단체 외국 관광객이 많았어서 요즘은 이용하기 힘든듯 해요. 그래도 어릴때 사랑하던 장소여서, 좋아요.
review_en: It seems difficult to use these days because there were many group foreign tourists. But it's a place I used to love when I was young, so I like it

review: 부산에서 서울구경~ 딸과 추억만들기~롯데월드~~ 항상 기달림의 연속~~매직패스도 빨리 마감 요건 힘들어요~하지만 크리스마스 퍼레이드 완전 짱~~
review_en: Touring Seoul from Busan~ Making memories with my daughter~ Lotte World~~~~ Always waiting~~ Magic passes are hard to finish quickly~But the Christmas parade is awesome.

review: 이벤트에 포함되어있기도 하고 그래서 가족과 같이 오랫만에 방문을 하였는데 100%예약제 실행이 진행하는 놀이기구가 있어 예약해야만 이용이 가능하다고 안내는 받았으나 이렇게 예약이 안되고 느려서 불편했습니다. 제안을 하자면 시간대로 선택을하게 바꿔주셨으면 좋겠습니다. 대학교 수강신청하는 느낌이였습니다. 15분단위로 열린다고하지만 맨낭 핸드폰 붙잡고 놀이기구를 타는 것도 아니고... 그리고 100% 실행하는 놀이기구와 아닌것을 분리해주셨으면 좋겠어요 너무 오랜만에 와서 어디가 어딘지도 모르고 뭐가
review_en: It was included in the event and so I visited after a long time with my family, but I was informed that I could only use it if I made a reservation because there was a ride that ran 100% reservation system, but it was inconvenient because I couldn't make a reservation. I'd like you to change the time to make the choice. It felt like I was applying for a university course. It's supposed to be open in 15 minutes, but it's not like I'm taking a ride with my cell phone. And I'd like you to separate the rides that run 100% and the ones that don't. It's been so long, I don't know where I am.

review: 어린이들한텐 더없이 좋은곳이죠~ 스케이트장과 먹거리 놀거리 쇼핑거리!!! 전부 한꺼번에 즐길수있고 하루종일 놀수 있는 곳이죠~ 어른들도 데이트코스로도 좋구 외식장소도 많구요!!
review_en: It's a great place for children! Skate, food, shopping! It's a place where you can enjoy all at once and play all day. It's good for adults to go on a date course and there's a lot of places to eat out!!

review: 8년만인가..만에 갔는데 추억돋더군요 ㅎ 어릴땐 머가 좋았는지 ㅎㅎ 할인폭도 넓어졌고 예전보다 붐비지않으니 한번쯤 예전생각하시며 방문하면 좋을거같아요. 전 그랬어요 :)
review_en: It's been 8 years since I went there. It reminds me of memories. What was good when I was young? The discount range has expanded. It's not as crowded as before, so I hope you think about the past and visit. I was:)

review: 오늘 롯데 월드를 다녀왔는데 넘 넘 재미있고, 직원분들도 친절하셔서 넘 좋았네요~ㅋㅋ 글구 친구들도 너무 좋아서 막 신났었어요~^^ 다음에도 또 방문할께염~^^
review_en: I went to Lotte World today and it was so much fun and it was great that the staff were so kind.I was so excited because my friends were so happy.I will visit you again next time.^^

review: 사람이 많은데 안전요원 및 질서를 위한 관리가 소올하네요 오랜만에 갓는데 아쉬움이 남아요 몬 리뷰가 50자를 넘겨야 해 ㅡㅡ 그냥 남기면 되지
review_en: There's a lot of people out there, and there's a lot of security and order management It's been a while since I've been there, and it's a shame that the mon review has to be over 50 characters -- you can just leave it.

review: 학창시절 현장학습으로도 방문했고 성인이 되어서도 시즌일때 꽃축제라든가 할로윈 크리스마스 등등 특별한 때에는 가끔 방문하는 편입니다. 갈때마다 많은 인파때문에 정신없고 복잡하지만 언제나 유쾌하고 즐겁게 시간을 보낼 수 있습니다. 시설은 다소 낡아서 보수가 필요하다고 생각됩니다. 그래도 서울 도심에 가족끼리 연인끼리 친구끼리 충부니 즐길 수 있습니다.
review_en: When I was a student, I visited the field trip and even when I became an adult, I sometimes visit the flower festival, Halloween, and Christmas. Every time I go there, it's very crowded and crowded, but I can always have fun and have fun. I think the facility is a bit old and needs repair. Still, you can enjoy your family, lovers, and friends in downtown Seoul.

review: 최고에요 또올게요!!! 태어나서 처음으로 100일을 맞았는데 너무 좋은 추억을 얻고가는거같아용 나중에 평일에도 와서 많이 타야겟서욯ㅎㅎ
review_en: It's the best. I'll be back! It's my first 100 days in my life and I think I'm getting a lot of good memories. I'll have to come and ride a lot on weekdays later.

review: 역시 사람이 미어터지고 줄 1시간이상 기다려야함 정말 힘들지만 친구랑 대화하면서 기다리기로
review_en: It's really hard to wait for more than an hour for a person to meet and talk to a friend.

review: 할로윈축제때 처음갔는데 진짜 재미있었고 좀비들 .. 무서웠습니다 분장도 완전 잘 해주셔서 좋았어요 ㅎㅎ 재미있고 힘든 하루 였습니다 😻
review_en: I went to the Halloween festival for the first time and it was really fun and the zombies... I was scared. I was glad that you dressed up so well. It was a fun and hard day. 😻

review: 나이가 들어서인지 가격이 비싸서인지 연간회원권하고 밥먹듯이 들어가서 그냥 데이트 하실 분들이라든지 놀이기구 정말 좋아하는 분들 아니면 금액이 생각보다 아까워졌네요 나름 추억이 많은 장소이지만 갈수록 안가게 되는곳입니다
review_en: I don't know if it's because I'm old or expensive, but I don't think it's a waste of money for people who want to go out on a date or really like rides. It's a place where I have a lot of memories, but I don't go there anymore.

review: 일단 주말이라서 뭐.. 그렇겠지만 솔직히 줄 설때 쫌 엉망진창이다. 자이오드롭2VR 줄같아서 섰는데 자이로스윙이였고 후렌치레볼루션을 기다릴땐 사람들이 한사람이상 남겨놓고 먹을꺼 다먹고 살꺼다사고 심지어 오늘 내앞에 섰던 여러 남여 학생들이 옆에 계단에서 담배를 피고 냄새를 풀풀 풍기며 같이 기다렸다 또 너무 오래기다렸고 더 기다려야한다는 생각에 그냥 나와버렸지만 줄을 정리라 치고 하시던데 솔직히... 이 점에 대해서 롯데월드는 생각해봐야 한다!!! 나머지는... 재밌었음 아참 매직패스 예약
review_en: Well, it's the weekend, so... I'm sure so, but honestly, it's a bit of a mess when I'm in line up. I stood there like a line from the Ziodrop2VR, but it was Gyro Swing, and when I was waiting for the French Revolution, people would have left more than one person to eat, and even today, many male and female students who were standing in front of me were smoking on the stairs next to me and blowing off their scents, waiting with me. I waited too long, and I thought I had to wait longer, so I just came out, but you called it a line-up, but honestly... Lotte World should think about this!!! The rest... Funny, Manny Magic Pass Reservation

review: 입장제한을 하던지 사람이 그렇게 많은건 처음봄 이동하는데도 통제도 안되고 가는 길마다 유모차에 사람에 복잡복잡 ㅡㅡ 무조건 오는데로 다 받을 작정인건가? 한사람 넘어지기라도 한다면.. 끔찍 ㅡㅡ 어느정도 휴일이라 예상은하고 갔지만 이건 뭐 해도해도 너무함 들어간지 4시간만에 놀이기구 2개타고 사람에 치이다 밀리다 그냥 포기하고 나옴 ,, 매직패스라고 접속도 안되고 .. 엉망징창.. 아우 당분간 절대 롯데월드 안갈생각임
review_en: You're going to get all the entrance restrictions and all the people on the way out of control in the first spring, and you're going to get all the crowded strollers in the stroller on the way -- no matter what? If one of you falls... Terrible -- I've been expecting it to be a holiday for some time, but it's just two rides in four hours and I've been pushed by people, and I just gave up, and I can't even access it as a magic pass. Oh, I will never go to Lotte World for a while.

review: 이미 줄이 많이서 자유이용권 사도 못타 돈아까워 ....갠히 왓다 입장할때 말이하도 해줘야하는거 아닌가? 이정도면 일일 입장가능 및 이용가능 인원이 잇을건데 아 .... 개 열받 롯데
review_en: There are already so many lines that I can't even buy a free pass.Don't you have to tell me when you enter? At this rate, there will be daily admittance and availability. Dog Furious Lotte

review: 다시는애들데리고 안가리라다짐한하루.. 매직패스앱은이미먹통에 언더월드롯데리아는 감자튀김마저 썩은게나오고 아~~~주잘놀다왔음
review_en: I'll never leave them again. Magic Pass app is already eating, but Underworld Lotteria has rotted french fries. Ah~~~~~~ I had fun.

review: 회전바구니를 좋아하는 아이들을 위해 그긴줄을 섰어요 추석연휴라. 사람들이 정말 많았어요. 그래도 타고 싶어하는 아이들을 위해 줄을 섰습니다. 그런데. 저희가 마지막이었어요. 아이들과 말을하고 있는데. 여자분이 오시더니 줄안쪽으로 들어가세요 라고 하시면서 줄을 치는데. 제가 네 라고 말을 했는데 다시 줄안쪽으로 들어가세요. 라며 일더라구요 그래서 쳐다봤죠 그 여자분은 아랑곳하지 않고 쇠막대기는 사정 없이 땅에 꽃고는. 거기에 줄을. 매달더라구요. 근데 마음에 않들었는지. 제가 놀랄정도로
review_en: I drew a line for kids who love spinning baskets. Chuseok holiday. There were so many people. I lined up for kids who still want to ride. But we were the last ones. I'm talking to the kids. A woman came and said, "Go inside the line." She was in line. I said yes, but go back to the inside of the line. She said, "Oh, my God. So I looked at him. Her iron bars fluttered freely on the ground. There's a line. He hung it. But I don't know if you liked it. To the extent that I am surprised,

review: 사람은 많고 핸드폰어플은 무용지물이고 전화서비스센터 고객대응최악이고 전혀상대해줄맘이없습니다.
review_en: There are a lot of people and mobile phone applications are useless and the telephone service center's customer response is the worst, and I have no intention of dealing with them at all.

review: 보통 놀이공원은 도심에서 살짝 멀리 떨어져 있는 편인데, 롯데월드는 정말 특이하게 도심 한복판에 있죠. 게다가 재미있는 놀이기구도 많답니다. 실내 놀이공원과 실외 놀이공원을 함께 즐길 수 있는 것도 롯데월드의 매력이라고 생각해요.
review_en: Usually, amusement parks are a little far from the city center, but Lotte World is very unique in the middle of the city. In addition, there are many fun rides. I think Lotte World's charm is that we can enjoy indoor and outdoor amusement parks together.

review: 사람이 많아도 너무 많았습니다. 2시간 기다려서 2초의 스릴을 3시간 기다려서 3분의 비명을 그러하였습니다. 30분 기다려서 탑승하게되면 왜 이토록 짧게 기다렸던건지 금새 알 수 있습니다. '아-분홍색표시(고스릴)가 아닌거 였구나~' 3회 사용가능한매직패스는 마치 로또당첨스런 특혜였고 돈주고 사는 매직패스권 (5종,자유권)은 금새 매진이었습니다. '아이고 다리야~' 다음번엔 낚시의자와 기다리면서 즐길 수 있는 무언가를 가지고 가렵니다.
review_en: There were too many people. I waited for 2 hours and waited 3 hours for the thrill of 2 seconds, so I screamed 3 minutes. If you wait 30 minutes before boarding, you can quickly see why you waited so long. "Oh, it wasn't a pink one." The three-time Magic Pass was like a lottery ticket, and the Magic Pass (5 types, free tickets) that I paid for quickly sold out. "Oh, my leg~" Next time, I'm going to take a fishing chair and something to enjoy while waiting.

review: 할로윈파티 구경 겸 간만에 롯데월드 다녀왔습니다~ 할로윈 이벤트로 좀비눈알(?)을 표현한 음료들과 좀비살점튀김 등... 무시무시한 음식들을 팔더군요ㅋㅋ 음료는 엄청 달달한게 맛있습니다. 이날은 바람이 불지 않아 간만에 자이로드롭도 탈 수 있었습니다 ㅎㅎ심지어 VR!! 내려갈때보다 올라갈때가 더무서운...아무튼 즐거운 시간되세요ㅋㅋㅋㅋ저녁에는 좀비들이 돌아다녀요
review_en: It's been a while since I went to Lotte World to watch Halloween party. For Halloween events, drinks that express zombie eyes, fried zombie flesh, etc.. They sell scary food.LOL The drinks are very sweet and delicious. It wasn't windy on this day, so I was able to ride a Gyro Drop in a while. Hahahaha It's scarier when you go up than when you go down...Anyway, have a good time.LOL. Zombies go around in the evening.

review: 일단 실내에도 놀이기구가 있어서 날씨와 관계없이 놀수있다는게 가장큰장점인 것같아요 다만 주말엔 항상 사람이많기때문에 동선을 효율적으로 잘짜셔야해요
review_en: First of all, there are rides indoors, so the biggest advantage is that we can play regardless of the weather. But there are always many people on weekends, so you have to make a good route.

review: 시내 한복판에 전세계 어디서 쉽게 보기힘든 큰 규모와 놀이기구들을 가지고 있습니다. 심지어 실내에 그 많은 놀이기구가 있다는 것은 롯데월드가 재미있는 점입니다. 100%예약제는 어플을 이용하나 전쟁에 가까운 경쟁률 때문에 약간의 비용을 추가 지불하더라도 쾌적한 이용을 할 수 있는 제도가 보강 되었으면 합니다.
review_en: In the middle of the city, there are large scale and rides that are not easily seen anywhere in the world. Even the fact that there are so many rides indoors is an interesting thing about Lotte World. I hope that the 100% reservation system uses the application, but because of the competition rate that is close to war, I hope the system will be strengthened to make a comfortable use even if I pay a little extra.

review: 장녀에 딸이랑 유치원 땡땡이 치고서 너무 재미있게 퍼레이드 본기역이 있어서 인지 딸아이가 이번에도 가싶다고 손꼽아 기다쳤어요 주말은 사람들이 너무 많이 있어 항상 평일에 움직이는 편이라서 이번에도 유치원 땡땡이 치고 롯데월드 할로윈 보러 신나게 고고 그런데 장년보다 조금 약한 것 같더라고요~ 하지만 공연이 훌륭해서 위로가 됐어요~~^^ 딸아이 때문에 할로윈 축제 끝나기전에 한반더 가야 할 것 같네요 ~~^^ 퍼레이드좀 보강해주시면 감사하게 습니다 이벤트도 부탁드려요 ~~^^😁
review_en: My oldest daughter and my daughter were in kindergarten, so I had so much fun watching the parade, so my daughter was waiting for me to go again. There are so many people on weekends, so I tend to move on weekdays, so let's play kindergarten again and go to Lotte World for Halloween. But I think it's a bit weak compared to the previous year. But the performance was great, so it comforted me.I think I'll have to go one more time before the Halloween festival ends because of my daughter. I would appreciate it if you could reinforce the parade. Please give me an event.

review: 후 5번째에 탑승신청 완료돼서 겨우탔네요 다들 터치가 어찌 그리빠르신지 ㄷ ㄷ 100%예약제가 넘 좋네여 쾌적하고^^ 몇명 못탄다고하니 더 타고싶음마음!
review_en: I finally got on the fifth ride. How fast is the touch? The 100% reservation system is so good. It's pleasant. How many people can't ride it, so I want to ride it more!

review: 어린 자녀분을 키우고 계시는 분이면 꼭 한번은 들려야 할곳 이라 생각 합니다. 서울시내에 위치하고 가장 가까운 놀이 공원으로 시설이나 규모 면에서 세계 어느나라에 ㅣ해도 손색이 없는 곳이라 생각 합니다. 어린의 동심과 어른들의 추억을 되살리수 있는 곳이
review_en: I think it's a must-visit place if you have a young child. It is located in Seoul and the nearest amusement park, and I think it is the best place in the world in terms of facilities and size. It's a place where you can bring back childhood innocence and memories of adults.

review: 우리 아이가 너무 무서워해서 몇개 못타고 심지어 밥도 못 먹고 돌아왔어요.ㅠㅜ 아이들 위해서라도 아이들 놀이기구 구역에만이라도 데코좀 치워주세요. 우리나라랑 상관도 없는 할로윈때문에 연갸 회원권 두달 날리게 생겼어요.
review_en: My child was so scared that I couldn't get a few rides and even eat.ᅮ Please remove the decorations just for the children's rides. Because of Halloween, which has nothing to do with Korea, I will lose my membership for two months.

review: 롯데월드 어린이들에게는 다양한볼거리와 먹거리 놀이터 가족들과 함께지내기도 좋은곳입니다 주위에 백화점 토속음식 민속촌 및 왕과 왕비에 옷을입고 사진촬영또한 한국을 방문하는분들에 좋은 추억거리가될것입니다 토속음식과 전통술또한 기억에남는 일이될것입니다
review_en: It is a good place for children of Lotte World to enjoy various things to see and eat with their families. It will also be a good memory for those who visit Korea wearing traditional department store food, folk village, king, and queen clothes. Folk food and traditional liquor will also be memorable.

review: 딸램의 에너지 소비용으로 제격인 롯데월드. 오랜만에 갔더니 VR놀이기구들이 많이 생겼습니다. 프렌치레볼루션도 자이로드롭도 모두 VR 착용기구로 바뀌었고 그 밖에도 3D놀이기구도 많이 생겼습니다. 조금 어지럽긴 하지만 새로운 시설이 생겨서 신선하고 좋습니다. 퍼레이드에서도 공 모양의 드론이 다양한 모양을 만드는 쇼도 생겼습니다.
review_en: Lotte World, the perfect place for energy consumption by Dallam. I went there for the first time in a while, so I got a lot of VR rides. French Revolution and Gyro Drop have all changed into VR wearable devices, and there are many other 3D rides. It's a little dizzy, but it's fresh and nice to have a new facility. In the parade, there was also a show where ball-shaped drones made various shapes.

review: 9월의 첫날 할로윈 축제로 학교도 빠뜨리며 다녀왔어요~ SBS특수분장팀에서 나와 분장도 해보고.. 6시가 되니 매직아일랜드에서 좀비등장으로 두근두근~ 역시나 잘 해놨더라구요~ 알면서도 섬뜩하고 깜짝깜짝 놀라고 ㅎㅎㅎ 8시부터는 본격적으로 좀비들과 즐길수있는 로떼왈두의 환상여행! 10월말 되기전 또한번 방문하려구요~♡
review_en: On the first day of September, I skipped school for Halloween. I got out of SBS special makeup team and tried makeup... At 6 o'clock, it's a zombie appearance in Magic Island. You did a great job. It's scary and surprising. From 8 o'clock, you can have fun with zombies. I'm going to visit you again before the end of October.♡

review: 아이엄마에게 이곳은 쉽게 즐길 수없는 성지이죠~ 연간회원이지만 아이들 챙기느라 엄마들은 타고싶은거 잘못타잖아요.. ㅠㅠ 가까스로 매직패스 예약을 성공하고 못타게 되더라도 마음을 놓고 있었는데.. 마침 예약한시간대에 아이가 잠이 들어서 언니랑 교대로 탔어요. 직원분들 너무 감동이에요! 친절하시고.. 유모차 때문에 출구쪽으로 안내해주시고 편하게 탔어요! 스트레스 제대로 풀었네요. 내일도 또 롯데월드 갈꺼에요! 감사합니다~^^
review_en: To my mom, this is a sacred place that you can't easily enjoy. You're an annual member, but mothers don't ride what they want to ride to take care of their children. I was relieved even if I managed to make a magic pass reservation and didn't get on it. My child fell asleep at the time of the reservation, so I took turns riding with my sister. I'm so touched! He's kind. I got in comfortably after you showed me to the exit because of the stroller! You got rid of your stress. I will go to Lotte World again tomorrow! Thank you~^^

review: 24개월 아들이 재미 있어함 옆에 따로 유료인 팀랩월드와 아쿠아리움도 볼 만함 할인되는 카드를 꼭 챙겨가야함
review_en: Team Lab World and Aquarium, which are paid separately next to 24-month-old son having fun, are also worth seeing. Make sure to bring a discounted card.

review: 사람이 많았지만 놀이동산 분위기 느끼면서 재밌게놀고왔습니다. 롯데월드 어플을 통해서 놀이기구 예약을 하려고 했는데 사람이 많아서인지 시간 맞게 예약을 하려고해도 1초만에 끝나버려서 매번기다려서 탔지만, 재미있었습니다
review_en: There were a lot of people, but I had a lot of fun with the atmosphere of the amusement park. I was going to make a reservation for rides through the Lotte World app, but even if I wanted to make a reservation on time, it ended in a second, so I waited and rode it every time, but it was fun.

review: 롯데 월드에 몇번 방문했지만 야간 퍼레이드 할때 매번 놀이 기구 타느라 잘 못봤었는데 이번에 앞자리에서 재미있게 잘 봤어요. 얘들이 너무 좋아해서 ㅎㅎ 전 놀익구가 더 좋지만 얘들운 퍼레이드가 좋었나봐요. ㅎㅎ 새로생긴 월드타워 전망대에도 낼 갈 예정이예요. 여름과 겨율엔 역쉬 실내가 최고 입니다.
review_en: I've been to Lotte World a few times, but during the night parade, I didn't see it well because I was riding the rides, but I enjoyed it in the front seat. They love it so much. I like Nolikgu better, but I guess I liked their parade. I'm planning to go to the new World Tower Observatory. In summer and at Gyeoyul, Yeokshi indoor is the best.

review: 직원들이 친절하게 맞아주시고, 요청한 사항을 바로 처리해 주어서 감사했습니다. 아이가 수영복을 갈아 입는 것도 도와주시고, 체크인 시간 보다 일찍 도착했는데 객실도 빠르게 준비해주셨습니다 . 주차할 수 있는 공간도 배려해주시고, 여러가지로 불편함 없이 즐겁게 휴일을 보낼 수 있었습니다.
review_en: I appreciate the staff's kindness and their prompt handling of the request. He helped my child change his swimsuit, and he arrived earlier than the check-in time, so he prepared a room quickly. We were able to enjoy the holiday without any inconvenience, considering the parking space.

review: 이달에두번째 방문아데 짜증납니다 매직패스는 계속 매진이고.. 하나타는데 2시간.1시간반 기다리고.. 너무고객배려가없네요 직접줄서서 타보십시오 번호표발급하고 앉아서기다리며 차도마시고 쉬기도하다 한번씩타면좋겠는데 줄서로 온건지.. 가족이 함께들길수가 없네요 부모는 줄만서야하고 서있느라 아이들 간식한번 맘놓고 먹일수도 없어요 무슨 대책을 세우시든지 해야겠어요 아무투 몇년간 롯데월드는 패스하고 싶어요
review_en: It's my second visit this month, and I'm annoyed. Magic passes are still sold out. Two hours to ride one.Wait an hour and a half. You're too careless. Please stand in line and try it. I'd like to get a ticket, sit down, drink tea, and take a rest, but I'm not sure if you came in line. I can't have my family together. Parents can't just stand in line and feed their kids snacks. I'm gonna have to figure something out. I want to pass Lotte World for a few years.

review: 어디로갈까 고민하다가 연간회원권을끊고 시원하고 잼있는 휴가을 롯데월드에서 보내게되서 좋았어요
review_en: I was thinking about where to go, but I got to cut off my annual membership and spend a cool and fun vacation at Lotte World.

review: 여름엔 실내가 제격이죠 퍼레이드 아이가 너무 좋아해서 자주 가게되는거 같아요. 신장 100센티 넘으니 제법 탈것도 생겼고요 ㅎㅎ
review_en: It's perfect for summer. I think I go there often because the parade kid likes it so much. He's over 100 centimeters tall, and he's got something to ride.

review: 5가족이 갱상도 촌에서 서울여행중 옛 추억을 떠올리며 롯데월드로... 새로운 기구들이 많았고 아이들도 재미나게 놀았어요 약간의 기다림과 더위는 써비스 ㅜㅜ
review_en: 5 family members went to Lotte World to recall old memories from their trip to Seoul in Gangsangdo. There were a lot of new equipment, and the kids had fun. A little bit of waiting and the heat is sevis.

review: 특별히 좋은 점 없음. 대기시간 넘 오래 걸림 핸드폰 미리 충전 안해오거나 보조 배터리 없으면 대략 난감. 식당에서 전기 콘센트 막아놈
review_en: Nothing in particular good. It takes longer than the waiting time. If you don't charge your phone in advance or if you don't have a battery, it's difficult. Shut off the electrical outlet at the restaurant.

review: 시설과 음식점은좋았지만 와이파이가 잘않잡혀서 프리페스예약하기가 힘들었지만 재미있었다 그리고 사람들 모여있는곳은 더욱이나겁고힘들었다 그리고 성주변에갈때마다 물을 뿌려 옷과 핸드폰이 불편했지만 재미있었다
review_en: The facilities and restaurants were good, but the Wi-Fi was not good so it was hard to reserve a pre-pes but it was fun. And the place where the people gathered was even more difficult. And whenever I went around the castle, I sprayed water on my clothes and cell phone, but it was fun.

review: 평일이였는데도 방학이라 그런지 사람이 너무 많아서 힘들었어요 그나마 앱 설치 하고 매직패스 예약 해서 두개 겨우 타봤네요 한여름 휴가 시즌에는 안가시는게 좋을듯
review_en: Even though it was a weekday, it was hard because there were so many people during vacation. I've only got two rides on the app and a magic pass reservation. Maybe you shouldn't go during the midsummer vacation season.

review: 하루종일 있어도 할 거 많아서 좋아요 자유이용권 끊었는데 주말에 가서 그런지 놀이기구 타는데 대기시간이 기본1시간이라 그건 좀 아쉬웠어요 ㅠㅠ
review_en: It's good to be here all day, but there's a lot to do. I bought a free pass, but maybe it's because I went there on the weekend, but the waiting time was 1 hour, so that was a bit disappointing. ᅲᅲ

review: 공사중인 어트랙션이 많습니다 비가 오면 내부 어트랙션 이용만 가능해서 사람들이 많이 몰려서 문제..
review_en: There's a lot of traction under construction. If it rains, you can only use the internal attraction, so there are a lot of people.

review: 아이들이 너무 좋아하고 신나했어요. 7살,5살 아이들이 12시부터 밤9시까지 지치지도 않고 걸어다녔네요^^ 2살 막둥이도 휘둥그레해서 잘 구경했구요^^ 아이들이좋아하니 저희도 즐거웠습니다~
review_en: The children were so happy and excited. Seven- and five-year-olds walked tirelessly from 12:00 to 9:00 p.m.The two-year-old youngest was all round, so I enjoyed watching it.We had a great time because kids like it.

review: 진짜진짜 재미있었어요 다리는 조금 아팠지만 오늘 퍼레이드도 멋지고 놀이기구도 너무 재미있고 스릴 넘쳤어요! 비가와서 몇 게는 조금 늦게 운행 하더라구요 그래서 운행하는지 모르고 못탄게 슬펐어요ㅠㅠ 하지만 너무 재미있었답니다!
review_en: It was so much fun. My legs hurt a little, but today's parade was great and the rides were so fun and thrilling! Some of them were running a little late because of the rain. So I didn't know they were driving. I was so sad.But it was so much fun!

review: 백화점과 쇼핑몰, 놀이 공원이 함께있어 가면 충분한 시간을 갖고 가야한다. 롯데월드 놀이공원은 아주 크지는 않지만, 하루 종일 놀기에는 적당하고, 실내에도 놀이기구가 많기 때문에 더운 여름철이나 추울때에도 기온에 관계없이 즐겁게 놀 수 있다
review_en: If there is a department store, shopping mall, and amusement park together, you should take enough time. Lotte World amusement park is not very big, but it is suitable for playing all day long, and there are many rides indoors, so you can have fun regardless of the temperature in hot summer or cold.

review: 친구랑 롯데월드를 찾았는데요 어릴적으로 돌아온 느낌이고 너무 좋았으나 가격이 비싸서 부담이 되욨습니다
review_en: I visited Lotte World with my friend, and it felt like I came back when I was young and it was so good, but the price was expensive, so I felt burdened.

review: 할로윈 특집할때 갔었는데 무슨 놀이기구를 핸드폰으로 예약해야된다고 뭐 이상한 시스템 도입했는데 넘 별로네요
review_en: I went to the Halloween special, and I introduced a strange system to reserve some rides on my phone, but it's not that good.

review: 비가 오늘 날씨였지만 실내가 있어 아기들과 놀기에 부담이 없었습니다 맘앤키즈 티켓을 사용하니 각종 할인혜택을 받은것보다 저렴하게 자유이용권을 구매할 수 있었습니다
review_en: The rain was today's weather, but there was no pressure to play with the babies because of the indoor air. As I used the Mom & Kids ticket, I could buy a free pass at a lower price than the various discounts I received.

review: 파라오의분노에계시던 안내하던분이있었는데 손님의말을끊어먹는게 조금 불쾌했지만 그것외에는 날도더운하루였지만 재밌게놀다왔습니다 ㅎㅎ
review_en: There was a guide who was in the anger of the pharaoh, and it was a little unpleasant to interrupt the customer, but besides that, it was a hot day, but I had a lot of it. Haha

review: 여러가지 어트랙션을 즐길수 있어서 좋았어요!(비록 예약하기는 어렵지만)다음번에도 또 오고싶네요!
review_en: It was great to enjoy various attractions!(even though it's hard to make a reservation)I want to come back on music!

review: 저녁 퍼레이드 때문에 모노레일 기다릴때 친절하게 먼저 다가와 모노레일 재시작시간 설명과 더불어 기다리는동안 벤치대기 안내해주셔서 더 편하게20분을 앉아서 기다렸네요 미소도 너무 밝고 친절하신 직원분 덕에 저녁시간 즐겁게 모노레일을 기다릴 수 있어서 롯데월드에서 더 행복할수있었습니다 늦은시간 피곤한실텐데 너무 친절하셔서 인상깊어남깁니다
review_en: When I was waiting for the monorail for the evening parade, he kindly approached me first to explain the monorail restart time, and he guided me to the bench while waiting, so I sat down and waited for 20 minutes more comfortably. Thanks to the bright and kind employee, I could happily wait for the monorail in the evening, so I could be happier at Lotte World. You must be tired late at night, but you are so kind that I am impressed.

review: 온가족이즐거웠어요.매직 패스로편리하고여름에도 겨울에도 덥지않고 춥지않고 좋네요 여름야간에는정말 시원하고좋네요
review_en: The whole family was happy.It's convenient to use magic pass, and it's nice in summer and winter. It's cool and nice at night in summer.

review: 진짜 어제 학교 개교기념일이라서 어서 롯데월드를 갔는데 되게 꿀잼이고 행복했어요. 그리고 행복햌ㅅ던 친구들과의 추억을 만들었던 것 같아요 롯데월드 짱짱!!
review_en: Yesterday was our school anniversary, so we went to Lotte World. It was so much fun and I was so happy. And I think I made memories with my friends who were happy friends. Lotte World is the best!!

review: 아이데리고 부담없이 놀러가기 좋아서 연간회원 가입했어요. 자주 가서 놀아야겠어요. 좀 더워서 놀기 힘들던데 시원하면 더 좋을거같아요.
review_en: I joined the club as an annual member because it was easy to go on a trip with Aidero. I'll go play more often. It's a little hot so it's hard to play, but I think it'll be better if it's cool.

review: 매직패스 이용하니 3번은 바로타는 즐거움이 있네요 평일은 5번으로 이용한도가 늘었으면 좋겠어요
review_en: I'm using a magic pass, and number three is fun to ride. I'd like to increase the number of uses to five on weekdays.

review: 서울시에 위치한 놀이동산 중 최고의 규모. 용인 에버랜드보다는 아담한 느낌을 주는 롯데월드.. 아이와, 연인과 함께 가볼만 한 곳 입니다.
review_en: The largest amusement park in Seoul. Lotte World gives a smaller feeling than Yongin Everland. It's a nice place to visit with your child and lover.

review: 매번 카톡으로 할인문자가 오니까 꼭 할인받으세요! 혹은 사이트를 보세요! 사람많은 주말은 가지말고,,평일 화수목이 사람 제일 없어요! 가방은 꼭 사물함에 보관해요! 많이 걸어야하니까
review_en: I get a text message every time through Kakao Talk, so make sure to get a discount! Or look at the site! Don't go on a crowded weekend, there are no people on a weekday. Keep your bags in your locker! 'Cause I have to walk a lot.

review: 첨으로 가봤는데 서비스도 좋고 위생도 좋고 가격이 좀 비싸다는게 흠이랄까... 좀만 더 내려주셨으면..ㅠ
review_en: I've been there for the first time, but the service is good, the hygiene is good, and the price is a bit expensive. If you'd let me down a little bit more...ᅲ

review: 남자친구와 거의 주말마다 가는것 같아요~~^^ 우선 집에서 버스 한번으로 편하게 갈 수 있고, 자유이용권으로 언제든~ 저렴하게 다녀올수 있어서 넘넘 좋아요! 교통체증이 있긴하지만.. ㅠㅠ
review_en: I think I go with my boyfriend almost every weekend.First of all, you can take a bus from home and use a free pass anytime~ It's so nice to be able to get there cheaply! There's traffic, but... ᅲᅲ

review: 36개월 아가랑 6살아이랑 함께 방문, 둘째도 어린이 요금 냈지만 탈수 있는 기구는 극소수,,, 6살은 되야 이것저것 탈수 있는데, 안전벨트나 그런걸 보완해서 탑승 키 제한을 완화 하면 더 좋을것 같음... 햇님과 달만 몇십번 탄거 같음... 하지만 아주 가끔 놀러 가기엔 멀지도 않고 할인 행사도 많아서 부담도 없고, 역시나 괜찮음...
review_en: A 36-month-old baby, a 6-year-old child, paid the child fare, but only a few, six-year-olds can ride this and that, but it would be better to supplement the seat belts and other things to ease the restriction on the keys. It's like I've ridden the sun and the moon dozens of times. But it's not too far to go out and there are many discount events, so there's no burden, and it's fine...

review: 평일에 왔는데 사람이 많았어요 그래도 아트란티스는 탔다! 뿌듯하다 다음에또와서 못탄거 타야징 롯데월드 영원해랴!
review_en: I came here on weekdays, but there were a lot of people. But Artrantis got on! I'm so proud. I'm going to ride something I couldn't ride again. Lotte World forever!

review: 역시 뭐니뭐니해도 롯데월드는 아틸란티스죠~1시간이 넘는 줄을 기다리다가 매직패스를 도전해 바로 탈수있었어요~역시 또하나의 재미까지 주네요~해성탈출도 탈수있었는데 시간이 없어...다음에 꼭 가서 탈거예요~근데 추운데도 사람이 너무 많네요...
review_en: As expected, Lotte World is Atlantis. We waited for more than 1 hour to get on the magic pass.That's another fun thing to do you know?I was able to ride the Haesung Escape, but I don't have time...I'm sure I'll get it next time.But there are too many people even though it's cold...

review: 으하루종일 사람도뱔루없어서 패스 밖에잇는거에만쓰면되요 재밋게 놀다와요 놀이기구운행시간도길어서좋앗어요 ㅎㅎㅎㅎ
review_en: There's no one here all day long, so you just have to use it as a pass. Have fun. It was good because the ride time was long. Hehehehe

review: 야간개장으로 방문하였습니다. 낮 시간보다 여유롭게 놀이기구도 타고 대기 시간도 짧았던거 같습니다.
review_en: I visited the night opening. I think the waiting time was shorter than the daytime and rode the rides leisurely.

review: 매직패스4개 이벤트로 알뜰하게 이용해서 11개 후회없이타고왔어용ㅋㅋㅋ 앱 이용 예매하면, 매직패스4개 주는 이벤트 맨날 했으면😭🙏🏻
review_en: I used the magic pass event 4 times and rode 11 without regret. LOL. If I reserve the app, I hope to have 4 magic passes every day.

review: 서울랜드 에버랜드에 비하면 좁지만 실내에도 놀이기구가 있어 비오는날에도 이용가능해서 좋아요~
review_en: It's smaller than Seoul Land and Everland, but there are rides indoors, so I like it because it's available on rainy days.

review: 점검.강풍때문에 매직아일랜드는 자이로드롭, 아틸란티스 못타고.. 어드벤처는 자이언트스윙, 해적선 쉬고~ 이렇다보니 사람들이 분산이 안되서 운행하는 놀이기구마다 20시까지 매직패스는 전부 만료고~ 비싼돈주고 방문했는데 평소보다 많이 못타고와서 아쉬웠어요.
review_en: Because of the strong wind, Magic Island can't ride Zyro Drop or Atlantis. Adventure is Giant Swing, Pirate Ship Resting~ So every ride that people drive is not distributed, all Magic Pass expires by 20 o'clock~ I paid a lot of money to visit, but it was a shame that I couldn't ride it as much as usual.

review: 여자친구랑 왔는데 너무재밌고 매직패스 라는 기능이있어서 손쉽게 놀이기구를 이용했습니다. 롯데월드최고
review_en: I came here with my girlfriend and it was so fun and there was a magic pass function so I used the ride easily. Lotte World's Best

review: 엄청 사람 많아서 줄선 기억이 많은데 오늘은 간간히 비가 오고 날씨가 쌀쌀해서인지 사람이 그리 많지 않았습니다. 아이와 함께 오후 5시에 입장해서 나름 알차게 즐겼습니다.
review_en: There were so many people, so I remember waiting in line, but today it was raining and chilly, so there weren't that many people. I came in at 5 p.m. with my child and enjoyed it with my own way.

review: 연간 패스라 딱 5개만 타려고 9시에 떠났는데 사람이 그리 많지않아 10개나 탔다. 의외로 토 오전은 탈만하다.
review_en: It was an annual pass, so I left at 9 o'clock to get only 5 passes, but there weren't that many people, so I got 10 passes. Surprisingly enough Saturday morning is fine.

review: 흡연실 추가 설치 적극 추천!! 수요일인데도 사람이 많지만 아틀란티스나 스윙같은 큰 기구 제외하곤 1시간 내로 탈 수 있어서 괜찮았어요
review_en: Recommended to install additional smoking rooms!! There were a lot of people on Wednesday, but except for big equipment like Atlantis and Swing, I could ride it within an hour, so it was okay.

review: ㅇㅂㄹㄷ와 비교했을때 직원들이 좀 친절하지 않아요..그렇다고 불친절한건 아니지만 그래도 비교가 되는건 사실이네요. 야간퍼레이드할때 남자출연자분들이(특히 검은차탔던 한국남자분은) 가족단위손님에게는 눈길한번 안주면서 아가씨손님들에게 특히 들이대셔서(?) 아이들앞에서 좀 민망했어요. 저러다 그아가씨들 전화번호까지 받아가는거 아닌가싶을정도였네요. 옆에서 보고있던 다른 가족들은 그모습을 동영상으로도 찍고있던데요.젊은 남자니 젊은 여자에게 더 끌리는건 당연한거고 이해는 가지만..롯데월드측에서 퍼레이드의
review_en: Compared to ᄋᄅᄅ, the employees are not very kind.It's not unkind, but it's true that it compares. During the night parade, male performers (especially Korean men who rode black cars) didn't pay attention to their family members, but especially to their ladies, so I was a little embarrassed in front of my children. That's how they got their phone numbers. The other family members who were watching from the side were filming it.It's natural to be attracted to young men and young women, and I understand.Lotte World's Parade

review: 저녁에 가서 퍼레이드 보며 걸어도 좋고 예쁜 궁전 앞에서 사진만 찍어도 행복하네요 요즘엔 티켓도 워낙 저렴해서 가기 좋아용ㅎㅎ 다만 사람이 많다는게 ㅠㅠ 함정입니다ㅎㅎㅎㅎ 놀이기구는 타려면 너어어어어무 힘드네용흑흑
review_en: I'm happy to go to the parade in the evening and take a picture in front of the pretty palace. These days, tickets are so cheap that it's good to go. But it's a trap that there are so many people.It's so hard to get on the ride.

review: 수학여행이나 놀러온 학생들로 인해 붐빌되면 정말 정신없는 곳 아틀란티스라는 놀이기구가 유명하지만 줄 서는 게 사람 질리게 때도 있어요
review_en: When it's crowded with students on school trips or school trips, Atlantis is famous for its rides, but sometimes people get tired of standing in line.

review: 어린이날 지나고 어디갈지 고민하다가 찾아왔는데 애들이 넘좋아하네요.. 좀더 커서 범퍼카를 같이 탔으면 하네요
review_en: After Children's Day, I thought about where to go, and I came here and they are so happy. I'd like to ride the bumper car together.

review: 처음알게된 매직패스 3번기회로 아쉬웠지만 뛰어도 시간 맞추기힘들었는데 조금 늦은경우 이해해주시고 문열어주시는 안내 언니들 센스짱이였어요 매직패스로 오늘 5개나 타고왔네요 점심도 든든히 먹구요 담엔 매직 아일랜드쪽으로 예약하려구요 아쉬운건 각자다른카드로 예약하려니 모바일로는 제한되어 예약이 쉽지않았다는점이 조금 아쉬웠네요 덕분에 즐거웠어요
review_en: I felt sorry for the 3rd magic pass, but it was hard to get the right time even though I ran, but when it was a little late, the guide sisters understood and opened the door were so witty. I've got five magic passes today, and I'm going to have a good lunch, and then I'm going to make a reservation on Magic Island. Unfortunately, it was a bit disappointing that it was not easy to make a reservation because it was limited to mobile because I wanted to make a reservation with a different card. Thanks to you, I had a lot of course.

review: 5월4일 부모님 모시고 효도하러 갔는데, 너무 많이 입장시켜서 3번 예약가능하다던 매직패스는 한번도 안됬고, 제대로된 놀이기구는 한번도 못타고 어른들 고생만 시켜드렸네요. 돈은 돈대로 쓰고 불효만하고 왔네요. 롯데가 욕먹는 이유가 다 있었네요. 돈도 좋지만 제대로된 서비스(입장제한)를 하시고, 보상이 가능하면 보상희망합니다. 시간날리고 돈날린것에 대한.
review_en: I went to be a good son with my parents on May 4th, but I never got a magic pass that they said could make a reservation for 3 times because of too much entrance, and I never got to ride a proper ride, so I only let the adults suffer. I spent my money as much as I could and came here with nothing to do with it. There was a reason why Lotte was criticized. Money is good, but you should provide proper service (limited entry), and if you can make compensation, I would like to make compensation. For wasting time and money.

review: 무슨 놀이기구 한개타는데 하루가 끝나네요 무슨 시스템인지 패스시스템도 무슨 개때짓도 아니구ㅡㅡ 글구 놀이기구 자리남는건왜 안태우는건지? 일본은 혼자타는 줄 따로 있던데 자유이용권이 아깝네요 개선이 많이 필요할듯
review_en: One ride ends the day. What kind of system is this? Pass system isn't fucking-- why aren't we getting a ride? There is a separate line in Japan, so it's a waste of free passes. I think we need a lot of improvement.

review: 아니 진짜 다좋아요.놀이기구도재미있구좋은데 물건 가격이 너~무 비싸서 거기서 안사먹고 다른데서 사가지고 가야하니까 너무 불편해요 물건가격이나 음식가격을내려주세요
review_en: No, it's all good.The rides are fun and fun, but the price of the items is so expensive that I have to buy them somewhere else instead of buying them. Please lower the price of the items or food.

review: 휴일을 맞이하여 아이들과 신나게 놀이기구타며 즐거운시간 보냈네요~ 매직패스 이용하니 그래도 편하게 즐길수 있었던거 같아요~^^
review_en: I had a great time riding the rides with my children for the holidays. I think I was able to enjoy it comfortably because I was using Magic Pass.^^

review: 예약도 제대로 안되고 어플 예약 시스템 자체도 과부화돼서 터지고 어플 관리좀 5월 이벤트로 예약 1회 무료주면 뭐합니까 어플 터져서 예약도 안되는데; 그리고 밖에 쉬림프 구이 집 기기를 새로 놔 주던지 방안을 좀 세워야 되겠네요 새우 7개 육천원주고 이십분 기다려 먹는게 말입니까?
review_en: I can't make a reservation properly, and the application reservation system itself is overloaded, so I can't give you one free reservation for the May event. It's going to pop and you can't make a reservation; and I'll have to set up a plan to put a new shrimp baking device outside. Give 7 shrimp 6,000 won and wait 20 minutes?

review: 시간 다막아놓고 되지도않음 들어가면 렉맛 걸리고 그지같네 이것땜에 배터리 다날렷네 왜만든지모르겠다
review_en: If I don't finish it, it'll be lagging. I don't know why I'since I'm running out of batteries.

review: 더럽게 연결 안됨 사람은 개 많은데 어트랙션은 죄다 점검 중 인기 많은 몇먗 어트랙션으로 몰리는게 당연 범퍼카도 한시간 기다림 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 엉망진창
review_en: There are a lot of people who don't have a dirty connection, but all of the attractions are popular during the inspection, so it's natural to wait an hour for the bumper car to be in a mess.

review: 실내 공간이 있고 도심에 있다는 것이 가장 큰 장점인 듯. 야외에 있는 놀이기구들은 특정 시간이 지나면 운행하지 않기 때문에 잘 알아보고 가야 함. 할로윈 등 특정 시기에 이벤트도 있으니 참고하면 좋을 듯.
review_en: Having an indoor space and being in the center of the city seems to be the biggest advantage. The rides in the open air don't run after a certain time, so you have to check them out. There are events at certain times, such as Halloween, so it would be good to refer to them.

review: 저는 무서운 놀이기구를 못타지만 롯데월드에서는 다양한기구를 탈 수있어 좋아요~ 퍼레이드도 재밌고 위치도 지하철 바로라 접근성이 용이합니다~! 기다리시는 시간을 절약하려면 매직패스 이용해보세요^^
review_en: I can't ride scary rides, but I can ride various rides at Lotte World. The parade is fun and the location is the subway, so it's easy to access. Use a magic pass to save you time waiting.^^

review: 자유이용권도 저렴하고 접근성도 좋아서 잘 놀다왔습니다. 평일에 갔더니 줄도 많이 안서구요.. 입장 예약 어플(?)이 있는지 몰랐어서 사용하진 못했지만 다운받아보니 좋더라구요. 할인쿠폰도 있구요. 후렌치 레볼루션 VR은 굉장히 신박했습니다 ㅋㅋ 또 가려구요.
review_en: I had a good time because the free pass was cheap and the access was good. I didn't get in line much because I went on weekdays. I didn't know there was an entrance reservation application, so I couldn't use it, but it was good to download it. There's a discount coupon, too. The French Revolution VR was very novel. I'm going to go again.

review: 교통이 매우 편한곳에 있는 도심 놀이공원임 시설이 조금 오래되긴 하였으나 다양한 놀이기구가 있음
review_en: Although the city amusement park facilities are a bit old, there are various rides.

review: 한국 대표 실내 어뮤즈먼트 파크.. 아이들과 겨울에 다녀왔는데 춥지도 않고 좋아요. 롯데민속박물관과 연계해서 이용하니 좋으네요. 민속박물관 이용이 무료예요
review_en: Korea's representative indoor amusement park. I went there in winter with my children, and it's not cold and nice. It's nice to use it in conjunction with Lotte Folk Museum. The Folk Museum is free.

review: 어른들은 지치는 곳 성인이 탈만한 놀이기구는 그렇게 많지 않은데 거기에 기다림이 많아지면 힘든곳 ㅎㅎ 하지만 유아에서 초등학생까지의 아이들은 밤새서도 놀수있는 그런곳. 경기권에 있는 타 놀이동산에 비해 서울 중심지라 위치는 갑
review_en: There aren't that many rides for adults, but there's a place where it's hard for children from infants to elementary school to play all night. Compared to other amusement parks in Gyeonggi Province, it is located in the center of Seoul.

review: 저녁 전까지 실내에서 탈 수 있는 건 마음껏 타시고, 저녁 이후엔 사람들이 하나 둘씩 추위를 타며 실내로 들어오기에 실외에서 놀이기구를 타시면 줄을 훨씬 덜 서실 겁니다. 그리고 매직패스를 잘 이용하면서 타시면 줄서기로 인한 고통이 줄어 더더욱 즐거워지실 것 같네요. 특히 회전목마나 실외의 성 건물 앞은 사진찍기에도 참 좋아요.
review_en: Please take whatever you want to ride indoors before dinner, and after dinner, people come in one by one with the cold weather, so if you take the rides outdoors, you'll be much less in line. And if you ride the magic pass well, you will be able to enjoy it even more by reducing the pain caused by standing in line. Especially, it's good to take pictures of merry-go-rounds and outdoor castle buildings.

review: 매직패스는 다 마감됬다고 나오고....대기 15분이라해서 줄섰더니 한시간기다리고... 애기델꼬갔는데 별로타지도 못하고 매직패스8개 날렸네요 애기들타는것도 현장대기 10분이라는데 매직패스는 한시간뒤고...
review_en: The Magic Pass says it's all closed.You said 15 minutes, so I lined up, and you waited for an hour. I went to the baby's desk, but I didn't get a good ride, and I blew eight magic passes. They say it takes 10 minutes for babies to get on site, but the magic pass is an hour later.

review: 꿀잼 이빠이데스요 날도 잘잡아서 사람도 별로 없고 신나게놀고옴 꼭 학생들 없는 시험기간 중에 날 잡고 오시길
review_en: It's so much fun. I hope you have a good day, so there are not many people and have fun. I hope you can catch me during the exam period without students.

review: 혜성특급 매직패스이용할때 자꾸확인도 안하시고 시간도지나도 안들여보내 주시고 그냥다른줄 들여보내시더라고요 안에서도 기다려야하는데 시간지났는데도 안들여보내주시고다른줄들어가는데 아무런 말도없이 기다리기만하다가 직원불러내서야 들여보내주시더라구요.... 그것도 하루에두번이나 그랬네요?? 같은장소에서 ㅜ 매직패스 예약하기도 어려운데 그냥 서비스라고 대접안하는건지...아무튼 좀 기분나빴네요
review_en: When I was using the Comet Magic Pass, they kept not checking the time and didn't let me in. They just let me in even though I had to wait inside, but they didn't let me in even though the time passed, and I was waiting in the other row without saying anything, but they called in the staff to let me in. You did that twice a day, didn't it? It's hard to book a magic pass at the same place, but you're not just treating me as a service...Anyway, I was a little upset.

review: 3월 마지막주에 여자친구와 같이 혜성특급을 타러 갔습니다. 사람이 많은걸 알고 프리패스라는 어플로 예약을 한뒤 예약시간에 맞추어서 도착을 하였습니다. 하지만 정시간에 그 어느 직원 한분없이 응대를 안해주시더라구요. 프리패스라서 소홀이 응대를 해주시는건 아닌가 라는 생각이들 정도였네요. 결국 5분이 지나고서 직접 언제 들어가냐고 물어보자 '아 죄송해요 지금 식사교대를 하는중이라..' 라고 하시곤 다른 직원을 불러주시고 가버리시더군요. 식사를 하시고 온 직원분도 마찬가지로 얼굴 표정부터 정말 귀찮아
review_en: In the last week of March, I went on a comet express with my girlfriend. Knowing that there are many people, I made a reservation through the free pass app and arrived on time. But they didn't respond to me on time. I was wondering if you were being careless because you were a free pass. And after five minutes, I asked him when he was going in, and he said, "Oh, sorry. I'm sorry. I'm in the middle of a meal shift." And he called another employee and left. The staff who came back from the meal is just as annoying from their facial expressions.

review: 우울한 기분을 풀고자 남자친구와 방문하였습니다. 기분좋게 도착한 롯데월드에서 스탭들의 표정을 보고는 마냥 신나지만은 않았습니다 다들 영혼없이 손을 흔들고 무표정으로 놀이기구 안내를 해주었습니다. 피곤하고 힘들어 보였다는것이 맞을 것 같습니다. 모든 스탭들이 그런 표정으로 있는것을 보고는 불친절의 문제가 아니라 스탭들의 복지가 어떻게 이루어지길래 웃으며 일하는 사람이 한명도 없을 수 있는가 의문이 들었습니다. 반면 퍼레이드는 실망스러움을 사르르 녹일 정도로 기분좋게 만들어 주었습니다. 가장 큰
review_en: I visited with my boyfriend to relieve my depressed mood. When I saw the staff's faces at Lotte World, I wasn't as excited as I was. Everyone waved their hands without a soul and guided us on the ride with no expression on their faces. I think it's right that you looked tired and tired. When I saw all the staff members with that look on their faces, it wasn't a matter of unkindness, but I wondered how the welfare of the staff would be achieved so that there could be no one working with a smile. On the other hand, the parade made me feel good enough to melt my disappointment. largest

review: 평일에 남자친구와 회사에 연차를 내고 롯데월드를 방문했습니다. 애매한 목요일이라 사람이 당연이 없을 줄 알았는데 생각보다 많아 대기시간이 걱정되었죠! 그러나 사전에 어플을 이용한 롯데월드 꿀팁을 숙지하고 간 덕분에 대기시간 없이 아트란티스를 2번이나 즐길 수 있었습니다 남들은 30분넘게 기다릴때 바로 들어가는 우월감이란... 승리한 기분이었습니다 물론 예약하는게 대학교 수강신청만큼 아니 보다 더 힘들었지만요 ㅋㅋ 또 여러가지 vr을 이용한 놀이기구가 새로 생겨 멀미는 조금 났으나 재미있었습니다
review_en: I visited Lotte World with my boyfriend on weekdays after taking annual leave of course. I thought there wouldn't be any people because it was an ambiguous Thursday, but I was worried about waiting time because there were more people than I thought! However, I was able to enjoy Art Lantis twice without waiting time because I learned Lotte World's tips using the app in advance. When others wait more than 30 minutes, the sense of superiority goes right in... I felt like I was winning. Of course, it was hard to make a reservation as much as the university registration, but I also had a little bit of motion sickness but it was fun because there were new rides using various vr.

review: 오전 12시부터 가서 놀았는데 오후 7시까지 20개 넘게 탔습니다 사람이 너무 없어서 더 재밌네요
review_en: I went there from 12 am to play, but I rode more than 20 cars until 7 pm. It's more fun because there are so few people.

review: 서울 시내에서 갈 수 있는 유일한 놀이동산 실내라고 규모가 작다 생각한다면 오산 추운 겨울에도 놀이동산을 즐길 수 있는 유일한 곳 많은 인파로 인해 북적거리는 것이 단점이라면 단점!!
review_en: If you think it's the only amusement park you can go to downtown Seoul, the only place in Osan where you can enjoy the amusement park even in the cold winter, if it's a disadvantage if it's crowded with people!!

review: 여자친구랑 왔는데 평일인데도 불구하고 사람이너무 많았어요 근데 날도좋고 여친이랑오니 분위기좋아서 잘놀다가욘
review_en: I came here with my girlfriend, but there were so many people even though it was a weekday. But the weather was nice and the atmosphere was nice with my girlfriend.

review: 잠실이라서 교통편이 좋다 실내라서 계절 상관없이 갈 수 있다 친구, 연인, 가족 누구라도 부담없이 방문 할 수 있는 놀이공원인 것 같다 석촌호수 주변 카페, 롯데월드몰도 인접해있어 동선 짜기도 좋은 편
review_en: It's convenient to use because it's Jamsil. It's indoor, so you can go regardless of It seems to be an amusement park where any friend, lover, or family can visit without any burden. There are cafes and Lotte World Mall near Seokchon Lake, so it's easy to arrange the route.

review: 오래기다리긴 했지만 ,행복한 하루 였답니다. 맛난 간식도 친절한 직원분들도 모두 모두 감사합니다.
review_en: Although I waited for a long time, it was a happy day. Thank you for all the delicious snacks and friendly staff.

review: 후룸라이드 매직패스로 들어왔는데 일반대기줄이 먼저들어가고 방치해두고서 일반대기줄 뒤에서 줄을 서야 했습니다 직원에게 말했는데도 별다른 조치를 취하지 않았습니다 제대로 관리해주시기 바랍니다
review_en: I came in through the Flume Ride Magic Pass, and I had to stand in line behind the regular line after the regular line went in first. I told the staff, but they didn't take any action. Please take good care of it.

review: 날이 추워서 운행하지 않는 놀이기구도 많았고 무엇보다 매직패스 예약을 한 번 빼고 다 실패해서 이용을 못함.
review_en: There were a lot of rides that didn't run because of the cold weather, and most of all, all of them failed except for one magic pass reservation, so we couldn't use them.

review: 여러가지 할인혜택으로 저렴하게 구입하여 방문했습니다. 아아들에게는 모험과 신비의 나라입니다. 날씨에 상관없이 하루종일 놀아도 좋은 곳입니다.
review_en: I bought it at a low price with various discounts. It's a country of adventure and mystery for my son. It's a good place to play all day regardless of the weather.

review: 이십대 들이 홍콩이다 일본이다 자유롭게 여행다니는게 보편화된 요즘... 유니버셜과 디즈니, 레고랜드로 눈이 높아진 사람들의 구미를 맞추기엔 이제 롯데월드의 수준은 많이 노후된 느낌... 그나마 기대한 VR도 중간에 꺼져버린 기계에 실망하고 여전히 언제 털어낸지 모르는 먼지 가득한 놀이기구는 외국 친구들한테 소개하기 민망한정도...
review_en: People in their twenties are in Hong Kong. It's Japan. It's common to travel freely these days. The level of Lotte World seems to be very old enough to satisfy the taste of people who have grown up with Universal, Disney, and Legoland. I was disappointed with the VR that was turned off in the middle, and I'm embarrassed to introduce the dusty ride to my foreign friends.

review: 제가 회전그네 3시 30-45분까지프리패스를 끊고 고스트를 2시간 기다리다 보니 프리패스 시간이 지날것같더라고요 그래서 38분쯤 취소를 눌렀더니 시간이 지나서 안된데요 그래서 고스트를 포기하고 회전그네로 갔더니 취소된 프리패스라고 못탄다고 하시네요 전 2시간 기다린 고스트랑 회전목마 둘다 못타고 2시간 날렸습니다 분명 취소가 안된다고 뜬거 확인했고요 안내원들도 안된다고 하더라고요 정말 실망스럽고 롯데월드또한 다신오고싶지않을정도네요 다들 조심하세요;;
review_en: I cut the free pass on the swing and waited for 2 hours for the ghost until 3:30-45, and I thought the free pass time would pass. So I pressed cancel for 38 minutes. So I gave up on the ghost and went to the spinning swing, and they said I couldn't ride the canceled free pass. I couldn't ride both the Ghost and the merry-go-round that I waited for two hours. I'm sure it says no cancellation, and the receptionists say no. I'm so disappointed and I don't want to come back to Lotte World again. Be careful, everyone.;;

review: 10년만에 6개월 된 아이를 데리고 방문하였으나 직원들이 너무나 불친절하고 유모차를 가지고 다니기에 동선이 너무 복잡하며 엘레베이터가 터무니 없이 부족하다. 연인들이 한번씩 다니기엔 더없이 좋겠지만 가족단위로 방문 시 차라리 용인의 테마파크가 훨씬 나을듯. 수유실도 테마파크 내 딱 한곳이라 너무 불편함.
review_en: I visited with a six-month-old child in 10 years, but the lines are too complicated for employees to carry strollers and the elevators are ridiculously insufficient. It would be great for couples to visit once in a while, but Yongin's theme park would be much better when visiting as a family. The nursing room is only one place in the theme park, so it's so uncomfortable.

review: 너무 기다리는것 빼고는 좋았다 먹거리를 더 알차게 만들었으면 좋겠다 쇼가 볼게 많았고 계속 되는 쇼가 이쪽 저쪽에 있으니 좋기도 하지만 한가지만 봐야하는 불편함이 있다
review_en: It was good except for waiting too long. I wish I could make the food more fruitful. There were a lot of shows to watch, and it's nice to have a show here and there, but there's only one uncomfortable thing to see.

review: 여친과 처음 간 놀이공원이라 많은 기대를 안고 갔으나 비로인한 야외개장 폐쇄와 생각보다 많은 인파에 치여 자유이용권을 제대로 써보지못하고 매직패스또한 겨우한번 예약 후 놀이기구탑승을 했습니다 평일이라고 사전정보없이 갔던것에 후회가 남는 경험였네용
review_en: It was my first time going to an amusement park with my girlfriend, so I had a lot of expectations, but I couldn't use my free pass because of the rain and the crowds, so I booked only once and rode on the ride. It was a regretful experience to go there without prior information on weekdays.

review: 서울시내 지하철로 바로 연결되서 참 좋아요 사람이 많지만 사람 구경하는 재미도 쏠쏠하네요ㅋㅋㅋ 즐거운시간 보내세요
review_en: It's good to be connected directly to the subway in Seoul. It's a lot of people, but it's fun to watch people.LOL. Have a great time.

review: 앱으로 예약이 힘들지만 그래도 롯데월드만에 매력이 있어서 좋네요 하지만 친구들이랑 같이타려고 새치기 하는건 알바생들배치해 이런현상을 없었으면 좋겠네요
review_en: It's hard to make a reservation through the app, but it's good that Lotte World has its own charm, but I hope that part-timers will be assigned to cut in line to ride with their friends so that there won't be this phenomenon.

review: 주차시설이 많이 부족하고 대기시간도 길지만 아이가 좋아하니 올때마다 만족하고 갑니다. 아이들을 위한 시설이 더 있었음 좋겠습니다
review_en: There is a lack of parking facilities and waiting time is long, but I am satisfied whenever my child likes it. I wish there were more facilities for children.

review: 가족과 함께 즐기기 좋은 장소에요. 복잡하다면? 매직패스 활용^^하세요. 먹거리도 꽤 다양해서 좋아요.
review_en: It's a good place to enjoy with your family. What if it's complicated? Use Magic Pass ^^. It's good because there's a lot of food to eat.

review: 30개월 된 아이와 롯데월드를 와보니 또 새로운 점들이 보여서 적어봅니다. 36개월미만 무료 라는 입장권 안내와는 달리, 아이들 놀이시설 이용하려고 보니 부모동반일지라도 티켓소지를 해야한다고 해서 급하게 구매를 하게 되었네요. 36개월 미만 무료라는 말과 함께 정확한 부가 설명 필요하다고 봅니다. 또한 티켓구매시 직원들의 로봇 같은 응대에 소름이 끼쳤네요. 과잉친절 바라지 않지만 해외에서도 많이 방문 하는걸로 아는데 서비스 교육을 좀 필요하다고 감히 한말씀 적어봅니다. 아이와 함께하다보니
review_en: After coming to Lotte World with a 30-month-old child, I see new things so I am writing them down. Contrary to the admission notice that it is free for less than 36 months, when I tried to use the children's play facility, even if it's with my parents, I bought it urgently. I think we need an accurate explanation as well as saying it's free under 36 months. Also, I got goose bumps when I bought tickets for the staff's robot-like response. I don't want excessive kindness, but I know that many people visit overseas, so I dare to write down what I said that I need some service education. Being with a child,

review: 대부분 찌든때가 쩔어있고, 보수가 필요한 곳이 곳곳이 보임... 박물관도 마찬가지임... 박물관에 자동으로 움직이는게 너무 기계티가 나고 중국에서 관람하는 느낌으로 싼티남... 20년이 지나도 변한게 없어보임... 그리고 어떻게 된게 해상도가 엄청 낮은데 새로운 놀이기구라고 광고 하는지 모르겠음...
review_en: Most of the stains are dope, and you can see places that need repair. So is the museum... The automatic movement in the museum is too mechanical and it feels like watching in China. 20 years later, nothing seems to have changed. And I don't know how they advertise it as a new ride when the resolution is so low.

review: 요즘 환타지드림이 많이 발전한거 같습니다. 조명도 새로 바뀌고 인형들의 움직임 역시 조금 개선되어있더군요. 정말 보기 좋았습니다. 근데 아쉬운게 섬세한 부분들(캔디들 눈썹 등등...)은 안움직이네요.... 그것도 개선이 되었으면 정말 좋겠네요. 옛날영상 보면 그야말로 리얼했었는데 지금보니까 인형들의 움직임이 완전히 차이가 나더군요. 지금도 안움직이는 인형들(예를들어 자전거타는 벌레인형이라던가..)도 있고.. 보니까 마법사할아버지도 얼굴표정만 찔끔찔끔 움직이더군요... 역시 아직은 부족한 느낌이
review_en: I think FANTASY DREAM has improved a lot. The lights have changed and the movements of the dolls have improved a little. It was really nice to see. Unfortunately, the delicate parts (candies, eyebrows, etc.) are not moving. I really hope that will improve, too. It was so real in the old video, but now I can see that the movements of the dolls are completely different. There are dolls that aren't moving now, like, a buggy-type bike ride. I saw that Grandfather Magician's face was moving just a little by little. I don't think we're good enough yet.

review: 입장권 구매부터 줄이 길어 한참 기다리고 매직패스는 입구에서 티켓 등록을 안해서 못쓰고 어차피 매직패스 몇개 안나와 쓰지도 못하고 놀이기구는 평일에도 사람이 많아 대기가 길고 식당은 그릇에 소스가 그대로 묻어있고 직원들은 무표정에 불친절 유격대 조교 같고 놀이기구 안전 벨트 안매고 출발시키고 비가 오는데 놀이공원에 꼭 가야하는거 아니면 다른데 갈려고 합니다.
review_en: I can't use magic passes because I can't use magic passes because I didn't register my tickets at the entrance because of the long line from the purchase of tickets. The rides are long because there are so many people on weekdays, and the dishes have sauce on them. The staff is like an unkind guerrilla trainer with no expression on their faces, and they leave without wearing seat belts, so I'm going to go somewhere else.

review: 경기도 용인시에 위치한 에버랜드(삼성계열)와 쌍벽을 이루는 테마파크. 에버랜드가 야외의 넓은 장소를 이용한 테마파크를 시외에 조성하였다면, 롯데월드는 서울시에서도 가장 붐비는 잠실에 위치하고 있는 도심 속 테마파크. 날씨에 관계없이 즐길 수 있는 실내 테마파크와 야외에 조성된 테마파크 놀이시설은 오밀조밀하면서도 즐길 거리를 충분히 제공해 준다. 먼길을 돌아 에버랜드까지 가기 어렵다면 롯데월드를 이용해 보는 것도 좋을 듯.
review_en: A theme park that is double-walled with Everland (Samsung Group) located in Yongin, Gyeonggi Province. If Everland has built a theme park outside the city, Lotte World is also located in Jamsil, the busiest city in Seoul. The indoor theme park and outdoor theme park play facilities, which can be enjoyed regardless of the weather, provide a dense yet full range of entertainment. If it's hard to go all the way to Everland, it would be good to try Lotte World.

review: 자이로 스윙 번지드롭 꼭 타기 무조건 야외 추천! 다른 곳보다 재밌고 친절한 이곳! 무조전 놀러오기!
review_en: Make sure to ride the Gyro Swing Bungee Drop outdoors! This place is more fun and friendly than other places! Come visit Mujojeon!

review: 매직패스 기계없애고 터지지않는 와이파이로 매직패스 어플로 예약하라는거 완전최악 올때마다 질이떨어지고있는거 잘 느끼고있습니다 이전에는 매직패스기계로 예약해서 편했는데 터지지도않는와이파이로 1분만에 컷당하구 예약못했네요^오^
review_en: I feel that the quality of magic pass applications is getting worse every time I come to reserve a magic pass app with Wi-Fi without a magic pass machine and not having a magic pass machine. Previously, it was convenient to reserve a magic pass machine, but I couldn't make a reservation for a Wi-Fi that didn't explode in a minute.^Oh오

review: 오랜만에갔는데 사실 바뀐거라고는 어플로 예약해서 놀이기구 타는거말고 놀이기구가 달라지는건 없었고 무엇보다도 음식 먹을때가 마땅치 않아요. 고열량의 패스트푸드음식이고 가격대도 높은 편이에요. 간식도 단 아이스크림만 있어요. 한번 들어가면 못 나오는 단점이 있어요.
review_en: It's been a long time since I've been there, but the only thing that changed was that I made a reservation on an app and the rides didn't change, and most of all, I don't want to eat food. It's a high-calorie fast-food dish and the price range is high. We only have sweet ice cream for snacks. There's a disadvantage that you can't come out once you go in.

review: 주말 평일 관계 없이 항상 사람 많음 실내 놀이터 재미 실외 놀이터 재미 색다르구 지하가서 아이스링크 이용도 되고 아이스링크는 놀이공원 이용료외에 별도이니 참고하세영
review_en: Please note that there are always many people regardless of weekend or weekday, indoor playground, outdoor playground, fun, outdoor playground, and fun. You can use ice rink underground, and ice rink is extra than the amusement park fee.

review: 진짜 하.....대박이에요 너무재밌어요 그중에 특히 아틀란티스.. 동절기라 날씨가 추워서 밖에있는 놀이기구는 몇개 운영안햇지만 정말너무 재밋었어요 ㅜㅜ오랜만에 놀러왓는데 행복햇어요 정말..모든게 환상..
review_en: It's really... it's amazing. It's so much fun. Especially Atlantis. The weather was cold in winter, so we didn't operate a few rides outside, but it was really fun. ᅮᅮIt's been a long time since I've been here. I was so happy.Everything's a fantasy.

review: 시작부터 성우 소리가 뭐라 그러는지 들리지도 않고 구성도 많이부족하게 만들어진거 같읍니다 아이가 너무재미 없다고 계속 그러네요 ㅠ
review_en: I can't hear what the voice actor is saying from the start, and I think it's made up of a lot of parts. He keeps saying that he's not funny.

review: 매직패스로 예약해도 기다리는 시간이 엄청나게 길고 매직패스 예약은 3개밖에 되지않아서 실용성이 떨어짐.
review_en: Even if you make a reservation by magic pass, the waiting time is extremely long and there are only 3 magic pass reservations, so it is not practical.

review: 중국인 관광객이 너무 많긴하지만, 다른 놀이공원에 비해 날씨를 신경쓰지 않아도 된다는 점이 충분히 차별적이다
review_en: Although there are too many Chinese tourists, the fact that you don't have to worry about the weather compared to other amusement parks is sufficiently discriminatory.

review: 롯데월드 아트란티스를 탔는데 친구가 안경을 벗어서 아무것도 안보이는 상태였습니다.친구는 롯데월드를 처음와서 벨트를 하는방법을 몰라서 직원에게 도움을 요청하였습니다.그런데 직원이 친구를 비하하고 모욕적인 말을 하는등 친구에게 불친절하게 대하였습니다. 그래서 직원이 친절한 서비스를 제공할 수 있도록 조치 부탁드립니다.
review_en: I rode Lotte World Art Lantis and my friend took off his glasses so I couldn't see anything.My friend came to Lotte World for the first time and asked the staff for help because he didn't know how to fasten his belt.But the employee was unfriendly to the friend by belittling him and making insulting remarks. So please take action so that the staff can provide friendly service.

review: 주말보다는 평일이 낫지만 사람은 항상 많은 듯 합니다. 다른 놀이공원과 다르게 실내에도 기구가 있어 우천시에도 즐길 수 있어서 좋습니다.
review_en: Weekdays are better than weekends, but there are always a lot of people. Unlike other amusement parks, there are indoor equipment, so it is good to enjoy it in rainy weather.

review: 설언휴 다음날이라 평일인지라 사람이 없겠거니했는데... 저와 같은 생각을하신분이 무지많으셨나봅니다...^^;; 중고생들도 어마무시하게많고... 기본 한시간반은 줄서있어야했는데.. 매직패스로 어찌 잘 예약해서 6가지나 타고왔네요 방학마지막날을 롯데월드에서 장식했네요 즐거운 하루였습니다...^^
review_en: I thought there would be no one because it was a weekday because it was the next day. There must have been a lot of people who thought the same thing as me...There are a lot of middle and high school students... I should have been in line for an hour and a half. How did you make a good reservation by magic pass and get six different kinds of rides? It was the last day of the vacation at Lotte World. It was a great day.^^

review: 그래도 매직패스로 예약해서3개는 탈수있었네요. 근데 경쟁이 너무치열하네요.중국인들이많은데 안전요원들이 한국어로만 설명 하는건 아쉽습니다.
review_en: But I could get 3 tickets by magic pass. But the competition is too fierce.It's a shame that safety guards only explain in Korean when there are many Chinese people.

review: 아니 일부 놀이기구때문에 어플은 강제로 설치해야되고 예약도 제대로 안되네요 그리고 연휴기간에 일부 야외 기구를 중지시키면 자유이용권끊어서 하루에 몇개나 타라는 겁니까?
review_en: No, some rides force the application to be installed and the reservation doesn't work, and if you stop some outdoor equipment during the holidays, how many free passes do you want me to ride in a day?

review: 도심에 있어서 사람이 너무 많습니다. 설연휴 마지막날 갔는데, 이런날은 동시접속자가 많아서 매직패스 예약도 불가능합니다. 방학 아닌 기간 평일에나 이용할만 할 듯..
review_en: There are too many people in the city center. I went on the last day of the Lunar New Year holiday, but I can't book a magic pass on this day because there are many simultaneous users. I think I can use it only on weekdays, not on vacation.

review: 후렌치레볼루션 너무 재밌어요~^^ vr로 바뀌고 처음 와봤는데 다음엔 아들도 데리고 와서 같이 타야겠어요 ㅎㅎ 또올께요 롯데월드 안녕
review_en: French Revolution is so much fun.It's my first time here since I switched to vr, and next time I'm gonna bring my son in with me. I'll be back again. Hi, Lotte World.

review: 매직패스로 예약하기 정말 힘든데ㅡ 추우면 알아서 대기안할터이니. 100% 예약제 놀이기구에 대한 생각은 별로였습니다. 스마트폰아닌사람 이용불가하고 데이터안더ㅣ면 이용불가하고.. 매직패스예약은 정말 하늘의 별따기ㅠㅠ 매직패스 예약하려고 시간대기하다..구경놓치고ㅡ 별로였습니다.
review_en: It's really hard to make a reservation by magic pass - if it's cold, we won't be waiting on our own. I didn't like the idea of 100% reserved rides. Not a smartphone, not a smartphone, not a data guide. Magic Pass Reservation is really getting stars in the sky. I'm waiting to book a magic pass.I didn't want to see it wasn't good.

review: 정말 오랜만에 아이들과 놀이동산을 방문했는데 매직패스라는 어플이 있어서 깜짝놀랬는데 막상 사용할려니 이건 누구를위한 어플인지?.... 예약은 이미 마감되어버려 아무것도못하네요 좀더 이용자를 위한다면 정해진 시간외에는 예약이 안되도록 좀더 보완을 해야 되지않을까요? 처음부터 끝나는시간까지 예약완료 .... 참 황당하고 답답한 어플이네요 보완해주세요
review_en: It's been a long time since I've been to an amusement park with my kids, and I was surprised to see an app called Magic Pass, but when I tried to use it, it's already closed, so I can't do anything about it. Shouldn't I make up for it so that it won't be available until after the scheduled time? Reservation completed from start to finish .... It's a ridiculous and frustrating app. Please make up for it.

It wasn't notified in advance, and I didn't hear such an explanation or notice after the ticket was issued. When I came in, they said they're preparing to go on a trip because of the cold weather. Thanks to you, I spent a lot of waiting time with a lot of group guests. I can't do it if there's a guideline for the weather, but I don't know who the 100% comet reservation system is for. I can't even choose to give you a free pass and wait.

review: 아이와 간다면, 아침일찍 가거나 아님 저녁 7시 이후에 가세요. 아이가 타는건 정해져 있으니까요. 그러면 많이 기다리지 않고 탈 수 있어요 2~3시간이면 실컨 놀죠. 아침에 간다면 점심은 월드밖으로 나가 롯데월드몰로 가서 식사하거나 백화점이나 마트 푸드코트를 이용하면 크게 번거롭지 않습니다.
review_en: If you're going with your child, go early in the morning or after 7 p.m. It's a given for a child to ride. Then I can ride it without waiting too long. Two or three hours to play in the Silcon. If you go in the morning, lunch is not too much of a hassle if you go outside the world and go to Lotte World Mall to eat or use department store or mart food court.

review: 아주 덥고 비도 많이 오는 날에 놀이공원을 다녀왔는데 롯데월드는 실내 놀이시설이 있어서 좋았습니다. 날씨가 좋지 않아도 즐길 수 있다는 점이 아주 큰 장점같아요. 그리고 안에 레스토랑도 다양하게있어서 좋았어요. 도니버거라는 햄버거를 먹었는데 크게 비싸지도 않고 좋았습니다. ^^ 중국 음식을 파는 곳에서는 중국인 관광객도 많이 볼 수 있었어요~ ! 햄버거, 중국음식, 한식 등 다양한 음식을 판매하니 여러 나라에서 방문하기 좋을 것 같아요. 그리고 놀이기구들도 재미있었어요.
review_en: I went to the amusement park on a very hot and rainy day, and Lotte World was good because it had indoor amusement facilities. I think it's a big advantage that you can enjoy it even if the weather is not good. And it was good because there were various restaurants inside. I ate a hamburger called Donnie Burger and it wasn't that expensive and it was good. I could see a lot of Chinese tourists at the restaurant that sells Chinese food. I think it would be good to visit various countries because they sell various foods such as hamburgers, Chinese food, and Korean food. And the rides were fun.

review: 제목대로 사람이 너무 많음 인기있는 거는 최소1시간 정도 기다려야함 하지만 놀이기구는 꽤 재미있다...
review_en: As the title says, there are too many people and you have to wait at least an hour for something popular, but the ride is quite fun.

review: 가족여행으로 롯데월드를 왔는데 연령대에 상관 없이 모두 재밌게 탈 수 있는 놀이기구가 많아서 좋았어요 또 벌써부터 크리스마스 분위기가 나게끔 이쁘게 꾸며놓은 것도 예뻤어요
review_en: I came to Lotte World for a family trip, and it was good because there were many rides that everyone could enjoy regardless of age. And it was pretty already decorated to give off a Christmas vibe.

review: 실내 시설이 매우 커서 겨울에도 놀기에 부담이 없습니다. 그치만 그만큼 사람도 많아서 줄 서는데 시간이 너무 많이 소비되요. 아이랑은 처음 방문했는데, 저는 아이랑은 비추천입니다. 이 돈이면 키즈카페 몇번을 갈텐데, 아이가 키즈카페에서 더 많이 좋아할텐데 생각이 들더라고요.. 역시 롯데월드는 연인 친구사이가 좋은듯 합니다
review_en: The indoor facilities are very large, so there is no burden to play in the winter. But it takes too much time to line up because there are so many people. It's my first time visiting with Ai, but I don't recommend her. With this money, I would go to a kids cafe a few times, and I thought my kid would like it more. As expected, Lotte World seems to have a good relationship with lovers.

review: 롤러코스터만 겁나게 탔어요ㅋㅋ 기분 째집니다 대기시간 줄이던가 롤러코스터 시간 단축시켜주세요 짜증나게 ㅋ 매직패스 회수제한 늘려주시고 후렌치레볼루션 vr2 매직패스 빨리 열어주세요 짜증나 기다리느라 영혼이 탈곡될것 같아요. 이거 때문에 오기 싫어졌어요ㅋ
review_en: I've been on the roller coaster ride.I feel so good. Reduce waiting time or reduce roller coaster time.
